sourceDesc.p: ସାରଳା ମହାଭାରତ: Sāraḷā Dāsa's Mahābhār, Arttaballabha Mohant, vol. 2, part. 1

projectDesc.p: The edition was scanned in 2008 at Leiden University by Arlo Griffiths with the help of his assistant Shila Schoots. Based on these scans, the edition was rekeyed 2009 by typists based in South India whose work was coordinated by Thomas Malten. The work was done at the time with a low budget furnished by Arlo Griffiths and left a lot to be desired. It has remained dormant for nearly 15 years and has now (Febr. 2024) started to be gradually cleaned up.

div.head: {@rajacakra@}

lg.l: baibasuta manu agastiṅki kale pāda pūjā
ādyapabong kahila muni dibya rasa bāṇī
śarīra nirmaḷa hoilā taba mukhuṁ śuṇi | 3 |
ẏebe kebaṇa carita puṇa kaleka pāṇḍabe
sāṅsārikā dharme hela tāṅka kisa rīti | 5 |
śuṇa sābadhāne madhya pabongra ye kathā | 7 |

div.note: –kshaẏānta = pūrṇṇabhābare śeṣa |

lg.l: hastinā rājyare ye īśāna bhāga kati
bhinne nabara kari bije karāile dropatī | 9 |
kointāṅku hiṁ bhinna nabara sehu lāge
bāḷaba nāme karaṇa śubha nāme yoga
kuṅkuma kastūrī tahiṁ maṇḍita kari pāṇi
svāmī āja rajabatī hoile dropada dohita
tumbha tahuṁ mote ke miḷiba bhāgyabantā
tumbho mahāmuni āhe aṭa sabong gyāṁtā | 18 |
yauṁ yauṁ yoga lagne hoẏe yauṁ kathā | 19 |
aṇṭāru khaḍi kāṛhi koṭhi kāṭi karanti prakāśa | 20 |

div.note: –miśrita karāile cūna ye haḷadī
māranti picikā tahiṁ parihāsa bhedi (bidhi)
ucchaba = utsaba – ka, ga, gha, ca, cha, ja, jha, ñja, ṭha

lg.l: aṣṭa goṭi koṭhi madheṁ gr̥ha ye śobhana
bāra tithi nakṣatra candra yoga karaṇa rabi aṁśa
svāmīki roga pīḍā santāna na hoanti | 28 |
se stirī svāmīre sadā hoai bhagati | 29 |

div.note: – gurubāre yebe hoiba rajakārī
dhana santāna barddhuta hoai tāhāri (pāṭhāntara)
sthāḷī = thāḷī 28|1 āditya bāre = rabibāre

lg.l: putra santāna nāśa yāi ẏeka sambhatsare | 34 |
makara māsa śukḷa daśamī gurubāra rohiṇī
atihiṁ pātakī se chuiṁ ta na yogānti | 37 |
putra pautrī hoẏekā svāmīre dina hari | 38 |
aneka sampradhi hoẏe putra yautrī prāpati | 39 |
pañchamī tithire yebe hoai rajabatī priẏā
se storī pratakṣe ye aṭai sataśriẏā | 41 |
saptamī dina yebe rajabatī hoai māninī
se stirīki gheni ghara kale nohi dhana, santāna hāni | 43 |
pati putra dohitā tāra bahuta rogare paṛanti | 44 |
svāmī nāśa yāi bidhabā hoẏe nārī | 45 |
dhana jane hoẏe sukhī bolanti mahāyati | 46 |

div.note: se stirīki gheni ghara kale dhanahāni – ṭha, anyānya pothi
rr|2 putra dohitā nāśayāi na upujai prīti (ca, ñja, ṭa)
sampradhi = samr̥ddhi, sampattiśāḷīnī
–biṣuḷipāti = br̥ṣaḷapati | 41|2 sataśriẏā = satyare lakṣmībatī

lg.l: yebaṇa stirī hoai rajabatī ẏekādaśī dine
svāmī thāuṁ āna puruṣa icchai tāra mane | 47 |
se stirīki chuiṁle stirī hatyā doṣa pānti | 48 |
yebaṇa stirī traẏodaśī dina hoanti rajakārī
patire saubhāgī lakṣmīre ballabhī sehu nārī | 49 |
bahuta pātakī se kuṭumbe honti trāsi | 50 |
se stirīki gheni ghara kale nohai santāna | 51 |
dhana santāna hoiba dekhiba putra nāti | 52 |
daśamīre hoilā ye nirddoṣī dropada dohitā | 53 |
yebaṇa nakṣatre rajabatī hoile hoai yemante | 54 |
hastā svātī anurādhā dhaniṣṭhā ẏete puṇya māni | 55 |
rajabatī hele stirī sukha bhoga kare | 57 |
ẏete nakṣatre yebaṇa stirī hoanti rajabatī
ihaloke sukha pāi tāra ante sadagati | 58 |
aśleṣā tini pūbongā dvijā ārdrā maghā jyeṣṭhā nakṣatrare
rajabatī hoile stirī bahuta duḥkha bhoga kare | 59 |
yujheṣṭhi boilenakṣatra catre yebe nāhiṁ pāpagraha
samasta guṇa guṇi bichāranti dna arthe | 62 |
āẏuṣvāna saubhāgya prīti siddhi br̥ddhi śobhana sukarma
barīẏāna śukḷa śia sādhya śubha dhr̥ba harṣaṇa indra brahma | 63 |
dhr̥ti ati gaṇḍa śūḷa biṣkumbha byatipāta dhr̥ba yoga
dochārī huanti nārī yebe hoai raja yoga | 65 |
yarigha byāghāta gaṇḍa biṣṭi bajra baidhr̥ti
santāna hāni hoai ẏethe hele rajabatī | 66 |

div.note: –khaḍi gheni koṭhi kāṭanti purohita dhaumya
śāhāsra bichāranti paṇḍita uttama | (kha, ṭa)
‘santāna hāni hoi ẏethe hele rajabatī’ ehapare chapābahi ‘ṭha’re karaṇara bichāra achi | kintu ehā anya kauṇasi pothire nāhñ |
baba bāḷaba kauḷaba taitiḷa bāṇijya |
ẏe yogare rajotī hele pāi rājya |
biṣṭiśakuni kiṁstughne āu gara nāga |
catuṣpadakaraṇa ẏe ṣaṣṭhe pāpa bhoga |
‘kha’ o ‘ṭa’ pothire e sthānare adhikā pāṭha achi :–
yogalagna bichāra karante dhaumya prohite
kichi doṣa nāhiñ ye bichāra karante |
āho samasta pāsori bichārile māheśvarī
śuṇiṇa santoṣa hoile yujheṣṭhi daṇadhārī |
yujheṣṭhi pachāranti śuṇimā prohite
pākaśuddha snāna hoiba kete dina ante |
āẏuṣvāna = āẏuṣmāna

lg.l: tr̥tīẏe rabi budha daśamare achai maṅgaḷa |
ucchaba bidhāna ye karanti dinā ṣate | 69 |
chāṇḍāḷa chuiṁlā doṣa ye prathama dina labhanti | 70 |
chuiṁlā mātrake sehi bege snāna kari
tebe se dinara doṣa yāẏe apahari | 71 |
sambacchra pariyante piḍhr̥loke tarpaṇa na pābanti | 72 |
aśuddha stirīki chuaṁi yebe dhr̥tiẏa dibase
liṅga bhagna doṣa se labhanti puruṣe | 73 |
pākāparaśa stirī ye chuaiṁ caturtha dine
tāhāra annajaḷa na pāānti debatā piḍhr̥gaṇe | 74 |
ṣaṣṭhama dinare ye pañchagabya kuṅkuma lepi
sapatama dina rātre ye miḷiba svāmī pāśa
ẏete gyāṁna thile khaṇḍai pāpagraha doṣa | 78 |
yāhā se biñcharile dhaumya prohite purāṇe
muhiṁ tāhā bañchāili ṭhākurāṇīṅka āgyāṁ paramāṇe | 79 |
bichāra kale ẏethe ẏete doṣa achi
anyāẏa paṇa kale dharmahiṁ na gacchi | 80 |

div.note: sambacchara pariyante pitr̥loke pāṇi ye na pābanti || (ḍa, ḍha)
srāhāna = snāhāna

lg.l: kete aniryāpa kari kahibi muṁ mānuṣa yonire hoi janma | 82 |
sāroḷā dāsa kahile ẏe rajacatrara bāratā | 83 |
na paṛhili akṣara nohai śāhāsra bādī
paṇḍita janaṅka tile na basili sampadi | 84 |
kuthāna bāsī muṁ nohili bipra goṣṭhī
dhaumya prohite boile yāhā ś{??} yoge
muhiṁ tāhā bañchāili śāhāsra purāṇa mārge | 87 |

div.head: {@pāṇḍabamānaṅkara niẏama@}

lg.l: makara māsa śukaḷa pakṣa ẏekādaśī tithi
dropatī śuddha srāhāna mukati sehi dibase
puṣpabatī bandāpanā ucchaba karāile dharma śiṣe | 2 |
tr̥tiẏe arghya dile debī ye gāndhārī
mukhare andha paṭaḷa rādheba kara dhari | 5 |

div.note: mukhare andhapaṭaḷa achai debī bhari (kha, ja, ṭa)
kaṭhina artha = 84|2 sampādi = samāna bhābare basi pārili nāhiñ |
kaṇakalpa = kaṇāẏe tulya (pari)

lg.l: yujheṣṭhi boile māgo andhapaṭaḷa daṇḍeka upekha
gāndhārī boile bābu aneka kālara patibrata
brata kari upekhile dharma hoaili prāpata ? | 7 |
ẏethaku kaṭāḷa bābu na kara mote kichi
cachuthile yāhā dekhi tāhā mote pratakṣe hoai dr̥śya
ẏemante diśai mote bhūta ye bhabiṣya | 9 |
ẏete boli gāndhārī śrīhaste arghya gheni
prathame yujheṣṭhi, dutīẏe bhīma tr̥tīẏe phālaguni | 10 |
caturthe bandāile makuḷa shadeba beni bhāi
tadante dropatī śire arghya dile nei | 11 |
jaẏa jaẏa maṅgaḷa ye sādhu dhuni toḷi
suḷakṣaṇī koṭiẏe kanyā dianti huḷa huḷi | 12 |
āśiṣa bāñcchā ye kale sakaḷa siddha muni | 13 |
koṭiẏe subarṇṇa ye hoilā ka dāna
koṭiẏe dile śrīphaḷa raṅga ye basana | 14 |
koṭiẏeka dhenu batsā dileka aṣṭaratna jaḍāure
puṣpabantī āhuti dileka dhaumya prohite se ṭhābare | 15 |
pūrṇṇācūḷa āhuti ante homa ghr̥ta āpyāna kale pañchubīre
dropatī sahite āpyāna kale sakaḷe tatakāḷe | 16 |

div.note: pañchame dropatī śire arghya dile nei (ka, kha, ṅa)
pūrṇṇācūḷa āhūti = pūrṇṇāhūti habirbhāga
āpyānapa = pāna | 17|2 bidujana = paṇḍitajana |
uṁkāri = prathame uccāraṇa kari |

lg.l: putra pautrī prāpata hou go tote māta
yāhā bāñcchā karibu tāhā tote hou parāpata | 19 |
ucchaba sāri gale ye yāhā bhmabana
āpaṇā mandire debī bijaẏe niśā kaḷe | 21 |
yujheṣṭhi pucchā kale chāri bhāiṅka mukha chāhiṁ | 22 |
tahāṅku chuiṁ na yogāi ye sapata dina sapta rāti | 23 |
purūṣa yebe śr̥ṅgāra na kare tāra tule | 24 |
ẏesaneka bebhāra bābu achaiṁ śāsra yoge
pāchāḷa puraku bije kara tumbhe āja raẏaṇī | 27 |
ẏete kahi chāribhāi gale ye yāhā āstānaku
yujheṣṭhi deba bijaẏe kale droptī puraku | 28 |
bijaẏe kale svāmī dibya ye āsane

div.note: “draśana kale āsi chāri bhrāthamāne” –pare gha, ca, ja o ‘ṭha’ re

lg.l: snāna nitya karma sāri caḷile māruti | 34 |
āumānaṅku ye baḍa nāhiṁ prīti raṅga
boile dropatī tu mohora prāṇara ballabha
tu mohora nija pati aṭu nā sulabha | 37 |
trīṛā raṅga karante ye pāhilā śabongrī | 39 |

div.note: pūbong pr̥ṣṭhāra abaśiṣṭāṁśa–
ẏemante dropatī debī mane bichārile
agnire paśiṇa ye srāhāna debī kale ||
bichāri boile ẏekara ucchiṣṭa ārekaku na debi
tebe se satī paṇe gaṇitā hoibi ||
dinaku dina agnire paśi aṅga pakhāḷai
nabatana śarīra agniru jāta hoi ||
tebe se svāmīra pāśaku debī yāiṁ
ẏemanta prakāre nitihiṁ bhiāi ||
prathama dina yujheṣṭhiṅki aṅga dile
rajanī pāhāntire agnire paśile ||
sehi aṅga goṭi debī agnire pakhāḷi
nabatana kāẏe dhaile bāḷī ||
āradina rātre bije kale bhīmasena
pāchāḷīra saṅge trīḍārase toṣamana ||
bhīmasenaku aṅga samarpiṇa bāḷī
agnire snāhāna kari dropada dulāḷī ||

lg.l: nitya karma sāriṇa ye nakuḷa caḷile
rātra pāhi dibasa ye hoilā prakāśa | 41 |
anteśvara pura bhitare ye thāānti dropatī
anteśyara pura bhitare ye thāānti dropatī
doharā agni śāḷe doharā agni thāi

div.note: pūbong pr̥ṣṭhāra abaśiṣṭāṁśa :–
se śarīra goṭi agnire dāha kari
nabatana kāẏe puṇihiṁ abatari ||
tr̥tīẏa rātrare bije kale phālaguna
aneka pīrati tāṅku kale yignasenī
āumānaṅku me baḍa nāhiṁ prīti raṅga
ajjunaku nirbhaẏe samarpile aṅga
arjjunara tule pīrati baṛhāi
rajanī prabhāte uṭhile, mahāmāī ||
agnire paśiṇa snāhāna kalā bāḷī
puṇa se nabare miḷai pāñchāḷī ||
caturtha dibasare nakuḷa bije kari
dropatīra saṅgate trīṛārasa sāri
agnira bhitare paṇiṇa jagatamāta
nabatana kāẏe tahuṁ kalā jāta ||
pañchama dibase sahadeba bijekari
sahadeba saṅgate ratiraṅga tāñchāḷī ||
doharā agni = gārhapatya agniru nīta agni |
pāṭhāntara artha–mokṣamāna mokṣapāna = mukhyarupe gaṇya

lg.l: se kāẏā agnire dahya kari yignasenī
puṇi agniru bāhāra āna kāẏā gheni | 46 |
nohile se ni chuaṁi dharmarāja aṅga | 47 |
satīra mahimā tu śuṇa ho nr̥pati
śuddhasrāhāna sāri aṅga bhoga diai pañchupati | 49 |
puṇi sehu kāẏā dahana karai agni kuṇḍe
manu pucchā kale he agasti mahātamā

div.note: pūbong pr̥ṣṭhāra abaśiṣṭhāṁśa–
ratitrīḍā sāri sahadeba rajanī prabhātare
nityakarma sāri bijaẏe āstānare ||
dropatī bichāri gnire paśile
nabatana kāẏe agniru jāta kale ||
samasta stirīmāne karanti jaḷare snāhāna
agnire snāhāna dropatī karai pratidina ||
mahāsvatī madhye se ye aṭanti mokṣamāna
teṇu kari ẏehāra bhrathā pāñchajaṇa ||
ẏekara ucchiṣṭa se ārekaku na diai
nabatana kāẏe dhari aṅga samarpai ||
ẏemante tiriśa dine śuddhasnāna
pāñcharātre bije karanti pāñchajaṇa ||
ẏehi rūpe agnire aṅga pakhāḷai
nabatana śarīra dhari aṅga samarpai ||
anteśvara madhyare rahithānti debī dropatī
āna dine kehi tāṅka katiki na yānti |

lg.l: puṇi se agniru utapatti karai kāẏe | 53 |
satīra kuḷaku ẏeta baḍāi dulabha kathā
satya yuge śuṇilā nāhiṁ ta ẏe sana bāratā | 54 |
ẏehi deha kesane yujheṣṭhi debaṅku deba boli bhāḷi | 57 |
se chāriheṁ śr̥ṅgāra karanti mote gyāna bhraṣṭe
yujheṣṭhiṅki kesane bhoga karāibi ẏehāṅka uttiṣṭe | 58 |
ẏesna bichāri debī dahija karāi aṅga
nabatana śarīra yujheṣṭhiṅki diai aṅga bhoga | 59 |
svāhā svadhā aṭanti ye ẏehāṅkara bhagnī
puṇa puṇa nabatana śaīra karai utapana | 61 |
ẏehā śuṇi sānanda ye hoilā yugapati
aneka pūjā ye kalā paṇḍita agasti | 62 |

div.note: apamāne śr̥ṅgāra na chāṛanti kehi || – (ga, ca, ja)
pūbong pr̥ṣṭhāra abaśiṣṭāṁśa –
doharā agni ghare dropatī ye thānti
pāñchakai śr̥ṅgāra sāri agnire paśai mahāsatī ||
se kāẏe agnire dahana karai yighnasenī
puṇi se agniru jāta huai āna śarīra gheni
tebe se chuai debī yujheṣṭhira kāẏe
satīra mahimā tuhi śuṇa nr̥parāẏe ||
śuṇila ṭiki ho bilaṅka nr̥pabara
dropatīra mahimā śuṇilaṭiki śrabaṇara ||
śuṇi rāẏe ānandare kr̥takr̥ta hoilā |
muniṅkara śrīcaraṇe praḷambita hoilā ||

lg.l: tohore se bichāra hoai ẏehu kathā | 63 |
śarīra nirmaḷa hou mora taba mukhuṁ śuṇi | 64 |
nityeheṁ se bijaẏe karai dropatī puraku
beḷe kāḷa yoga kicchi hiṁ na jāṇaiṁ
gāṛhe dhari śr̥ṅgāra se baḷātkāre karai | 68 |
loḍi na pāi ye bhīmasena āsai bāhuḍi
na dekhi brikodara pure pure loḍi | 71 |
anteśvara pure paśi loḍi na pāi yighnasenī
agniki chāhiṁ rodana karai bīra ye pābani | 73 |

div.note: śarīra nirmaḷa hou surabhi gaṅgā jāṇi || (ca, ja)
manu kalpāntare yāhāra jñāna anargaḷā (ja, ḍa, ḍha)
manu kalpāntare yāhāra śāhāsra anargaḷā || –(ṅ, ṭa)
bhīmasenaṅku dekhi bhaẏe karai yighnasenī (gha, jha, ṭa)
bhaṇḍi yighnasenī agnire paśai || (ga, gha)

lg.l: pāñcha kari ārddoḷi sahi napāru hoilu parābhabi | 74 |
ẏekā bhīmasena mote dilā mahā dukha | 77 |
agnire gopya hoili muṁ bhīmasena ḍare
ẏehāra ārddoḷi sahiba kebaṇa stirī chāre | 78 |
śataśiṁga pabongta yāhāra pāda ghāte cūnā
muhiṁ kāhiṁ sahibi chāra abajā stirīmātra sinā | 79 |
stirīṅkara rati sukha śuddha snāna ante
tebe se baḷa bapu āi nā śarīra | 81 |
yatane nāśa yānti ye na jāṇi agyānī | 82 |
yujheṣṭhi boile ẏebe pāñchaṅkari niẏama āmbhara
ye abā gyāna bhraṣṭe bhitare paśiba

div.note: –agniru jāta hoilu gosāmaṇī
ebe tu dahijya hoilu bahani ||
–anaryyapa śr̥ṅgāre āṣya hoi kṣaẏe
muhiṁ brakodaraku karai baḍa bhaẏe || –ka, ṭa
–yāhāra pāli paḍiba yebaṇa dinara |
dvāre santaka thoi paśiba ramaṇī bhmabanara || – cha, ṛha ḍha ṭa

lg.l: arjjuna boile mora gaṇḍima dhanu thiba
nakuḷa boile mora konta ye rahiba | 88 |
sahadeba boile mora khaḍaga ye thiba
ẏesaneka santaka kale pañchau ye pāṇḍaba | 89 |
māsake beḷe lekhāẏeṁ dropatī puraku yibā
āreka dine gale bāra baraṣa banabāsa karibā | 91 |
āreka dina na yiba dropatī purakaiṁ | 92 |
ẏethaku madhyastha hele debī ye pāñchāḷī | 93 |
ẏesaneka pāḷi paḍai māsake ẏeka dine
dr̥ḍha kari pāḷi thānti pāñche heṁ ẏekamane | 94 |
ye yāhāra niẏama pāḷile pañcha bhrāthe

div.head: {@arjuna banabāsa@}

lg.l: baiśākha māsa kr̥ṣṇa pakṣa dutīẏā ye tithi | 1 |

div.note: ẏesaneka nimunā kale pañchu ye pāṇḍaba | (ṛa, ṛha, ga)

lg.l: dvāre santaka ye rakhi galeka pāṇḍoi duigoṭi
baśyānara agni ye brāhmaṇa rūpa hoi
tu mohora chāmuku hakāri āṇa yujheṣṭhiṅki | 5 |
chaḍa niśvāsa madhye rāi āṇibu mohora sannidhāna | 6 |
kṣaṇakara madhye yujheṣṭhiṅki āṇibu mora kati
brāhmaṇara tahuṁ ẏesaneka niṣṭhura bacana pātha śuṇi
muhiṁ yebe na yibi yujheṣṭhi debaṅku āṇi | 9 |
madhu piṅgaḷa brāhmaṇa ẏe aṭai mahāteja
śāpa dile bongśa yāka hoiba dahijya | 10 |
gale muhiṁ ekā jaṇe sinā yibaiṁ banabāsa
brāhmaṇaṅku ruhāi pātha anteśvara bhitare prabeśa | 11 |

div.note: aneśvara bije kahe dharmarāja yujheṣṭhi” pare ‘gaṅa’re adhika pāṭha
śuṇaho caitana apūbong rasa kathā |
agnidebatāra ye ludubudubyādhira bāratā |
mohora kopante samaste dahija hoiba | (cha, jha, ṛa, ḍha)
ẏekā jaṇe sinā pache muṁ yibi bana
brāhmaṇa ruhāi bhitare paśilā arjuna | (kha, ṭa, ṇṇa)
yujheṣṭhi deba ye santeka cakhithile dvāre
śvāna peṣi agni debatā kale tāhā antare
dvāre se santeka na dekhi arjuna
dhātikāre paśigale ẏekānta bhmabana | (kha, ṭa)

lg.l: moca duigoṭi dvāe santaka ye thoi
bhitara pure yujheṣṭhi prabeśa hoithile yāiñ | 12 |
agne debatā ye māẏāre śvāneka hoi
heṭhabuḍā rati raṅga kāma rasa bhoḷe | 15 |
rasa bhagna hoilā saṅkoca pāile beni | 16 |
ulaṅga hoi debī keśabāsa sambhāḷi nuārile
saṅkoce loci hoi gr̥ha kabāṭa koṇe āujile | 17 |
dibasahuṁ adhika ujjaḷa hoi jaḷucchi māṇikya dīpamāna
kimpāiṁ ẏeḍe kr̥tya kalu re bhāigoṭi | 19 |
bhāmāra bhaẏe āmbhe, sinā kalaiṁ ẏeḍe kr̥tya
kampāiṁ hatagyāna karma kalu re bīra pātha | 20 |
bābu apāra doṣa huai śr̥ṅgāra bhagna kale
yeteka pātaka huai puṇa liṅga ye bhāñjile | 21 |
liṅga bhagna grahmahatyā kalā sari doṣa
para śr̥ṅgāra bhāñjile hoi tete doṣa | 22 |
arjuna boile deba āna na dhara mane
ẏekā muhiṁ jaṇe sinā yibaiṁ ghora bane | 23 |

div.note: rasabhagna hoilā uṭhile yighnasenī | (kha, gha, ja)
rasabhagna hoiyāiṁ lucile yighnasenī | (ka, ga, ca, ḍa, ḍha, ṭa)
tukimpā heji paṛilure banabāsākr̥ta | (jha, ṭa)
yeyeka pātaka huai puṇa pūjāliṅga ye bhāñjile (ga, ṅa, cha, ja, ñja, ṭa)
moca = yotā bā pāṇḍoi | (marahaṭī abhin)

lg.l: bahana hoi ẏebe bije karibā deba svāmī
pura tora dahana hoiba mora piṭhi dei gale | 25 |
svāmī niṣṭhura bacana yahum boile dijabara
teṇu kari bho deba muhiṁ aili ati kyara | 26 |
ābara biśeṣe santaka ye dvāre nāhiṁ
yujheṣṭhi boile moca yoḍi nelā hāde śvāna
āre āre śvāna chāṇḍāḷa pāpiṣṭha mandajāti
tohora na nei thile moca dvāre thāntā
santaka dekhile arjuna kimpā bhitare paśantaā | 30 |
rasabhagna hoilā mora ākuḷa pañchabhūta dehī | 31 |
ye tohora ramāṇī tāhāra tule śr̥ṅgāra karante
dāṇḍa hāṭa maṇropa sabuṭhāre kara rata | 34 |
bhāiki bicchea yebe kalu re mohora | 36 |
ẏete boli bhitaru ye bāhāra hoile

div.note: rata = ramaṇārthare byabahr̥ta |

lg.l: loḍi na pāile tāku paṇḍura nandane | 38 |
arjuna boile svāmī āmbhe kalāuṁ niẏama
teṇu kari kaṣaṇa se kale debadharma | 39 |
svāmī muhiṁ yāuacchi ẏebe gahana araṇya bhrami
yujheṣṭhi debe boile bābu kiñchita ẏehu kathā
ẏethaku bhrānti bābu tu kicchi na kara mane
arjuna boile naka gati hoiba nā deba satya ye laṁghane | 43 |
mote chāṛi kāhiṁki tumbhe yiba ho prāṇamaṇi | 44 |
tuhi svāmī se lākha binddhalu yugate
āpaṇe ẏekāẏeṁ pradāna nohi ẏehānta dilu mote | 45 |
muhiṁ ballabhī tuhi se mora prāṇanātha
kṣaṇe na dekhile mr̥cchi na pārai saṅghāta | 46 |
moteheṁ bho svāmī nia tora tule | 47 |
se se parama sādhabī ye khaṭile śrīrāmaṅku
patnī bhraṣṭa nohile sinā yogāi tīrthaku | 49 |
bhāriyā saṅge thile se prāpata hoai dharma
nānā tīrthe pitr̥kāryya yete śreṣṭha karma | 50 |
tohora nimante mote jāta kale byāsa mahāmuni | 51 |

div.note: mr̥cchi = mūrcchi |

lg.l: satya yuge banabāsa kale naḷa ye nr̥pati
stirī puruṣa ẏeka ātmā mote kimpā nindu | 53 |
sateheṁ arjuna banabāsa yiba ki mane karu bhrānti | 54 |
arjuna badana chāhiṁ bolanti deba dharme
kebaṇa mahātmā bacane paśilu tu mati bhrame | 55 |
kāma arthe paśilu ki droapatīra pura | 56 |
svāmīra bacana śuṇi bolanti bīra phālaguni
yujheṣṭhiṅki bañchāi se yoḍile beni pāṇi | 57 |
satya bhagna prāṇī na bratanti kadācite
āpaṇāra kalā kr̥ta muhiṁ laṅghimi kemante | 59 |
tumbhe ye sītaẏā katha kahili yighnasenī | 60 |
kāḷe pramāda paḍilāṭi bañchi ta na pārile | 61 |
hari nelā rābaṇa ye janaka kumārī
yeteka kaṣṭa pāile se kahi ta ki pāri | 62 |
ẏemāna mane go na dharibā draupatī
ẏekā hoi banaku muṁ yibaiṁ re satī | 64 |
muhiṁ kiñchita parāẏe maṇaiṁ dvādaśa baraṣa banabāsa | 65 |
yujheṣṭhi boile bābu yadi yibu bana
dure na thibuṭi mahāghora bana jāṇa | 66 |
bho deba bahuta dhūraku kimpā muhiṁ yibi
ẏehi nikaṭe thāi muṁ satya bañchāibi | 67 |
mote paramāda ta nāhiṁ ghora bane
ẏethikaiṁ mane kicchi na karibā cintā
bābu tohora muhiṁ apāda gheni yāiṁ re pātha
tote na dekhile mora jībana asuārtha | 70 |
bābu māse baraṣe nuheṁ dvādaśa baraṣa pariyante
muhiṁ ẏete kāḷa tote na dekhile bratibi kemante | 72 |
koḷi kari droapatī tāṅku dhaileka toḷi | 73 |
hā hā svāmī mote keṇe chāḍi gala paṇḍu
svāmīra bihune ye bañchai tāra jībana poḍu poḍu | 74 |
aneka pātakī se ye hoanti dochārī | 75 |
svāmī tote chāṛi muhiṁ ye hoili baṛa dukhī
ẏe śarīra dhaili muṁ ẏekā sahadebakai dekhi | 76 |
tumbhe kimpe asaṣṭama houcha go māta | 77 |
tumbhe kimpe aneka go houcha bimukha
muhiṁ ta banabāsaku ye maṇaiṁ baḍasukha | 78 |
muhiṁ bana yibi mote āgyāṁ debā svāmī | 79 |

div.note: tote na dekhile mora jībana biartha | (ṅa, cha)
kaḷābuku = kalijā
rubanti = kāndanti

lg.l: bābu muhim niẏama karāili arṇṇa mohora upare ariṣṭa | 80 |
arjuna boile bābu bujhili ni ẏehu kathā
yāuacchi banabāsaku go āgyāṁ debāka mote mātā | 82 |
dvādaśa baraṣa pūrile bābu banaru bāhuḍa | 83 |
bhala tīrtha goṭikare saṅkalpa tu kari
niẏama biñchāi bābu āsa re bāhuḍi | 84 |
bhīṣma droṇa bidura karṇṇa ābara bhūrisabongā
śalya śakuni kr̥pa aśastamā kururāja debā | 85 |
arjuna banabāsa yibāra bātata ye śuṇi āsi
bhīṣme boile ẏe kathā hoilā kemanta
boilā baḍa sandeśa kathāẏe yujheṣṭhiṅki āṇa bege rāi
boilā yujheṣṭhi debaṅku tu bahane rāi nuāṇile
pura to dahana hoiba mora piṭhiāi gale | 89 |
yujheṣṭhiṅka koḷe yebe dropatī debī thāiṁ
āmbhara parama guru se aṭanti mahāmāẏī | 92 |

div.note: baraṣake bāhuḍile doṣa nāhiṁ kicchi | (ṭa, kha)
niẏama bañchāi bāku āsa re bāhuḍi
brata pūrilāru na rahibu ẏeka ghaḍi | (kha, cha)
arṇṇa = jaḷa | 81 sabongsācī = sabyasācī | 81|2 bāci = bākya

lg.l: guru patnī ratiyoga muṁ dekhili naẏane
para śr̥ṅgāra yebaṇa jana bhagna kari
labhai pātaka se liṅgabhagna doṣa sari | 94 |
khaṇḍibi sabong pātaka nānā tīrthe yāiṁ | 95 |
tuhi jāṇu ṭiki bābu se adabhmata brāhmaṇaṅku | 96 |
arjune paṭhiāiṁ se adabhmate keṇe galā
kaha bābu sahadeba se brāhmaṇa kebaṇa hoilā | 97 |
agni debatā aile dhariṇa gopyāna mūrati | 98 |
arjuna bana gale se pāiba mauṣadhi | 99 |
teṇu kari gopyāna rūpe kaleka babana
tāhā jāṇi na pārile ṭhākura arajuna | 100 |
manda agni hoiacchi se satya yugahuṁ
kaurobe āśriyya hoile sahadeba kahuṁ kahuṁ | 102 |
ẏesaneka bichāra acchi yebe agni debatāra
kehu na bāra tumbhe ẏe yāu ghora bana
agniṅkara āṣya kāmārtha ye pūrou phālagunya | 104 |
bābu ārogya pāda khaṇḍana hou tuku | 105 |
ati gahana banaku na yibuṭi pātha
svātī nakṣatraku tuḷā bhogya se dinara | 107 |
caubiṁśa daṇḍa citrā nakṣatra bhoga thilā
yadyapi pujheṣṭhi jyeṣṭha tuhi samasta pāḷantā | 111 |
svāmī muhiṁ ye yāuacchi ghora gahana banaku |
svāmī yadyapi doṣa tumbhaṅku karibe bhīmasena
mohora āsibā yāẏe tāhā na dhariba mana | 113 |
yadyapi bhāiṅki mora kopa kariba anamite
aneka sānanda se arjuna tiāri boli
tīrthe pātaka dahana kari māgo muṁ bāhuḍibi kāli | 117 |
sabuṅkui daini karai ye bāsabara suta
jaṇe jaṇe sambodhi caḷai bīra pātha | 118 |
nagra teji arjuna paśilā ghora bane
gaṅgā kūḷuṁ bāhuḍile paṇḍuṅkara chāri nāne | 119 |
arjunaku na dekhi saburi manare birasa | 120 |

lg.note: sabuṅkui binopai ye bāsabara suta | (ṛa, ḍha)
sabuṅkui binoẏi ye bāsabara suta | (jha, ṭa, ṅa, ka)
jaṇe jaṇe samārji caḷai bīra pātha | (kha, ga, gha, ca, cha, ñja)
lg.l: karai bana trīḍā se kirāta rūpa gheni | 112 |
mathāre majūra jhāli kaṇṭheṇa guñjarāra māḷi
dhāmaṇā kāṭhara dhanu kaṇṭā bāẏeṁśara guṇa
phiriki nārāja ye pūroi beni troṇa | 123 |
kareṇa mudugara gheni chachande karai keḷi | 124 |
kirāta rūpa dhari bane bihaḍai sabongsācī
bhārgabī boliṇa ye ẏekai nadī goṭāẏe
bhairabī gaṅgāru se ye uttara mūrtti hoi bahe | 126 |
tīrtha sthāna boli tahiṁ rahilā phālaguni
subidhāna bhūmi dekhi bañchile māsa tini | 127 | 306 |

div.head: {@arjunara akṣaẏatūṇīra o pāśupata astralābha@}

lg.l: śuṇa ho caitana kakaḍā māsa kr̥ṣṇapakṣa dutīẏā ye aṭai bhr̥gubāra
śrabaṇā nakṣatra arjunaku aṭai kṣema tāra | 1 |
se dina arjuna prabeśa kāśīnadī tīre
kapiḷāsa kandaru bijaẏe hara ye pābongtī
śireṇa śītāṁśu ye aṅgeṇa lepana bibhuti

div.note: mārai banajība nārāja dhari āmañchi | (ḍa, ḍha)
gopī candana citā aṣṭāṅgeṇa śāmaḷi | (ka, ṭa, ṛa, ḍha)
chachande = svacchande | 125 prāñchi = bhalabhābare ākarṣaṇa kari

lg.l: karṇṇare tambā mudurā majūrta yuccha bāhi beni haste
kaṣā basana goṭiẏe pinddhaṇa achanti jagatamāte | 6 |
bhāṇḍīra br̥kṣa taḷe yāim pāḍile karpaṭī | 8 |
gaṇḍā goṭiẏe deba saṅgate thile āṇi
kāśīnadī bhitare paśi se ye piuthilā pāṇi | 11 |
gaṇḍā pāṇi piante dekhilā bīra pātha
apūbong jība dekhi dhanu dhailā bāma hātha | 13 |
gaṇḍāra uparaku se kiñchita bhābe binddha | 14 |
pāṇi khāi kari gaṇḍā yāānteṇa leuṭi
paḍiṇa nārāja gaṇḍāra bāma aṅga phuṭi | 15 |
śaraghāta hoiṇa ye paḷāilā gaṇḍā jība
śara bighāteṇa se chāḍilā ghora rāba | 16 |
umā boile svāmī tumbhe uṭha bega bega | 17 |

div.note: arjuna basi achanti pippaḷa latā taḷe | (ga, ca, ja, ḍa, ḍha)
dhr̥jaṭī = dhurjaṭī śiba; 8|1 karpaṭī = gāmuchā, choṭalugā
sīmasthāna = mastaka
kuruḷi = bidāri | 10|2 ghr̥mi = nidrā
śiṁśupā = śiṁśapā, śiśugacha, pippaḷa, aśvattha

lg.l: kiẏeṭi hāde māilā mohora gaṇḍā goṭi
prāṇatyāja hoilā deba nārāja acchi phuṭi | 18 |
gaṇḍāra hata dekhiṇa deba ḍākanti kopacitte | 19 |
ke re mohora poṣilā gaṇḍā goṭi prāṇatyāja kalā
śira sampada āṣya tā’ra ājahuṁ sarilā | 20 |
yadyapi āja tāku muṁ dekhibi naẏane
māri biśābaḷi debi āja ẏehi sthāne | 21 |
gaṇḍāku māriṇa ye arjuna āsai dhāiṁ
īśvara kopa kale arjuna mukha chāhiṁ | 22 |
āre āre śabarā boli ḍākile sadāśiba
br̥kṣaru ḍāḷeka bhāñjiṇ ase ye antarīche bulāi
nāsā agre kara deiṇa bīra arjjuna hasi
akāraṇe bāi tote ke kalā re tapusī | 26 |
maribāra pāiṁ loḍu tu kimpā re tapadhanī
paḷā yā’ ẏe banastaru bhāriyā goṭi gheni | 27 |
yete ghañchāḷa mote kaluni re abhāba
ẏā prāẏe sundarī bhāriyā goṭi bidhabā hoiba | 29 |
ẏehāra bikaḷe muhiṁre na māraiṁ tote
yeteka jhiṁghāsa gāḷi deluṇi tu mote | 30 |

div.note: pratagyāṁ kari arjunaku chāhiṁle suḍhoḷe | [kha, ga, ja]
pratagyāṁ kari arjunaku ogāḷile suḍhole | [ca, cha]
biṇābaḷi = biśa = manuṣyara baḷi ākāra āgama :–

lg.l: hatyā na ghenimā nimante ye bichārai arjjuna
sāmānya lokaku kesane samare karibi nidhana | 32 |
tapadhana hoi ye tu aṭu nirimākṣī
tote mārante āna nohantā kehu rakhi | 33 |
dakṣiṇa bhmajeṇa dhari anta rīche toḷi
dhanu huḷa gaḷāre lagāi antarīkṣe bulāilā kapāḷī | 35 |
sadāśiba nāthaṅku ye bulāi sehimati kari | 36 |
parama yogeśvara puruṣa chāṛile kopa citta | 37 |
bara māga kirāta re hoilu triputi
bara māga bara māga bolanti debasvāmī | 39 |

div.note: ‘baramāga baramāga bolanti debasvāmī,– pare chapābahi ‘ṭha’ ebong ‘ja’ra adhika pāṭha :–
baradebā kathā śuṇi pārtha bhābe mane,
banacara hoi bara yācai kesane |
brahmābiṣṇu hara bitrake bara yāce kehu se ye,
biśvanātha aṭanti bā ẏehu debarāje |
pābongtī gheni bhramanti ẏe bana trīḍāre,
gaṇḍā goṭiẏe ye poṣipānti śūḷadhare |
mane bichāri arjuna bismaẏa hoile,
bara yācibāra dekhi debī ṭahi kale | – (aprāsaṅgika o apapāṭha)
lāilā = nelā |

lg.l: svāmī ẏesaneka biparīta tumbhe aṭa ho paśupati | 40 |
māḍakhāi kebaṇa debatā bara ye prasādi | 41 |
śatr̥tā paṇe jiṇi tu pāilu baḍa yaśa | 43 |
puṇa puṇa bara se ye yācanti debarāja
tume kebaṇa puruṣa muhiṁ bara māgibi kemante
jirāta nohai ẏe aṭai pāṇḍaba phālaguni
pābongti boile re tu śuṇa dhanurjaẏe
banatrīḍa kari āmbhe ailu hara ye pābongtī
svāmī agyāne hoili mu tohore dorehā
aparādhi hoilaiṁ bara māgibaiṁ muṁ kāhā | 51 |
pābongtī boile tu na bhāḷa ẏemanta
śatr̥tā paṇe tu ye toṣilu biśvanātha | 52 |

div.note: svarūpa dekhāa muṁ dekhibi beni netre | [ḍa, ḍha]
macchaḷa = batsaḷa |

lg.l: tote kahibā ẏe svāmīra apūbong rasakathā | 54 |
bābu baitaraṇī nadī tīre śiba nāme nagrī
nirmaḷa boli kari tāra putra ye goṭie
bāḷa kāḷe rakhai se godhana paliẏe | 56 |
bābu se nadī kūḷe achai maṇḍaḷeśvara nāme liṅga
abhoga debatā tāṅku nāhiṁ bhoga rāga | 57 |
se putra goṭi tahiṁ goru rakhai ẏekā
se liṅga upare nei nitye ladai śateṭekā | 58 |
ẏehimati pratidina mārai se liṅgara upare
bhrānti na karai se hoilāni sambatsare | 59 |
śatabhiṣā nakṣatra ye aṭai se dinara | 60 |
nāga nāme karaṇa ye śiba nāme yoga
sedina se bāḷuta thilā kr̥ṣi khete
manare paḍilā se chāḍilā bhmañjilāra bhāta | 63 |
apūjā liṅgara sannidhye se hoilā parabeśa
īśvara carita ho śuṇa bīra pātha
se liṅgage bijaẏe kale ẏehi biśvanātha | 66 |

div.note: apūjā debatā tāṅku nāhiṁ bhoga rāga | [kha, ca, cha, ja, ñja, ṭha]
utiṣṭa = ucchiṣṭa |

lg.l: pañchai badana tāṅkara ye pañchadaśa naẏana
bara māga boli ye boile paśupati
talaẏa bhāba gheni mote kalure triputi | 68 |
bāḷuta bolai bho biśvanātha mote prasanna hoibā
ẏe bharatha khaṇḍe mote chāṣa br̥tti debā | 70 |
se bāḷuta nandana kicchihiṁ na jāṇaiṁ āna
sadibhābe māgilā se kr̥ṣi caṣaṅkara bidhāna | 71 |
śuṇa ho arjuna badaẏanti debī umā
se yāhā māgilāṭi tāku prasanna hoile ẏehi mahātamā | 72 |
se bāḷuta nandana yāhā māgilā kara prasāri
teṇu se brāhmaṇe ye hoile kr̥ṣikārī | 73 |
bedamantra aprāpata se hoile chāṣa karme brati | 74 |
pābongtī boile bābu śuṇa tu arjuna
ṭekā ladi se br̥tti arjilāṭi aṇḍirā brāhmaṇa | 75 |
ẏemante hoi prasanna hoileṭi ẏehi mahātamā
aneka sānande bara tote yācanti trilocana | 77 |
bahuta aprādhi muṁ mote kṣamā karibā debasvāmī | 78 |
pābongtī boile svāmī yebe deba bara
aśauce bara dile prāpata nohai deba hara | 79 |
nadīre snāhāna kari āsa deba kāśī
śaucabanta hoi arjunaku bara ye deasi | 80 |
pābongtīṅka bacane hara snāhāna kari gale
kaha bābu kisa bara māgibu sadānanda debaṅku
arjuna boile mā go muṁ ta ajñāna
bābu ẏehikṣaṇi debe tote alokita bara | 84 |
bābu tripurahiṁ dhvaṁsa kale yebaṇahiṁ kāḷe
śahasre bheda nohilā ṣāṭhi sahasra baraṣa roḷe | 85 |
se śahasra gheni hara śile tripura
sadāśiba nāthaṅku māga tu re se pāśupatra śara | 87 |
se śahasra bābure yebe thiba tohora haste
sāṅgrāme sari tote brahmā maheśvara śacīpate | 88 |
boile bara māga tuhire pāṇḍaba bīramaṇi | 89 |
muṁ yāhā māgibi deba dusaha aśakye | 90 |
īśvare boile māga ye tohora icchā
prasanna hoili ye pūru tora manabāñcchā | 91 |
arjuna boile deba yebaṇa śare nāśila tripura
sehi śahasra goṭi mote debāka biśveśvara | 92 |

div.note: māgibāku saṅkoca karai bhagati mora ghena | (gha, ca, ja)
se śahasa yebe thiba tora kara
sāṁgrāme samāna tote nohibe tinipura | (kha, cha)
arjuna boile aprastāba mora bākya
muhiṁ yāhā māgibi dusaha asaṁkya | (kha, ca, cha)
īśvarapada māgile debi sandeha nāhiṁ kicchi bibacchā | (ṅa, jha)
alokita = alaukika |

lg.l: prasanna hoiṁṇa mahā śahasra dileka paśupati | 93 |
tumbhe na kahile arjunara ẏeḍe jñāna kāhiṁ | 94 |
nārāẏaṇara dutī ātmā se aṭai sabonggyaṁ | 95 |
īśvara bichārile pābongtī aprāṁjaẏe kalāka muku
īśvare boile tumbhe śuṇa debī umā
arjuna āmbhara putra hoilāṭi re bāmā | 97 |
tumbhe go prasanna hoiba nā arjunaku
pābongtī boile bara māga ho phālaguni
kisa bara māgibu tu kahasi arajuna
arjuna boilā svāmī muṁ ye aṭai agyāna | 102 |
abikṣaṇe binddhale se dibā ye raẏeṇī | 104 |
akṣaẏe troṇa debī śarīru kale jāta
rātra dibasa binddhale na sarai śahasranta | 105 |
caubiṁśa baraṣa pariyante maẏeṁṣāra saṅgate yuddha ye hoilā
sehi troṇuṁ nārāja goṭiẏe na sarilā | 106 |

div.note: abikṣaṇe = anukṣaṇe |
maẏeṁṣāra = mahiṁṣāra |

lg.l: pābongtī debīṅku tu akṣaẏa troṇa māga | 107 |
pābongtī boile bara māga re arjuna
ye tohora manabāñcchā prāpata hou puṇa | 109 |
prasanna hoi mote debā akṣaẏe troṇa beni | 110 |
arjunara jñāni kāhiṁ tumbhe kahila śūḷapāṇi | 111 |
muhiṁ na kahili ye mohora doṣa
tumbhe anamite kimpe āmbhaṅku kara roṣa | 113 |
pābongtī boile deba tumbhe mandakr̥tya kala
arjunakaiṁ na kahila boli ye boila tripurāri
śate īśvara hoile arjunaku nohibe samasari | 115 |
akṣaẏa troṇa beni ye gheniṇa jagatamāta
sānande nei dile debi arjunara hātha | 116 |
bābu sabu debatāṅkara śahasramāna acchi ẏethi
ẏe tini jagate jagatajiṇantā tu hoilu sutakontī | 117 |
arjuna boilā bho māta ẏe śahasranta sambhāḷibi
ẏe śahasraku ye nindiba tāhāku prāṇe nāśa karibi | 118 |
yadyapi prāṇe tāku na pāribi māri
agni jāḷi maribi satya satya mohori | 119 |

div.note: ẏehāku gyāna tumbhe kahila śūḷapāṇi | (gha, ja)
troṇa = tūṇīra |
śākāmbarī = śākambharī |

lg.l: tu āmbhara putra helu boli sabongsācī nāma dile | 120 |
badaẏanti grantha ye saroḷa dāsa kabi | 123 |

div.head: {@biṣṇuṅkara nabaguñjara rūpa@}

lg.l: śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti
caitra māsa kr̥ṣṇa pakṣa ye traẏodaśī tithi | 2 |
śatabhiṣā nakṣatra se dinare kumbhare acchi śaśī
mādrī nandana ye praḷamba āsi kari
yujheṣṭhiṅka mukha chāhiṁ prabhma kahanti uttara | 13 |
deba samaste achanti ta nāhiṁ bīra pātha
śoke gada gada hoi boile kointā debī
bābu arjuna galā ye banabāsa sebi | 15 |
pachāranti kimarthe banaku galā mora bīra phālaguni | 17 |
ẏethira carita mukuṁ tadanta kari kahibā sandeśa | 20 |
ẏekānta sthānaku āmbhe chāla yibā puṇi | 21 |
ki ho mantrībara ẏe aṭai kisa artha
sabhāre ta na dekhiluṁ bīrabara pātha | 24 |
ṭhākuraṅku pachāriluṁ ye se na kahile mote
teṇu he sahadeba muṁ pachāraiṁ tote | 25 |
agniki sākṣa kari ye ẏemanta kahilu | 28 |
brāhmaṇa sarūpa dhari dvāre āsi hoẏe | 31 |
arjunaku boile tu yujheṣṭhi debaṅku kahasi yāiṁ
ẏemanta boliṇa ye gheniṇa tāṅku āsa
yebe biḷamba tu karibu ho pātha
māẏā na jāṇi pātha bhitaraku gale

div.note: bidujana = paṇḍita brāhmaṇa loka |
dhūmānta = dhvaṁsa |

lg.l: aneka banasta buli aneka datya māri
arjuna īśvaraṅku jiṇile hara udyāca bane
prasanna hoi bara dile hara pābongtī beni | 39 |
bara deiṇa hara ye gale kapiḷāsa
bipra prasada boli ẏekā nadī goṭiẏe
caubiṁśa naḷa tahiṁ achanti agra br̥kṣa
āḍeka agra br̥kṣe bānddha āra āḍa dhari | 44 |
chāri baraṣa chaḍa māsa hoilā tera dina
ki kāryye kapaṭa kale deba baśāṁnara | 49 |

div.note: naḷa = chāriśa’hāta bhūmira parimāṇa biśeṣa |
agra br̥kṣa = aguru acha |
beṇubr̥kṣa = bāuñśa gacha |
baśyānara = baiśvānara |

lg.l: mantrī boile se śveta rājā yāgyaṁkāḷe
śata baraṣa se agnire homa kale | 50 |
khāṇḍaba banu mauṣadhi māgile na dile surapati | 52 |
brānmaṇa rupa dhari māgibe sehu dāna | 53 |
teṇu kari pitā saṅge bibāda ācaribe
āgyāṁ heu deba muhiṁ yibi dvārābatī
yebe mohora sakhā arjuna nāhiṁ ẏethi | 57 |
gobinda boile deba ākaṭa kathā acchi
arjunaku samārjanā kari āṇimā deba hari | 60 |
tu deba saẏaḷa jana saṅsāra hitakārī
gata patha muhiṁ tora thibi upalesi
śubha yoge mote bheṭa arjunaku gheniāsi | 62 |

div.note: padmalohita netra = agni |
toḷāile = prārthanā karāile |
saẏaḷa = sakaḷa |
upalesi = upanesi, upanyāsi |

lg.l: āsibāra pāiṁ muṁ ye bolibi bahuta | 63 |
na puṇā nuāsai muṁ na pārai bheṭi deṭi | 64 |
muhi? ye arakṣita mote thiba daẏā kari | 65 |
gobinde boile muṁ aṭai tumbha bhr̥tya
yahiṁki abadhāna muṁ ye tahiṁki āgata | 66 |
ẏete boli deba ye praḷambita kale
āgyāṁ dile tu śuṇa ho binatākumara
seṭhāku saturi yojana se maṇibhadrā pabongta aṭai dura
dr̥ṣṭire dekhilā prāẏeka tini niśvāsare tahiṁ yāiṁ hoilā pachībara | 70 |
dr̥ṣṭire dekhilā prāẏe kari kahilu mantrībara | 72 |
arjunara nikaṭe bije kale deba yāiṁ | 74 |

div.note: ‘pratagyāṁ sārthuka’, ‘pratagyāṁ sāmaratha’ – pāṭha aneka pothire acchi |
guruḍa piṭhire caṛhi bijaẏe kamaḷāra sāiṁ | (ga, ca, cha, ṭa, ṭha)

lg.l: śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti
ẏekai śarīre deba dhaile ye nabamr̥tti | 76 |
kukuḍāra muṇḍa goṭi atīa sundara diśai
br̥ṣabhara cūḷa ye majurara kaṇṭha birājai | 77 |
gyāghrara caraṇa goṭi atīẏa śobhā pāẏe | 78 |
āga pāda goṭika manuṣyara kara ye aṭai
se kare padmapuṣya goṭiẏeka ghenile bhābagrāhī | 80 |
khara khara śabade se patre patre bājanti | 82 |
tahiṁki talaẏe puṇa ye na karai pātha
se yehne na jāṇaiṁ nr̥pati bije kale
dr̥ṣṭi na karai ghora śabada śubhile | 84 |
sehi mati dr̥ṣṭi pāthara guṇare acchi mana
māẏā sarūpaku sehu na chāheṁ naẏana | 85 |
śukhilā latā bhitare paśanti deba yāiṁ | 86 |
cauṣaṭhi tāḷa yehne nr̥tya raṅge dianti | 88 |
lg.note: ukusanti = ukucanti, uparuku ḍianti |

lg.l: guṇa chāḍi dr̥ṣṭi tahuṁ dilāka pāṇḍaba | 89 |
ẏekā dehe naba sarūpa ẏekai mūrati | 90 |
dekhiṇa pāṇḍaba ye cakita hoi chāhiṁ
ẏeka dehare ta naba goṭi rūpa
muhiṁ ta pr̥thibīre dekhilā nāhiṁ ẏesaneka sarūpa | 92 |
mohora na dekhilā hoi ẏemanta kāhiṁ nāhiṁ bana
mandara hara araṇya ye pāreśi saritā | 95 |
bauda nāme latā ye mahīndra nāme giri
koṭiẏe liṅga gheni tahiṁ bijaẏe tripurāri | 97 |
meru paścima bhāga haẏānta bana gheni | 98 |
hara udyāna bana ye araṇya nāgāntarī | 99 |
suka sudhabi pabongta ye kāḷa kundabana

lg.note: śaraṇa chāralatā = śaraṇachāra br̥kṣabiśeṣa |

lg.l: baṅkāḷa pabongta ābara śola giri śikha | 103 |
ẏehi rūpe acchi ye aṭhara lakṣa giri
ẏete ẏete pabongta muṁ āsicchi buli kari | 104 |
sakaḷa jība jantu dekhiacchi dr̥ṣṭi pathe | 105 |
ẏemanta sarūpa jība mora dekhilā ta nāhiṁ
māẏā sarūpa prāẏe diśuacchi mote ẏehi | 106 |
mote kaṣṇa karibāku abā aile padmanetra | 107 |
āna jība hoile ẏe niśce yiba jaḷi | 108 |
pāda taḷe paḍi tusti karai bīra
jaẏa tu anādi ye abyaẏa nirākāra | 110 |
tu deba dibya mūrati rūpa dhari pāru
brahmā rudra indra ye tohora parichāra | 112 |
mo chāra mānaba mote kiṁke to kaṣaṇa | 115 |
tusti sāri kara yoḍi ubhā hoile arajuna

lg.note: jaẏa tu anādi ye abhaẏe nirākāra | (kha, ca, cha, ja, ṭa)

lg.l: śaṅkha catra kare śobhā jagata mohana | 120 |
koḷe dhari deba dibya bākya boli | 121 |
dhanya dhanya dhanurjaẏe cihnilu tu mote
tu mohora prāṇa ye aṭu pañchu bhūte | 123 |
teṇu kari ẏe rūpa tu cihnilu mohora
ẏeteka boli deba puṇihiṁ kale koḷa | 124 |
ki kāryye dhanurjaẏe kalu re banabāsa | 125 |
lg.note:
‘ki kāryye dhanurjaẏe kalu re banabāsa’ – pare ‘ja’ pothi o
chapābahi ‘ṭha’ra adhika pāṭha :–
sahadebaṅku puṇa se karanti praśaṁsā
dekhilā prāẏe sahadeba kahilā bhabiṣya bhāṣā |
yeuṁ rūpe tote muhiṁ dekhili pabongtara
sehi rūpe mote kahithilā sahadeba mantrībara |
dhanyare sahadeba mantrī aṭu tuhi
tohora thānte sakhā mora banaku āsai |
ẏesaneka praśaṁsā ye sahadebaku kale hari
arjunahiṁ mane mane praśaṁsā uccāri |
śuṇa ho arjuna yāhā pachārili muhiṁ
lg.l: tahiṁra sandeśa mote na kahilu tuhi | (ja, tha)
yāhā se pāñcha bhāi āmbhe achuṁṭi sampādi | 127 |
nohile samasta bhasma yiba mohora trodheṇa | 130 |
seṭhāru brāhmaṇa ye keṇe hoile antara | 133 |
sahadeba mantrī kahithile tāhāṅku yeteka bidhāna | 135 |
śuṇi arjuna boile yoḍi beni karapatra
chāri baraṣa chaḍamāsa hoilāni tera dina
ẏete dina se biharili ye araṇya | 138 |
āu sāta baraṣa pāñchamāsa satara dina gale
śrīhari arjuna doheṁ tahiṁ karante bichāra
manda manda hasi ye kahanti catradhara | 140 |
āja ye caitra śukaḷa pakṣa traẏodaśī
mahā mahā bāruṇī yoga ye gaṅgāre paḍiacchi | 141 |
gaṅgāre snāhāna karantāiṁ ho paṇḍura santati | 142 |
ki rūpe āsibe ẏetheṁ dhabaḷa mūrati | 144 |
tāhaṅku ẏe kathā ki aṭai bicitra | 145 |
śrīhari boile se aṭanti aneka dūre
bhagīratha āṇithile se aṭanti aneka dūre
āna ke tāhāṅku ho āṇima arajuna
ẏehā śuṇi boile se pāṇḍura nandana | 147 |
tumbhe abā āṇi pāriba he dhanurjaẏe | 150 |
se kāḷe surataraṅga boli ẏeka śara

lg.note: dhanuhuḷe nārāja basāile āṇi | (ja, ṭa)
lg.l: se aghanāśinī ẏetheṁ āsi karantu bijaẏe
tumbhe āge thiba pache thibe māẏe | 155 |
niśvāsake caḷilā se tini sahasra yuṇa | 156 |
debīṅkara chāmure yāiṁ kara yoḍiṇa kahi
śuṇiṇa śara bāṇī mātā hr̥dare kale laẏe
hari arjuna ye achanti ẏeka sthāna
na gale hāde baḷe mote gheni yiba bāṇa | 160 |
mane mane guṇi se hoile triputi | 161 |
tumbhe āga hoi bāṭa kaḍhāa ho bāṇa
śara pache bije kale jagatara mātā | 164 |
pātāḷa bheda hoi bijaẏe kale yahuṁ
śveta kaḷpa nāme tahiṁ achai br̥ksabara
ro br̥kṣa troṭa madhyuṁ debī hoile bāhāra | 166 |
garuḍa ye snāhāna sārile tāhāṅkara tule
sandhyā tarpaṇe ye deba pitr̥ṅku jaḷa dile | 172 |
nadira nāma bīra turaṅga se dianti
boile surabhi tumbhe āmbha āgyāṁ śuṇa
mahā mahā bāruṇī ye paḍiba yebaṇa dina | 174 |
satya tretaẏā dvāpara kaḷi yuga chāri
ẏe śara āge thiba ahirūpa dhari | 175 |
abaśya bije debī karibuṁ śara pathe | 176 |
padma pāde paḍi debī kaleka bijaẏe
āpaṇā nija gr̥he prabeśa yāi hoẏe | 179 | | 606 |
lg.head: {@khāṇḍaba bana dahana@}

lg.l: arjunaku chāhiṁ se ye bolanti catrapāṇi | 1 |
śatr̥ mukhe bhāinta dei hoilu banagāmī | 2 |

lg.note: tu yebe banaku ho ailu phālaguni | (ga, gha, ca, ṭa, ṭha)
lg.l: ẏe śahasramāna mote dile yehara pābongtī
hastināre thile ye kāhuṁ ẏehānta pāānti | 4 |
gobinde boile tu ta niścinta hoilu
satya laṅhile prāṇīṅki mukati kāhiṁ acchi | 6 |
āmbhe yāhā kahilu tāhā laṅghibu kemante
brata pūrile draśana karibu yujheṣṭhi pādagate | 7 |
ludubudu byādhi śarīra ye diśai piḷohi
mahārogī śarīra ye dubongḷa acchi hoi | 9 |
khaṇḍe dūra āsai basai loci hoiṁ
aśakata śarīra chāli na pārai sehi | 10 |
dadarā chatā kāndhe pinddhacchi cchidra dhoti
kapāḷe rurddhva puṇḍri kākhe pīṛhā pothi
maḷīna uttarī kāndhe cchiṇḍā paitā goṭi | 11 |
pāñcha pahaṇḍa yāi bipra basai ye phuṭi | 13 |
arjuna boile svāmī ẏe dvāpara yuge
ẏeḍe baḍa daridra dekhilā nāhiṁ madhya svarge | 15 |
śarīa aśakata dvija na pārai chāli
roga prabaḷa deha bipra na pārai kathā boli | 16 |

div.note: atīẏa = atība |

lg.l: ki dei toṣibā svāmī āmbhe ẏe biprabaraku | 17 |
kara prasāri yāiṁ ubhā hoile chāmure
beda dhuni śabada ye karai susvare | 18 |
bolai dvijabara tumbhe kṣatriẏa parama yogī
muhiṁ daridra brāhmaṇa ābara hoili baḍa rogī | 21 |
daridre debā dāna aṭai aneka puṇyamāna
śira ccchedanākāḷe ye prāṇīṅki rakṣā kari | 23 |
para dukhe kātara ye puṇya ātmā dehī | 25 |
sehi se mahātmā aṭai dharma ye debatā | 26 |
tumbhanta bābhiẏe muṁ na pārili cihni
ẏeka mūrtti prāẏe tumbhe diśuacha beni | 27 |
muhiṁ daridra brāhmaṇa aṭai baḍa rogī
mote kāraṇa kale bahuta dharma bhāgi | 28 |
āmbhe beni goṭi bhāi aṭuṁ banacara | 29 |

div.note: akāraṇaku kāraṇ akale dharma tāhāku rakhi | [ṅa, ṭa, ḍa, ḍha]
badyakārī = baidya |
saṅgoṣṭā = saṅga karibā |
bābhiẏe = sammāna sūcaka sambodhana |

lg.l: brāhmaṇa boile muhiṁ daridra abā boli
tumbhara tahiṁki dhana drabya basramāna māgi ta na aili | 30 |
ẏehāku bhala kale acchini mora jīiṁbā upāẏe | 31 |
baḍa ookara purtra muṁ aṭai baḍa jaṇa
bañchita na galā mora kapāḷara ghaṭitā | 33 |
trodheṇa brāhmaṇa bolai gada gada bāṇī
ẏeka laẏe kari śuṇai kṣatrī śiromaṇi
arjuna boile mohora śarīra kampai ẏe tohora beda dhuni śuṇi | 35 |
kisa dāna tumbhe māgiba māgani paṇḍāẏe
kemante nirmaḷa hoiba tumbhara nija kāẏe | 36 |
śaṅkha goṭi kāṛhi kamaṇḍaḷuṁ pūroile pāṇi
pāthara hastare brāhmaṇa bege dile āṇi | 37 |
āho saṅkaḷpa kale se dāna de pāri
aṇa saṅkaḷpe dāna dile se kāhiṁki nohe sari | 38 |
beda ādhyāna kari bipra taḷa hasta pātiacchi | 40 |
bākya mantra paḍhāi pātilā taḷe hasta

div.note: dvādaśa bede nirjita muṁ aṭai brāhmaṇa | [ḍa, ḍha]
meṇṭaṇa tana galā mora karmara ghatitā | (ṭa, ḍa, ḍha)
trodheṇa brāhmaṇa ye karai beda dhuni
arjuna boile śarīra na sahai taba bākya śuṇi | [ga, ñja]
ẏekādaśa beda = chāribeda, ṣaṛaśāstra o śiśubedara samaṣṭi |

lg.l: satya satya bākya karāi satya bhābe
brāhmaṇa sākṣī karai sanakādi ābara daśa biśvedebā
muhiṁ ye dāna māguacchi tumbhe sākṣī hoithibā | 44 |
māga ho paṇḍāẏe sākṣīre kisa acchi | 45 | mahābākya uccāri bipra karai bedadhuni
svarga mañcha pātāḷa kampilā bhmabana tini | 46 |
brāhmaṇa boilā tu śuṇa ho arajuna
mote dāna debuṁ khāṇḍaba nāme bana | 47 |
mote roga prabaḷa ye ludubudu byādhi
dātabya lokaṅku niṣṭhura karanti se puṇi | 50 |
dekhila ṭili bho svāmī bhikṣukara carita
tr̥tīẏa brāhmaṇa aṭai hāde baśyānara agni | 53 |
tini yuga hoilāni ẏe karichanti tote āśa | 54 |
lg.note:
pothi biśeṣare chāri megha, chāri diga, satāiśa nakṣatra, astukāra
puruṣa, dharmadebatā mahīāḷī o daśa digapāḷaṅku sākṣī karithibāra barṇṇanā
dekhāyāe |
debayāẏe prate na yāānti se puṇi | )ṅa, jha)

lg.l: agni daibata boli kemante jāṇila gosāiṁ
ẏehi agniṅkara sakāśuṁ tote banabāsa hoilā | 57 |
ẏehi agni debatā ye māẏārūpa hoi
yujheṣṭhiṅki āṇa boli tote kaṭāḷile yāiṁ | 58 |
māẏā na jāṇi tu antapure paśanteṇa
ẏeṇe agni debatā antarddhāna hoileka puṇa | 59 |
agni debatāṅku ẏe byādhi helā kāhiṁ | 61 |
tebe sinā bhrānti manaru mora phiṭiba bahana | 62 |
śrīraṅga adhare manda manda ye hasanti | 63 |
āho bhābānī nāmeṇa ye ẏekai satya yuge
apāra ghr̥ta khāile śveta rājāra yajñe | 64 |
aneka ghr̥ta khāi tahiṁ ẏe hoile mandāagni
ludubudu byādhi hoilā basile yuga tini | 65 |
aṭa ki gosāiṁ tumbhe agni daibata | 66 |
bolanti dvijabara āmbhe dohorā agni aṭuṁ
apāda śānti nimante āmbhe binaẏa bhābe khaṭuṁ | 67 |
arjuna boile tumbhe anādi siddha yogī
keuṁṇa pātake tumbhe hoila ẏeḍe rogī | 68 |
lg.note: aṭa ki mahātmā tumbhe agni daibata | (ña, ṭa, ṭha, ḍa, ḍha)
lg.l: śuṇa ho bīra pātha bolanti baśyānara
satya yuge śveta boli ẏekai nr̥pabara | 69 |
mahāyajña nimane pitāra tahiṁki galā rāẏe bege
binaẏa bhāba hoi prehita jaṇe māge | 71 |
bho deba bidhātā mote prasanna hoibā
debayajña karibi mote prohita jaṇe debā | 72 |
baśiṣṭha thile se ye pitāmahaṅka agrate
pitāẏe boile śvetarājāra yajña kara yā’ ucite | 73 |
ābarttaka sambarttaka droṇa puṣkara śrohā prokṣaṇī
yāgyaṁ kuṇḍe baraṣanti śagaḍa tumba jāṇi | 75 |
ghr̥ta sañchā samidha bhiāa yāgyaṁ sari kari
ghr̥ta samudraku karilā dvādaśa baraṣa sebā | 77 |
māga śveta rājā ho kisa ādhyāna tohora | 78 |
bho deba ratnākar muṁ karibi debayāgyaṁ
muhiṁ yāga karibi deba caubiṁśa baraṣa pariyante
baśiṣṭhaṅka prokṣaṇī pūroi ghr̥ta deuthibu nitye | 80 |
lg.note: tumba :– {@1. The cogged whell belonging to a water wheel. 2. The nave of a wheel. 3. A dam across a river.@}

śrohā :– śroho, śroo, svāhā, surā, sroa prabhr̥ti bhinna bhinna
pāṭha sr̥ba arthare bibhinna pothire byabahr̥ta |
lg.l: ghr̥ta samudra boilā tote yeteka aṇṭai
ākāśa gaṅgā kūḷe bhūmiki cirile śūḷe
puṣa māsa yāiṁ ye māgha māsa paśilā
jaṭi haṭī baṭī ye ābara parkaṭī
ẏe chāri br̥kṣa hoile ye dvāra aḍā chāri goṭi | 87 |
ẏe chāriheṁ baraṇa hoile chāri diga | 88 |
tridaṇḍa gheni yāgyaṁ kuṇḍa nirbhā kale | 90 |
makara māsa kr̥ṣṇa pakṣa tr̥tīẏā ye tithi
baba nāme karaṇa prīti nāme yoga
dutiẏa dibase sampada tāra yoga acchi | 93 |
lg.note: baśiṣṭha prohite mote kaleka anurāga | (ñja, ṭa, ṭha, ḍa, ḍha)
bāmadeba uddāḷaka sumanta gārgaba | (ḍa, ḍha)
lg.l: bāmadeba uddāḷaka sumanta gautama | (jha, ñja, ṭha)
tāra bara nakṣatra yoga śubha anakūḷe
sedina yāgaśāḷe basile māhendra yoga beḷe | 94 |
ghr̥ta samuduṁ āṇī yāgyaṁ kuṇḍe baraṣi | 96 |
śagaḍa tumba ākāre baraṣanti chāri dhāra
biśrāma nāhiṁ rātra dibasa aṣṭa ye prahara | 97 |
āmbhe brāhmaṇa aṭuṁ daridra manda jāti
bābu ẏemante caubiṁśa baraṣa pariyante mahāyāgyaṁ kalā
lobheṇa khāiluṁ āmbhe aneka ye ghr̥ta
kāḷe pāra kari nuāriluṁ hoilu ẏemanta | 100 |
brahmā īśvare ye boile mora pāiṁ
bābu deba danaba ye saburi garbhe thāuṁ
ye yāhā ādhāra karai samasta āmbhe dahuṁ | 104 |
ludubudu hoi basileni brahmāṇḍa khaṇḍa tini | 105 |
āmbhaṅku tu yebe uddhari dharibuṁ dhanurjaẏe

div.note: chārimegha rātra dibasa baraṣile | [cha, ḍa, ḍha]

[agni debatā nijara paricaẏa debā pare nijaku puṇi daridr
brāhmaṇa boli kahibā asaṅgata mane hue |]

lg.l: yābata candra arke rahu tora kaicchā | 107 |
satyayuga satara lakṣa aṭhāiśi sahasra baraṣa
tretā yuga bāralakṣa chaẏāṇoi sahasra baraṣa | 108 |
dvāpara yuga āṭhalakṣa cauṣaṭhī sahasra baraṣa bhoga
pāra kari na pāriluṁ āmbhe mandāagni piḷohi roga | 109 |
uddhara arjuna mote muhiṁ tini yugara rogī
āmbhara āṣya gheni tu brata chālayibā begi | 110 |
ẏete boli agni debatā aneka kārtuṇya
uddhari dhara sabongsācī tu paṇḍukuḷa dhanya | 111 |
arjuna boile deba uṭha uṭha bege hari
khāṇḍaba bana yāẏeṁ yibāṭi bije kari | 112 |
jagannāthe boile āmbhe na thāuṁ tora tule
indra apakhyāti deba nā āmbhanta dekhile | 113 |
se bāsaba debatā tohora tāta tu tāhāra suta
āmbhaṅku dekhile se kopa kariba surapati
tote kicchi na boli āmbhanta se deba apakhyāti | 115 |
bhalā āmbhe tuku nemāku ailu hastināku
khāṇḍaba bana dahane tote na sahibe suradebā
indrare bibādī tu houchuṁṭi re bābā | 118 |
ẏe te kahi khageśvara piṭhire kale bije
khāṇḍaba bana dahane kopa karibe sunāśīra | 120 |

div.note: kaicchā = kakṣā |

lg.l: muhiṁ dahana karibi sinā tohora teja gheni | 203 |
megha baraṣanti ki basaba āgyāṁ pāi | 205 |
jaḷahiṁ se dapra mohora gañjai turite | 206 |
tāhātahuṁ dr̥ḍha kari thibuṭi mote rakhi
sukhe mauṣadhimāna yehne pārai muṁ bhakṣi | 207 |
pacchījantumāne yehne uḍi na yānti gagana mārge
tāhāṅku nārājamāna bindhu thibuṭi begeṁ begem | 208 |
kīṭa pataṅga ye pimpudi ādi kari
kehi goṭiẏe ẏethuṁ na yibeṭi uburi | 209 |
tebe se dilā dharma hoibaṭi tohāra
ẏete dr̥ḍha karāi arjuna ku deba baśyānara
aneka kāḷara śukhilā patra acchi tahiṁ paḍi
lāgilā anaḷa debatā mahāteja mr̥tti dhari | 213 |
bāmpīru pāṇi āṇi pūroile ratna ghaṭe
agni ḍāka dile mote rakha rakha ho sabongsācī
tohora oprodha kale āna kehu pārai rakhi | 216 |

div.note: jaḷahiṁ se darpa mohora bhāñjai yugate | (cha, jña, ṭa, ka)
kāmarupī = icchāmaẏa śarīra |

lg.l: jaṇake daśa nārāja binddhale bāsabara bāḷe | 217 |
paḷāi na pārile samaste male poḍi | 220 |
daśa marbhmata tahiṁ ye thile toṭāḷamāna
jaṇeheṁ kehi na uburi hoile dahana | 222 |
nāradaṅku dekhi pātha āstāna teji uṭhi
nārada boile tu ye bāsabara bāḷa |
indra debatāra ye aṭai khāṇḍaba nāme bana |
aneka mauṣadhi acchi ẏe houcchi dahana | 227 |
arjun aboile muṁ aṭai kisa doṣī
ẏeteka bacana śuṇi caḷile kaḷaha priẏā

div.note: nārada boile tu ye bāsabara bāḷā
ākāśara sampada nāśa karuchu asaṅkhoḷā | (kha, ṅa, jha, ṭa, ḍa, ḍha)
amara biḷāsuṇī khaṭanti bāsabara sannidhāne | (ḍa, ḍha)

lg.l: āstāne thāiṁṇa ye bolai deba indra | 231 |
śarīra ta pallabita houcchi dibya bāse | 232 |
agni debata dahana karuacchi tohora ye toṭā
dhāaṁre nandane mora airābata bege sāja | 235 |
āre toṭāḷe ye achanti daśa marbhmate

div.note: chāridige dhaiṁle bāsabara putamāna | (kh, ga, gha, ja, cha)
sunāśīra = indra, sunāsīra madhya heba |

lg.l: pakānti agnire ye mahā mahā baḷiṣṭhe | 246 |
rakha ho arjuna boli ḍakile baśyānare
arjjuna śuṇilā tā thāiṁ jagatī upare | 247 |
sukheṇa agni dahana karāi khāṇḍaba ye bana
chāri meghanti rāi āgyāṁ dileka maghabāna | 250 |
chāri meghe yāiṁ baraṣiba khāṇḍaba bana toṭāra | 251 |
samudr̥ṁ pāṇi toḷi āṇile daṇḍa sāji | 252 |
meghe baraṣile mohora kāryya nohilāka kicchi | 254 |
baśyānaraṅkara ẏesaneka bacana śuṇiṇa bīra phālaguni
kopeṇa bīra peṣilā manabhedī nārāja gheni | 255 |
khāṇḍaba banayāka sabu kalā śara pīḍā | 256 |
uṇeiśa sahasra yojana se khāṇḍaba nāme bana
śare śare pīḍā kari chāilā arajuna | 257 |
beni tāḷa bahaḷa ye hoilā śarapīḍa

div.note: kārmuka ghaṭa prāẏe uṭhile caukati | (gha, ca, ja)
jīmūta ghaṭa prāẏe uṭhile caukati | (jha, ña)
uṇeiśa sahasa se yojana āẏatana | (ka, ṭa)

lg.l: uṇeiśa sahasra yojana aṭai yeuṁṇa bana
byāghra bhalluka hāthī ghoḍā maiṁṣi gaṇḍā śārddoḷa
paḷāi nuārile ẏe jantuẏe bhakṣilā anaḷa | 263 |
surusuriā godhi majura kāka baka ādi kari | 266 |
śārī śuā kaṅkī nepāḷī mūṣā pāṇikuā

div.note:
‘paḷāi na āsile ẏe jantuẏe bhakṣilā anaḷa’–pare ‘ṭha’ra
adhika pāṭha :–
bāhuṭiā hariṇa ye mr̥ga ādi kari
kukura gadha bhalluka ye gaganachārī |
barāha oṭa śambara kaṭāśa baḷiā
śāḷiāpatanī śaśā kaṅki ye biluā |
nepāḷī mūṣā markaṭa kambhāṭuā ādi
mūṣika sarpa mārjara banagoru godhi |
pakṣī juntuẏe aneka baṇi śārī śuā
asāraḷiā gobarā kuā pāṇikuā |
pacchī = pakṣī |

lg.l: kāduā cakuā cakoi caḍhei jhīṅka ye maẏura
guṇḍuri ādi oibharā kāṭhagumpā karata poka | 273 |
pāṁjorī pāreẏā haṁsa karakaṭrī trikūṭa pāti śūā

div.note: pūbong pr̥ṣṭhāra abaśiṣṭa pāṭhāntara :–
kanaka rekhā kaṣarā pāṇḍarā caḍhei
sātabhāiā bhuiṁā ye kocilākhāi |
guṇḍurī majura rājahiṁsa bhadaḷiā
ābara ye rājabaṇi pakṣī bharatiā |
sarasa kajaḷapātī titirī ye pakṣī
pāṇipiā jaḷaphimpi hemāñchaḷ apakṣī |
bālihaṇā kāṭhahaṇā haraḍa caḍhei
guñjarabaḍhiākāṅka cakuā cakoi
kokuā kukuḍā vbaka mcharaṅkā jhīṅka
bāduri gharacaṭiā pakṣī kāṇṭibaka |
haḷadībasanta guhukāḷikā bāiā
pāṭa bhāliā nāraṅgī pakīṣī kākatuā |
gaṅgāi ḍubāi ādi yete paśu pakṣī
samastagku hutāśana yāuchanti bhakṣi |

lg.l: paṅkakhāi caḍhei gaṅgāi ḍubāi ādi yete paśu pakṣī | 279 |
garuḍapakṣī śaśāpakṣī gaja bihaṅgama ādi kari
khāṇḍaba bana dahane kehi na gale uburi | 280 |
agni dāka dianti bābu galāṭi dhanurjaẏe | 281 |
agni debatāṅkara ye triputi mana bāñcchu | 283 |
bāhuḍi ye meghamāna kahile indraṅka agrata | 285 |
svāmī agni debatāṅkara doṣa nāhiṁ kicchi
bīrabara goṭiẏe khāṇḍaba bana dahana karuacchi | 286 |
toṭāyāka śarapīḍa kalā se gagana maṇḍaḷe | 287 |

div.note:
‘agni ḍaka dianti bābu galāṭi dhanurjaẏe’ –pare keteka
pothira adhika pāṭha :–
ẏemante jībajantu achanti aneka
ṭhika ṭhika kari kahili siddha sāroḷā bakya |
se māheśvariṅkara caraṇe mora sebā
śudramuni sāroḷa dāsaku gati mukti debā | (ka, ga, gha, ca, cha, ja)
bāhuḍi meghamāne ye kahile puruhūta | (ka, kha, ḍa, ḍha)
jaḷa udyāne = jaḷa uparaku uṭhibā |

lg.l: debe dānabe tāhāra deba asaṅkhya mahimā
indra debatāẏe boile kāhāra muṁ nuhai bairi
ẏehi khāṇḍaba bana ta sabugkari hitakārī | 289 |
śrībhmaje ajaṅga dhanu dhari bijaẏe airābate | 290 |
abaśya māribi yadi huanti digapāḷa tini | 291 |
aneka mauṣadhi agni debatā āpyāna ye kari
mandāagni ludubudu byādhi bhala hoilā tāhari | 292 |
tini lakṣa yojanaku bikāśai agniṅkara śikhā | 293 |
tini lakṣa yojana pariyante mahāanaḷa teja
svāmī ẏekā arjuna tora toṭā kalā nāśa | 298 |
bāsaba boile ho jāṇi ta nuārili
arjuna abā na jāṇaiṁ mohora toṭā boli | 299 |
ẏe chārinta rāi āgyāṁ dile suradebā | 300 |
āre āre tumbhe arjunara āgare kaha yāiṁ
boliba pitāra toṭā tora dahuchu kisa pāiṁ | 301 |
dakṣiṇa bhāge yāiṁ arjunaku pucchā kari | 302 |
bābu tu kimpāire dahuachu ẏe khāṇḍaba bana
agni debatā aṭanti ye aśānti atriputi
tu āḍehua āmbhe nibāuṁ agni jyoti | 304 |
mote dāna māgilā ye agni daibate | 305 |
ẏethira pāiṁ se mote na bolanti debarāja
nāsti kale ẏethi pāibe baḍa lāja | 306 |
ẏehā śuṇi bidyādhare boile tu indrare bibādī
putra hoi nāśa karuachuṁ pitāra sampradhi | 307 |
ẏehikṣaṇi arjuna tu ye hoibu prāṇatyāja | 308 |
arjuna boile tubhe beḷuṁ beḷa karuacha abhāba
mohora dosa nāhiṁṭi tumbhe agnipāna hoiba | 309 |
muhiṁ tumbhanta na cihnai tumbhe pitāra hua ki ki
agna debatā māgile muṁ tumbhanta na parai rakhi | 310 |
mānaba chāra hoi tu ẏeḍe gabong kahu re | 311 |
kopeṇa binddhalā ye lāghaba śasra gheni | 313 |
kāḷāntaka śara ye bhedile dehe yāiṁ
arjuna kopae tohora chāri putre nāśa gale | 315 |

div.note: mohora doṣa nāhiṁṭi tumbhe samaste nāśayiba | (ka, ga, gha, ja, ṭha)
nimañjāi = nibujāi |

lg.l: śuṇiṇa biṣāda ye hele deba ākhaṇḍaḷa
āja re pāṇḍabā tohora pūroibi kāḷa | 316 |
arjuna katire yāiṁ prabeśa ati bega | 137 |
bāñcchā prāpata hou sabong kāryya hou siddhi
yahā bañcchā karu prāpata hou bolai jambhobhedī | 319 |
bābu kimpe dahana karuchuṁ mohora khāṇḍaba bana | 320 |
bābu satya yuge biṣṇu pāile prābhaba
ākāśagaṅgā kūḷe ye khāṇḍaba nāme bana
debatāṅka tīrtha yātrā ucchaba ẏehu sthāna | 324 |
agni debatā mote karāile dāna bākya | 325 |
kapaṭe māgile mote brāhmaṇa rūpa dhari
kisa māgiba boli mūṁ jāṇi satya kali | 326 |
taḷa hāthe māgile muṁ upara hāthe dāna dili
ẏemanta boliṇa ye satya muhiṁ kali | 327 |
satya karāi mote māgile khāṇḍaba bana
muhiṁ na yāṇaiṁ ẏe tumbhara madhubana | 328 |
kaṣṭi dijabara boli satya muhiṁ kali
agniṅkara carita muhi jāṇi ta nuārili | 329 |

div.note: śuṇiṇa kopa kale deba ākhaṇḍaḷa | (ḍa, ḍha)
bābusatyayuge biṣṇura sambhabong | (ḍa, ḍha)
campāi = ṭipāi bā ati byagrare |

lg.l: bāsaba boile tu yebe satya kalu bāḷi
bābu drāhmaṇa hoi ẏe atīẏa baḍa lobhī
ye ẏehaku āhāra diai se tāhāku parābhabi | 331 |
bābu khāile atriputi dileṇa na sujhi
pr̥thīyāka pāile se śānti ye na bhaji | 332 |
bābu dharma arthe śveta rājā deba yāgyaṁ kalā
ghr̥ta samodrayāka āṇi yāgyaṁ kuṇḍe baraṣilā | 333 |
prati śate yojana ye aṭai pratakṣa | 334 |
gabhīra śate yojana ye aṭai pramāṇa
yāga kuṇḍa ẏepari ye aṭai bhiāṇa | 335 |
meghanta śroovā prokṣaṇī kari biśiṣṭa baraṣilā
ghr̥ta samodrayāka bhakṣilā se aṭe ẏeḍe lobhī
mote āsiṇa māgilā ye agnirāja mauṣadhi
rāgeṇa boili tora na tuṭai kinā byādhi | 338 |
brahmāgku bābu ẏe satyayuge toḷāi se ye āṇilā mora tahiṁ
tebe bi khaṇḍiẏe mauṣadhi na dilaiṁ muhiṁ | 339 |
tāhāṅku bacana meṇṭili se bāhuḍiṇa galā | 341 |
candra baruṇa kubera br̥haspati ādi kari
bābu ẏete kāḷe āsi tote pāilā bharasā
puṇi tote dāna māgi pūroilā manīṣā | 343 |

div.note: sārikṣa = samāna
= śroovā = śr̥ba, kintu ẏe sthānare praṇītā hebā ucita |

lg.l: ẏeka kīṭa pataṅga goṭiẏe yebe antara hoiyāiṁ
tuhi se pārthiba bhārathe bhāroi malla
pāṣāṇa rekha hoibanā ẏe tohora bola | 347 |
binddhalā nārāja pātha gāṇḍīma dhanu ṭāṇi | 348 |
indra boile tu dilu khāilāta agni
saṅkaḷpa pūrilāta ẏebe yāa tu phālaguni | 350 |
muṁhi agniṅki libhāibi śuṇa hoa arajuna
kathā na ruhāa svāmī bāhuḍi ẏetheṁ yibā | 353 |
arjuna hātha dhari paśile khāṇḍaba bana bhitara | 354 |
bābu yebaṇa yebaṇa padārthamāna heucchi dahija
tāhā tote cihnāi debā re ātmaja | 355 |
bābu rāma rābaṇa yuddha hoilā tretaẏā yugare

div.note: tu ye satyabādī aṭubhorāi malla |

lg.l: aṣṭādaśa padma bānara padīle sanya akaḷanā | 358 |
bābu patra goṭiẏe āsi ẏethuṁ hanumanta nele
pabana āḍe patra gaḷile samaste jībana pāile | 359 |
bābu lakṣe śira rābaṇa ye upujilā
śūḷa śakati gheni se lakṣmaṇaku māilā | 360 |
aneka rukṣa haribaḷa gheni paḍilā lakṣmaṇa
tāra mūḷuṁ hanu nelā śikaḍa pāṇi phuṭi | 362 |
pañchāśa kāṭhi sanya gheni lakṣmaṇa uṭhi brati | 363 |
se śara bāji lakṣmaṇa ye paḍilāka kṣiti | 365 |
ābara āsa bābu dekhāi bāsu br̥kṣa goṭiẏe
bābu hanumanta ẏethu puṣya goṭiẏeka nelā
se himati acchi se ye amaḷāna puṣya goṭi
gandha āmodante samasteheṁ sanya brati uṭhi | 370 |

div.note: aṣṭādaśapadma bānara paḍile na yāi gaṇanā | (kha, cha, ja, ṭa)
aṣṭādaśapadma bānara paḍile na galā kaḷanā | (ña, ta)
rābāẏaṇa = rāmāẏaṇara prācīna praẏoga |

lg.l: sahaśre śira rābaṇa puṇa harinelā sītā
rābaṇa tule puddha kale lakṣmaṇa raghunāthā | 373 |
puṇi hanumanta mauṣadhi nemāku ailā ẏethaku
prāṇatāraṇa boli ẏe br̥kṣa nāma heṭi | 376 |
bābu hanumanta ẏethuṁ cheli khaṇḍiẏe nelā
yete dūre pabana lāgai roga byādhi na pārai sinā | 378 |
bābu br̥ddhanāśenī boli ẏeka br̥ṣa goṭiẏe
pācilā keśa kañchā hoai ẏethuṁ piile pāṇi phuṭiẏe | 379 |
bābu roganāśanī boli ẏe br̥kṣa mauṣadhi
ẏethuṁ pāṇi piile tuṭai bātapita śaḷisamā nānā byādhi | 380 |
bābu yuganāśana boli ẏehu br̥kṣa goṭi
snāhāna kari pāṇi piiba pāṇi phuṭi | 381 |
ẏekā yoge pāna kale chāriyuge bratai | 382 |
bābu ẏe br̥kṣa goṭi ye santāna udyāna
ẏethuṁ phāḷa goṭiẏe bhakṣiba tuḷa saṁkarānti dina | 383 |

div.note: śaḷisamā = śḷeṣmā |

lg.l: śarīre lepana kariba ẏethira mūḷa bāṭi | 385 |
janme janme nohai se garbha kaṣṭi
ẏethira pāṇi piile huai putra goṭi | 386 |
gaḷitakoṣṭha byādhi yāẏe ẏehāra prasāde phiṭi
nānā roga nāśai ẏethira khāile bakaḷa goṭi | 387 |
śate bhāra nitye tahiṁ kanaka puṣya phuti | 388 |
bābu anaḷa amr̥ta boli br̥kṣaṅkara nāma
anaḷe na poḍai ẏehā śarīre kale lepana | 389 |
bābu bāḷataruṇa boli kari ẏeka br̥kṣagoṭiẏe
akṣaẏa tr̥tīẏā dina bhakṣiba patra goṭiẏe | 390 |
paciśa baraṣa prāẏe se puruṣa diśai | 391 |
bābu mohana boli kari ẏeka latā goṭi
kṣīra khaṇḍiẏe ẏethuṁ kapāḷe debā phuṭi | 392 |
deba dānabanta ādi kari samasta mohi hoi | 393 |
bābu bindudhāraṇa boli kari ẏeka br̥kṣa goṭi
śikhaḍa khaṇḍiẏe ẏethuṁ kariba bida goṭi | 394 |
se puruṣa tahuṁ amoha reta na khasiba | 395 |
bābu ẏe br̥kṣa goṭi ye kāminībasanta
ẏethiruṁ kṣīra ṭopiẏe nārī lagāibe kapāḷe
bābu uddāḷeka boli ye ẏeka br̥kṣa goṭiẏe

div.note: aputrika paṇa (bedana doṣa) phiṭai yuga sāta | (ga, ja, ḍa)

lg.l: se puṣya diśai ye bāḷa arka prāẏe
debatāẏe tapa karanti ẏe amaḷāna br̥kṣara taḷa | 400 |
bābu siddhakaḷpa boli ẏeka br̥kṣa goṭiẏe
tuḷa saṁkarānti dina ẏethuṁ piibā pāṇi phuṭiẏe | 401 |
bhoka śoka mūtra maḷa byādhi na lāgai bādhā | 402 |
āre bābu arjuna dahana karāilu ẏehu bana
bābu yeteka dahana hoibāra ta hoilā
tu ẏebe ẏethuṁ antara hoi yāa phālaguni
muhiṁ libhāibi āu bana na dhaṁsu bahani | 405 |
bābure aśī lakṣa br̥ṣa ẏethi achai candana
tini marbhmata achai agara hāde puṇa | 406 |
bābu kasturī juāda aneka chanti jība
ẏemāna acchi re bābu jāṇa daśa khabong | 407 |
arjuna pranapatya hoilā bāsabara bola śuṇi
svāmī badhira śuṇai ki kamburasa bāṇī | 408 |
bho deba mohora beḷe nuhai kicchi kāryya
agni debatāṅku yāiṁ tusti karibā debarāja | 409 |
dekhile agnira teja diśai dibya prabhā | 410 |
jaẏa tu jaẏa tu baśyānara kāḷānaḷa anaḷa
jaẏa tu jaẏa tu deba mahā piṅgaḷa jāḷa | 413 |
jaẏa tu jaẏa tu deba mahā bhīṣmarūpī
jaẏa tu jaẏa tu deba mahā biśvabyāpī | 414 |
jaẏa tu jaẏa tu deba mahā jyoti anaḷa
jaẏa tu jaẏa tu deba dahana saẏaḷ a| 415 |
jaẏa tu jaẏa tu deba aśānti amūrtti
jaẏa tu jaẏa deba upana hasta jyoti | 416 |
jaẏa tu jaẏa tu baśyānara aṭukāmarūpī
jaẏa tu jaẏa tu nuhasi baḍa kopī | 417 |
jaẏa tu jaẏa deba sakaḷa pure paśu
thāpita drabyanta tuhi se karu dhūḷi pāṁśu | 418 |
deba dānabe ye mānaba ādi kari
ādi karmeṇa ye thāpita deba tuhi
ye tote thāpai tāhāku tuhi mohi | 420 |
dakṣa yāgyaṁ kalā dekhilā tohora teja mr̥tti
ḍareṇa svāhā svadhā kanyā tote dilā prajāpati | 421 |
ẏemante pāra ye na galā yāgyaṁkāḷe

div.note: indra debatā praṇapatya hoiṇa tusti kale | (ḍa, ḍha)
thapita thāpanā deba tuhi sinā dhaṁsu | (ṅa, jha)
pāpī puruṣamānaṅku tuhi sinā dhaṁsu | (ja, ḍa, ḍha)
ye tote thāpai tāhāku tuhi dahi | (bahu pāṭha)
umāra jhiṁghāse tote kopile suḍhaḷe | (ḍa, ḍha)
bhīṣarūpī = biśvarūpī |

lg.l: kopeṇa prajāpati ye dilā tote śāpya
yāa tu khāra pāuṁśare hoithāa gopya | 423 |
citā anaḷe tuhi se praṇa teja
akhāija khāija sabu karu tu dahijya | 424 |
samasta dahana nātha tuhi se ẏeka śūrā | 426 |
śubha aśubhe abhaẏa maṅgaḷa tuhi nāthā
gyāna dhyāna deba sakaḷa tuhi cintā | 427 |
sakaḷa dahija karu sakaḷa garbhe bāsa | 428 |
sakaḷa darpa dhaṁsibāku tuhi se aṭu ādi | 429 |

div.note: samasta dahijya nātha tuhi se ẏeka khorā | (ghā, cha)
ādi anādi tu praḷaẏa tarāsa | (ḍa, ḍha)
paramabrahma puruṣa rudra candra sūryya anādi | (ga, ṭa, ṭha,)
akhāija = akhadya |

div.head: {@indra arjuna yuddha@}

lg.l: śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti
diguṇa teje byāpilā se mauṣadhira āpyāne
agnira aśānti dekhi kopa kale maghabāna
brahma daibata puruṣa hoi tora aśānti ẏesana | 3 |
mohora binaẏa yebe na ghenilu bhagati
ābara kāhā bole tuhi hoibu śānti mūrtti | 4 |
dāridrya paṇe tora sabongdā dina yāu | 5 |
āre āre agni chārabaḷe ki mohora toṭā hoẏe dhaṁsi
tini yuga hoilā ludubudu byādhi hoiacchi basi | 7 |
āre tu ye yathārthe aṭunā mohora bairi
tu se nāśakalu mora ākāśara śirī | 8 |
tohora mukha chāhiṁ sarilā mora buddhi
kahuṁ kahuṁ kopa ye baḍhilā jaẏobhedī | 10 |

div.note: ehi padaṭhāru chapābahi ‘ṭha’re adhika pāṭha –
śuṇa baibasuta manu badanti agasti
ākhaṇḍaḷa kale yahuṁ ẏesaneka stuti |
praṇāma kari śoile agni padataḷa
kebeheṁ nohilā śānta sehi kāḷānaḷa |
jambhobhedī = indra |

lg.l: āre putra hoi ẏeḍe baḍa duṣṭapaṇa kale
pātaka na lāagai se putranta nāśakale | 11 |
buddhi harāile tāta ābara kisa ye upāẏe | 12 |
āja re pāṇḍabā tora pūrilāni kāḷa | 13 |
śatr̥paṇa yebe tuhi kalu re phālaguni
tote nāśa kale se nibhāibi bahani | 15 |
agni debatāẏe arjunaku deichanti bajra mudugara goṭi
bāsabara bajra arjunara dehe paḍigalā tuṭi | 16 |
takṣaṇe ajaṅga dhanu indra ye dhaile bāma hāthe | 17 |
abicchanne bāṇa ye paḍai arjuna upara
bajraghoṭa sehnāre paḍi samaste hoile cūra | 19 |
arjuna nāma dhari ḍāka dile baśyānare
bhūmiki bindhilā bīra nārāja lakṣe tini | 21 |
sarpa maṇḍukī indr̥re ye bimbare paśuthile
arjuna śaraghāte aignireṇa samaste cchiḍiṇa paḍile | 22 |
arjuna boilā tāta na kara samara | 23 |
pitā putre ki samara beḷeka yāa ghuñchi
toṭā dhaṁsa galāni ābara kisa kāryya acchi | 24 |
bāsaba boile re tote nāśa kale
pitābadha doṣa hāde na lāgaiṭi muku | 27 |
ẏeteka boliṇa se ye bāsabara baḷā
gāṇḍīma dhanu dhariṇa se teja anargaḷā | 28 |
ātreṣi bindilā tāhā se bīra phālaguni | 29 |
bāsabara tule aneka gandhabong ye thile
tāhā dekhi bāsaba debatā bindhile oprodha chāḍi | 31 |
mahā bhīṣmarūpe bhedile ye arjunara kāẏe | 32 |
brahmāṇḍa andhāra hoilā se kāḷakr̥tāntaka tejamūrtti gheni | 33 |
sādhu mahimā tāta tumbhara aṭai dhani dhani | 34 |
bāsaba debatāku trāsa lāgilā tāhā dekhi
pr̥thībhedi śara māilā bāsaba oprodha upekhi | 36 |
uḍai nārāj aye bijuḷi teja jāṇi

div.note: muku = mote |
nimijjile = nimagna hele |

lg.l: pitā putra samara ye hoilā mahāghora | 41 |
bāsaba debatā yahuṁ dekhile samara abiśrāma
śatasahasra baḷa dhanu dhari ubhā arjunara āga | 43 |
āre re pāṇḍabā boli uccasvare ḍaki
arjunara prāṇatyāja heuacchi tumbhe digapāḷamāne hoithāa sākhi | 44 |
sahasre nārāja pūroi teja anargaḷa jāṇi
ākāśa sampradhi sariba mote trailokye hoiba bāci | 46 |
yebaṇa śara gheni deba andheka bidhaṁsilā | 47 |
se śara gheni ṇa peṣai phālaguni

div.note: arjunara prāṇatyāja heuacchi tumbhe digapāḷamāne hoithāa
sākhi, pare “kha” pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
bāruṇāśara dhanure basāilā bega,
mantra sumari peṣilā aṅgārapannaṅga |
śabada kalā yehne megha ghaḍaghaḍi,
bajra samāna doi arjuna aṅge paḍi,
durgā bibhūti arjuna aṅge acchi boḷi,
teṇu śasra dehe tāra na pārilā gaḷi |
tāhā dekhi kope ye boilā sabongsācī,
amara nāśa karibi ke tāhā pāriba rakhi |
sampradhi = samr̥ddhi |

lg.l: jaẏasena boilā svamī sāṁgrāme āsi paḍilā sandeha
ẏeṇe baśyānara hāka dianti śuṇa ho phālaguni
śuṇi kari nārāja bindhilā bīra pātha
ẏehāra nandana ye takṣaka nāme ahi
khāṇḍaba bane bāsabaṅku āśre kari rahile | 62 |

div.note: agniṅkara nimante arjuna chāḍilā seneha | (ga, cha)

lg.l: aneka kāḷa se bana āśre kari
śoṣaka nāme kāḷasarpa ye kuḷīkara putre
śoṣaka kāḷasarpa yamunā dhāre dhāre galā

div.note:
“śara pabanaghāẏe śoṣaka galā uḍi |” pādānta pare ja, ṇa,
pothire adhikā pāṭha –
tahuṁ uḍiṇa yāiṁ yamunā dhāreṇa nikiḷi paḍi
se yamunā nadīre pātāḷaku bāṭa acchi paḍi |
śoṣaka yamunā dhāreṇa rahilā
puṇi agni bhaẏeṇa pātāḷa puraku gamilā |
pātāḷuṁ āsi puṇa muṁcare miḷai
hastinā rājya nikaṭe yāiṇa ruhai |

lg.l: bongśa nāśa galā se ẏekā rahilā kahiṁ pāiṁ | 2 |
bhramaṇa kariṇ ase ye yāuacchi toṣa citte | 4 |
naẏane dekhilā se ye karṇṇara teja darpa | 5 |
ẏeteka bichāra se kariṇa ye mane
bho rādheba nandana mote rakṣā karasi boilā | 8 |
lg.note:
“bongṇa nāśa galā se ẏekā rahilā kāhiṁ pāiṁ |” pādanta pare
ṭha, cha pothi (mudrita pustakare) adhikā pada –
kāhiṁ rahilā ke tāku rakhilā tā kaha
akahilā kimpe kāḷānaḷa dhanañjaẏa |
arjuna nārāja tāku chāḍilā kemante
ẏe baḍa saṅśaẏa jāta hoilā mora citte |
mācchi uḍigale agni ḍakai pāthaku
chāḍi na diẏe arjuna maśā pimpuḍiku |
śoṣaka paḷāigalā ẏe baḍa bicitra
bistari kaha he muni ẏethira carita |

“badaẏanti agastiẏe śuṇimā sugyānī pantite” pādānta pare ja, ṇa,
pothire :–
ẏethira carita tote kahibā khāṇḍaba bana dahana ante
ṭhika ṭhika kari kathā śuṇithāa tuhi
ẏe sarpara kathā tote kahibā bujhāi | (ja, ṇa)
lg.l: agni dahana karuachanti khāṇḍaba nāme bana
muhiṁ śasra pabana ghāte udi aili ẏete dure | 10 |
na puṇa jāṇaiṁ mote sehi baśyānara agni
pārile rādheba mote tuhi rakṣā kara
dāne śūrabanta śuṇi śaraṇa paśili tohora | 12 |
śate bhara subarṇṇa diai se niti | 13 |
teṇu kari tote bharasā kali re bābu
nāgaṅgara bongśa thile tu subarṇṇa pāuthibu | 14 |
karṇṇ boilā se arjuna aṭai mohora sāna bhrātha
āsa āsa kāḷasarpa basa mohora ratha | 15 |
rahithā rathare mohora na kara tu bhīti | 16 |
yebe arjuna āmbhara bola na māniba
āmbhara nārāca peṣante tāra prāṇa na rahiba | 17 |
niścinta hoiṇa karṇṇara rathe rahilā śoṣaka
kapaṭa bākya kahiṇa arjuanku karāilā satya
indrara khāṇḍaba bana ye māgilā pāthaku
pātha sehi bana dilā khāibāku tāku | 21 |
pūbong dei na thibāru deba ākhaṇḍaḷa | 22 |
lg.note: niścinta hoiṇa ẏe mo rathare thāasi | (ja,ṇa, gha)

lg.l: jaṇeheṁ na chāḍai sabonge padanti anaḷe
ratha dhanu śasra sabu āṇi hutāśana
paḷai āsi ẏe sarpa kahe mo āgara | 26 |
bhaẏeṇa se śaraṇa āsi māgilāka mote
muṁ tāhākaiṁ rakhiacchi dekha mohora rathe | 27 |
bolanti agasti tumbhe śuṇa he manurājana | 28 |
sehi śasra pabanara ghāẏeṇa ẏe śoṣaka
uḍi uḍi paḍilā yāiṁ se samodra madhyare
putrakaiṁ kuḷika nāga yāiṁ dhailā koḷare | 32 |
āre āre putra, ẏetheṁ āsi paḍilu kisa pāiṁ | 33 |
śoṣakla kahilā tāta tora bongśa yāka
mahiṁ śara pacaneṇa udi uḍi āsi
paḍili samodra madhye āmbhe nohuṁ doṣī | 35 |
cauda brahmāṇḍa kṣepiṇa bulai arjunara śara
kemante rahiba parāṇa kuha he piara | 36 |
kuḷika bolai putra na hua kātara
pūbongr̥ anaḷa ye mitra aṭai mohora | 38 |
tu mohora putra boli se jāṇai hāde tote | 39 |
kadāpi se na kahiba pāthara āgare
paśa tu śaraṇa yāiṁ karṇṇara paẏare | 40 |
karṇṇara pāśaku putra tu yāasi turita | 41 |
bhāratha yuddhare tuhi śara rūpeṇa yibu
tebeheṁ nāga bongśa babure karibu uddhāra
mahā baḷabanta karṇṇa peṣiba se kāḷe
karṇṇara pāda taḷe yāiṁ paśilā śaraṇa
jaẏa tu jaẏa tu māgo śrīcaṇḍī sāroḷā
tuhi yāhāku prasanna heu go hiṅguḷā | 47 |
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa to aṭe koẏara | || 1154 ||
lg.head: {@indra arjuna yuddha o indraṅkara parājaẏa@}
lg.l: ẏethu anantare baibasuta manu agastiṅki kale pūjā
pitā putraṅkara samara kemante hoilā mote kahibā brahmāra tanujā | 1 |
lg.note: koẏara = parichāra, chākara |

lg.l: śuṇante ati susvāda amr̥ta pāna jāṇi
turṣāre rucai yehne amiẏa rasa pāṇi | 4 |
tini bhmabane kaṁpilā nirghāta śabada śuṇi | 5 |
agni debatāẏe boile tu na kara mane bhrānti
bajra paraśu gheni cheda ho suta kontī | 6 |
hemaśar apaḍante ye nirghāta śara nāśa galā
sādhu sādhu arjuan boli dhuniẏe śubhilā | 8 |
bajra paraśu gheniṇa tāhā nāśilā sabongsācī | 9 |
pabongtā śareka śareka ye peṣile jambhobhedī
bajrābaḷī śahasa gheni arjuna tāhā chedi | 11 |
ẏe mohora piara ye aṭanti debarāẏe | 13 |
romeke nārāca ye paḍibu indra dehe
prāṇe na māribu se paḍiba hāde mohe | 14 |

lg.note: śuṇibāku susvādu ẏe mukatiki sulabha | (ṅa, ṭa)

lg.l: sehi sādriśe bhedile nārāca ye bāsaba śarīre | 16 |
mauṣadhi br̥kṣara gandha pabana ye lāgi
pitā putra duhiṅkara yuddha kathā śuṇi
puṣyeka bimāna ārohi aile śacī gosāmaṇī | 19 |
svāmī arjunakaiṁ kopa kiṁpe karu surarāẏe

lg.note:
“ghāẏeṇa asāṣṭame paḍile indr adebarāẏe |” pādānta pare
‘ña’ pothire adhikā pāṭha–
dekhile suranātha bikaḷita kāẏe
samasta sanyamāna paḍichanti mohe
nārada dekhi yāiṁ kahile śacī pāśe
śuṇīṇa śacī debī miḷile āsi biraṣe |

“puṣyeka bimāna ārohi aile śacī gosāmaṇī |”
pādānta pare kha’ pothire–
arjunara manabhedīre indra mohagalā
puṇa sāṣṭāma hoiṇa nārāca binddhalā |
airābata kāndhe basi deba maghabāna
dhamaiṁ ye airābata kari garajana |
saṅgate bidyādhara achanti naba lakṣa
pāthara saṅge yujhanti deba sahasrākṣa |
ẏe samaẏe śacī debī prabeśa hoile
indraṅku koḷi kariṇa binaẏe boile |
bhaleṇa pramāda tumbhe na kalaṭi putra ku | (ṅa, ṭa, ña, jha)

lg.l: indra debatāṅku gheni bijaẏe amara bārasvatī | 24 |
sukheṇa khāṇḍaba bana dahai se agni | 25 |
sahasre naba śata yojana khāṇḍaba nāme bana
tini dibasa tini rātra agni karanti dahana | 26 |
khāṇḍaba bana yāka ye dahana hoilā
garbhabāsa hoiṇa se arjunare śaraṇa sambhāẏe | 28 |
sāraṅga pakṣī ye chāri putranta gheni
sehi rakṣā hoilā na dahila bahani | 29 | || 1183 ||
lg.head: {@mandapāḷa ruṣiṅka carita o taṅkara agni sṇati@}
lg.l: karapatra yoḍiṇa ye pucche baibasuta manu
pādārghya dei pūjā kalā agasti brahmatanu | 1 |
kimpe na bhakṣile tāṅku anaḷe debatāẏe | 3 |
ẏethira carita kaha śuṇimā dibya kathā
agasti boile śuṇa ho ẏethira byabastā | 4 |
mandapāḷa boli ruṣi baḍa tapī sehi
rurddhvaretā hoiṇa se aneka tapa karaiṁ | 5 |
lg.note:
ka, kha, ṅa, ca, jha pothimānaṅkare śoṣaka o tārākṣī kathā rahi tāpare
catrabāka kathā rahicchi | mātra anya pothimānaṅkare śoṣaka tārākṣī
ebong mandapāḷa pare catrabāka kathā acchi |
pachījantu hoiṇa kehne manuṣya upujāẏe | (ja, ṇa)
lg.l: putra bihune se ye śarīra chāḍilā
svargapuraku boliṇa se ye galāka bega hoi
yamadutaṅkara tāku ye bharasā na khaṭai | 7 |
mandapāḷa boli ruṣiẏe svargaku aile śuṇ aho nāśakara | 8 |
ẏehā śuṇi nāśakara ye uṭhiṇa aile
ẏe ruṣira pāpa puṇya bujhani bahana | 11 |
ẏe mandapāḷa ruṣi aneka tapasyā ye kale | 12 |
ẏe ruṣiṅkara aṅge pāpa kicchihiṁ ye nāhiṁ
ẏekamane śuṇa tumbhe bikaṭa danta sāiṁ | 13 |
ẏe ruṣiṅkara aṅge kicchi pāpa na rahilā
ẏe mandapāḷa ruṣira ye aneka pātaka
ẏehāku pakāa nei pūti gandha naraka | 17 |
muhiṁ ye aneka tapa kali ho bibudhe
uttama maṅgaḷ amuhiṁ ye pāilaiṁ sādhye | 19 |
lg.note: uttama phaḷa muhiṁ ye pāilaiṁ sādhye | (ka, kha prabhr̥ti pāṭha)
lg.l: debe boile tumbhe śṇa ho mandapāḷa
yāga yagyaṁ kari santati kimpe na upujāila ẏeka | 21 |
sañjībanī pure na paśai yamadaṇḍe nohai adhikārī
mañche janama tume ye kicchihiṁ na bichāri | 22 |
ẏe nyāẏuṁ janama labha tumbhe yāiṇa madhya pura | 23 |
ẏebe tumbhe puṇa yāa mr̥tyupuraku bege
mr̥ga hariṇa pachī manuṣya jāta kara
bichāranti putra jāta hoiba keuṁṇa bāge
ākāśa gaṅgā kūḷe āsi dekhile khāṇḍaba bana | 31 |
se bana madhyare muni paśile bege yāiṁ
manuṣya śarīra chāḍi dhaile pachīra śarīra | 33 |
kāmaraṅge trīḍā se ye karanti tapodhani | 34 |
keḷi kutūhoḷa kaleka sāraṅga pachīra tule
tāra tahuṁ chāri putra jāta hoileka bhale | 35 |
manuṣya śarīra rūpa aṅgare pakṣa hoi
mātā guṇa gheni pachī hoicchi tāra aṅge
śuṇi ho manurāẏe katha rasa bāge | 37 |
ẏehā śuṇi manu pachāranti ruṣiṅka mukha chāhiṁ
pachī chāri kumare kisa kale mote kahibā bujhāi | 38 |
lg.note:
“manuṣya śarīra rūpa aṅgare pakṣa hoi |” pādānta sthānare “ṭa”
pothire adhikā pāṭha–
pachīrupe pachītriẏā ruṣi kalā
āpe mahāruṣi putrara nāma dilā |
śyāmaḷa barṇṇa dekhi jyeṣṭha putra nāma śāṇḍoḷa pachī
tāhāra kaniṣṭha nāma rakhilā cilākhi |
āreka putra nāma baka dilā
āreka putra nāma śuā bolāilā |
baibasuta muni kahe agastiṅka pāśa
kemante kathāẏe kahila mote baḍāi sandeśa |
baibasuta kahanti se chāri kaḷā gheni
śr̥ṅgāra kalā ruṣi beḷā ye na jāṇi |
sandhyābeḷe śr̥ṅgāre śāguṇā hoilā
candra beḷe ramaṇa hoilā cila upujilā |
sr̥ryya ude ramaṇ akalā baka pachī jāta
sūryya raktabarṇṇa beḷe ramaṇ akalā śuā ye sambhuta |
ẏemante chāri putra upujāi chāribarṇṇa
pitāẏe bointi āre śuṇa putramāna |
ke kisa bhakṣiba debaiṁ bahana
tini putre kahile śāguṇā khaṅgosa kahilā
ruṣi śāpa dile abhakṣya bhakṣa baḷā |
cilaku āmiṣa bakaku kīṭa, śuāku paṅku phaḷa
śāguṇā āhāra karai amedhya phaḷa |
śāṇḍoḷa = sāguṇā
khaṅgosa = manoduḥkha, abhimāna, kharāpa kari kahibā |

lg.l: ẏekamane śuṇa tu ho manu daṇḍadhara | 39 |
se chāri kumaraṅku muni mātā pāśe thoi
nija bhāriyā pāśe ruṣi miḷilāka yāiṁ | 40 |
agasti boile se ye khāṇḍaba bana dahana huante
baikulya hoile śāraṅga pachī ye putraṅkara nimante | 41 |
kemante kari murucchibi muṁ ẏehu bāḷabacchi | 42 |
ẏethu anantare mandapāḷa ruṣi ye bhāḷai
bho agni trāhi kara mukuhiṁ anaḷa br̥śāḷa | 44 |
bho habi tu sakaḷa jana mokṣa
bho bihantā puruṣa tu mohora putranta rakha | 45 |
tu ẏeka deba boli bibu dhagaṇe bhāṣi | 46 |
gyānare tu deba aṣṭa prakāra huasi
tohora dahi manakale jagata hoai dhaṁsi | 47 |
tohora kṣamā kale ye uttama loka hoi
sarjana bisarjana jagata tuhi se karāi | 48 |
dhātā bidhātā tuhi se puṇa prajāpati
bolai pābaka mandapāḷa tu ho bara māga
binaẏa hoi kahai mandapāḷa hutāśana āga | 50 |
mohora chāri putre bhāriyā achanti khāṇḍaba bane
tuhi tāhānta na dahibuṭi śuṇa hutāśane | 51 |
khāṇḍaba bana dahane na bhakṣibi tohora bhāriyā putranta | 52 |
lg.note: habi = agni | 45|2 mokṣa = mukhya |
pābaka = agni |
lg.l: bho rājana ẏemante khāṇḍaba bana dahi āsuacchi agni
biḷāpa kari se bulai pāi garu cintā | 54 |
bābu agni ye sakaḷa dahi āsuacchi
baḍa śokeṇa se ye santāpi heuacchi pachī | 55 |
putraṅkara male muṁ ye hoibi asāra
ẏe poẏe mohora kesaneke ẏethuṁ hoibe pāra | 56 |
ẏehānta gheniṇa yebe muṁ ẏethuṁ yibaiṁ paḷāi
chāḍi paḷāibi yebe hr̥de garu byathā
putraṅka āgare mātā kāndiṇa kahai kathā | 58 |
bābure tumbhanta chāḍiṇa muhiṁ yibaiṁ kesaneke
tumbhanta kisa karibi muṁ hr̥daẏe garu śoke | 59 |
nauceta tumbhanta re koḷa kari maribi
tumbhanta agnire dei kemante muhiṁ yibi | 60 |
bābure tumbhara pitā baḍa nirddaẏā citta
chāḍigalā ẏebe re na kalā cinta ta | 61 |
bho rājana putraṅkara ākuḷe se mātā jaritā
śiraśikha stambha maitra droṇa chāri sutā | 62 |
tumbha pitā mandapāḷa galā ẏetheṁ thoi | 63 |
lg.note:
“bo rojana putraṅkara ākuḷe se mātā jaritā” pādānta sthānare ‘ṭa’
pothire bhinna pāṭha:–
bho rājana putraṅkara śoke se mātā jaritā
chāriṅkara nāma deigalā tumbhara pitā |
ẏesaneke chāri putraṅkara nāma dei
śāgunṇā, cila, baka, śuā ye aṭai |
jība pachake yibare bāpa tumbhanta chāḍi na pārai
tumbhara pitā pandapāḷa re galā ẏetheṁ thoi |
nauceta = nacet |
lg.l: chāri putra boile śuṇa go jananī
chāḍiyāsi āmbhanta tu mādi āsuacchi agni | 64 |
tohora thile māta āmbhara kuḷa nohu nāśa
jaritā boile bābure mūṣā bimbare paśa | 65 |
agni bhaẏa nohuṁ gāta muhaṁre muṁ dhūḷi dei yāiṁ
mā go mūṣā bhakṣiba ye bimbare paśante
mukata hoibu sinā agnire dahana hoante | 67 |
mūṣāku śeṇā pachī nelā muṁ dekhili pratakṣa | 68 |
muṁ ẏehā pratyakṣe dekhili tumbhe bhaẏa ye na kara
kicchihiṁ bhaẏe nāhiṁ tumbhe paśa he bimbara | 69 |
putramāne boile tumbhe śuṇasi go āī
ẏeka mūṣā male ki āreka mūṣā nāhiṁ | 70 |
mā go karamara yoge hoai phāḷāphaḷa
ẏebe tohora bhrathā tahiṁki tu bege yāāsi
āmbhe chāriheṁ agnire hoibu nā dhaṁsi | 72 |
ẏe pābaka yebe āmbhara bhakṣibaṭi gātra
pāibu suraloke bāsa sahasra janmara ta | 73 |
ẏehā śuṇi jaritā ye galā agnira bhaẏe nāhiṁ
bikaḷe bhāḷai basi putra mukha chāhiṁ | 74 |
mandapāḷa tustire agni tā na dahi
se ḍahare maranti boli agni tāṅku na chāhiṁ | 75 |
śuṇa ho rājana banapoḍi ye diśai
śiraśikha mukha chāhiṁ sāna bhāi ye bhāṣai | 76 |
lg.note: tāhā se bhmañjibu sinā karmara abaḷa [saṅskr̥ta matare jaritāri, sārisr̥kla, stambhamitra, droṇa ẏe chāri putra jaritāra]
śeṇā = śveta, śāguṇā |
lg.l: āmbhe ẏete dukhare paḍiṇa achuṁ ẏetha
ẏehā jāṇi se kimpāiṁ na aile āmbha tāta | 77 |
āmbhara ẏete dukha pitā abā na jāṇaiṁ
tumbhe ye baḍa bhāi āmbhanta dukhuṁ pāri kara
stambha mitra tahiṁra ye bolanti uttara | 79 |
bābu jyeṣṭha bhāi pitāsama śreṣṭha ye aṭai
aniryāpa kathāku sāna baḍa ki karai
droṇa pachī boilā tumbhara bacana nirṇṇaẏa hoi | 81 |
hiraṇya debatāku āmbhara śarīra bhoga hoi | 82 |
samasta dahija kara tu nuāsa āmbha pāśa | 84 |
sūryya teja jāṇi tohora śarīra ābhāsa | 85 |
agni ki puṇa puṇ atusti karai śiraśikha
āmbhe chāri bhāi bāḷuta āmbhanta tuhi rakha | 86 |
pitā mātā beni nāhiṁ ye āmbhara
pachī nāhiṁ uḍibāku satya kahuchuṁ tohora āgara | 87 |
toha binuṁ āne nāhiṁ āmbhara pratikāra | 88 |
to binuṁ āmbhara ye nāhiṁ jībadātā
tu agni debatā sakaḷa bhūta jaẏa karantā | 89 |
āmbha chāri bhāinti rakha boli bolanti baẏāṇa | 90 |
lg.note: tuagni debatā sakaḷa kaḷuṣa nibārantā | (gha, cha, ja)
baẏāṇa = bacana |
lg.l: bho agni sakaḷa jantunta achuṁ tu uddhari
āmbhanta beḷaka sukhe nia tu uddhāri | 91 |
tu habi sakaḷa karu ho āpyāna
puṇi hr̥ṣṭa kari pāḷu sakaḷa jana | 92 |
tohora mahimā ke anta kari pāraiṁ
sakaḷa debatāmāne tusti karanti tora tahiṁ | 93 |
bhaẏe na kara tumbhe pāñchajaṇe kali pāra
ẏebe se tumbhara tusti adhika hoilā
ẏete kahi agni tahuṁ āḍe hoigalā | 98 |
chāribhāinta na bhakṣile ruṣiṅka bhagati bhābare
ẏeṇu kari tumbha putra hoigale pāra | 103 |
bho dharmadebatā putranta uddhara kathā lāgai ye tote | 104 |
mohora prāẏe manda nāhiṁ āna prāṇī
bāḷuta kumaranta chāḍi aili muṁ na jāṇi | 105 |
bho rājana agni yetebeḷe tahuṁ jiṇigalā
tanaẏa dekhi dukha chāḍilā pañchu manu | 107 |
putra bhāriyānta dekhi manare toṣa hoi | 108 |
bege chāri putra āṇi dia mohora koḷi | 109 |
putra na thilā prāṇī nindā pāẏe svarge
jaritā boilā tumbhe pitā keuṇahim bāge | 111 |
tohoreṇa ẏe putraṅkaṭhāre kisa kāryy acchi nāhā
ẏehānta chāḍi tumbha āra bhāriyā pāśe yā yā | 112 |
tāhāre bhaji tu chāḍilu putraṅkara saṅga | 113 |
mandapāḷa bolanti ye stirīṅki biśvāsa nāhiṁ
hiṁsabhāba kathā ẏe kahu kahiṁ pāiṁ | 114 |
agniru mukata muṁ kali putra chāri
tuhita chāḍi kari galu āre nārī | 115 |
sābata hiṁsābhāba tu bahilu kāhiṁ pāiṁ | 116 |
mukhare cumbana dei se bacana prakāśi | 117 |
āre putra aṭa tumbhe guṇare biśeṣa
tumbhara dharme ye agni na kalā tumbhanta nāśa | 118 |
ẏesaneka bāṇī boli se mandapāḷa muni

div.head: {@arjunaṅkara baralābha@}

lg.l: se prāṇa pāilā agniṅkara pāśe thāi | 1 |
śrīrāma mukuṭa dekhi tāku chāḍile dhanurjaẏe | 2 |
śaradhāre āḍa kale tāhā pāṇḍaba dhanurjaẏe | 3 |
bhoja kusuma latā ye āditya rakhilā | 6 |
catrā caḍhei pāḷadhuā goṭi rahilā agniṅkara āḍa | 8 |

div.note:
“hoile śānti mūrtti chāḍileka kaṣṭa” pare agnirūpa barṇṇanā acchi | ga, ja, ḍa, ḍha, ṇa pothimānaṅkare śāraḷā bandanā, tārākṣī śoṣaka
pūbongjanmādi br̥tānta pare agnirūpa barṇṇanā o agniṅkara arjunaṅku bara
pradāna prabhr̥ti acchi |
aśvatha = aśvattha | 11|1 āpāna = āpyāna | 12|1 odara = udara |

lg.l: lohita barṇṇa śarīre dvādaśa citā gacchi | 14 |
gopyāna doharā kare pātrī gaḍu kuśa kākhe piḍhā
beda mantra ādhyāna beda karāṇḍi biḍā | 15 |
bhagata śaraṇa rakṣaṇa bīradhu tora aṭai yugati | 16 |
pīḍhā māḍi bisile yāiṁ arjunara kati | 17 |
mauṣadhi akṣata se ye ghenile karapuṭe
sambhāḷa bāsabī ẏetheṁ tora aneka kāryya acchi
ye se kṣetrī tote śasra na pāribe yoci | 20 |
ẏe mauṣadhi akṣata tu bābu ghenimuṁ kapoḷe | 21 |
jaḷe thaḷe anaḷe nāhiṁ tote aprājaẏe
trailokye niṇantā he bu sāṁgrāme hoibu nirbhaẏe | 22 |
ẏe bhasma lepile śarīruṁ tuṭiba nānā byādhi | 24 |
ẏehā aṅge bābu lepana karibu niti | 25 |
aṅge na bhediba cūra hoiba ẏeghānti | 26 |

div.note: yagyaṁpabīta = yajñopabīta = paitā |
gacchi = sājibā, śobhā pāibā |

lg.l: trailokya brahmāṇḍe tote hou pātha yaśa | 27 |
bongśare kaḷaṅka tora na lāgu dhanurjaẏe | 29 |
sakaḷa bhmabanaku agni se aṭai mūḷa
puṇa puṇa āśiṣa karanti parama sānande
jaḷe thaḷe anaḷe khaḍage na tuṭuṁ tora kāẏe
jāta hantakaku ye ajapā yoga dhyāne
śuddha aśuddha bujhi ta rucai mantra gyāne | 33 |
nārāca sanddhadu yebe ẏehi mantra paḍhi
ẏekā bāṇa peṣile huanti laṣa chāri | 34 |
aruṇa kiraṇa hāde yeuṁ beni maṇi
ẏe maṇi thile bābu na paḍai roga byādhi
āmbhe tohora ratha dakṣiṇa koṇe thibuṁ | 38 |

div.note: jāta anta khaṇḍa ye adurśya yātakamāna
svāhā svadhā sumarante hou ye santāna | (ga, jha)
trailokya brahmāṇḍa tu jiṇimuṁ pātha beḍhi | (gha, ja, ṇa)
harai byādhi ye prasarai nānā buddhi | (gha, ja, ḍa, ḍha, ca, cha, ṇa)
āmbhe tohora dakṣiṇa hāthe thibuṁ | (ja, ḍa, ḍha)
gabana = gamana |

lg.l: yete dhanu śahasra muṁ debatāṅka tahuṁ āṇili māgi
aneka bidyā dei deba hoile parasana
khāṇḍaba bana dahane hoilā se agniṅkara buddhi
satya tretaẏā dvāpara ye mandāagni hoile
arjuna prasāde dvāpare anaḷa teja prakaśile | 42 |
sumarile śahasra chādi debuṭi go māẏe | 45 |
ẏe mantra paḍhi sumaribu bābu mote mahāchatrī | 46 |
kareṇa dhamaṇā kāṭhara dhanu dosarā pinākī
śirare bānddhalā se jaṭā goṭi tini | 48 |
bhasma bilepana ye sphaṭika mudurā karṇṇe
oḍiāṇi goṭiẏe pātha bhiḍiṇa acchi kaṭi

div.note: tāmbra basra śarīre kalāka ābharaṇe | (ḍa, ḍha)
gaḷāre rudrākṣa kaṭire pīta basane (cha, kha)
māḷaguñja goṭiẏe bhiḍiṇa pātha kaṭi
uḍeṅgī kācheṭi ye gaṇḍasthaḷe karpaṭi | (ḍa, ḍha, ga, gha, ca, cha)
karpaṭi = kāchaṭi |

lg.l: satya āchārī pātha caḷai ghora bana | 51 | || 1353 ||

div.head: {@citrāṅkura śaraṇa o bairāja rājā miḷana@}

lg.l: aneka sānanda bīra ye nāhiṁ apauruṣa
bhramaiṁ gahana bana ye aneka haraṣa | 1 |
ẏeteka bichāri ye pātha aneka tīrtha bhrami
aneka giri ḍiṅgara dusaha patha gami | 2 |
śubheṇa pāragalā ye naba baraṣa sātamāsa | 3 |
ruṣikulyā gaṅgā ye yamunā ādi sāta | 5 |
pādaśrama pāi bīra bichārai mane mane
kumbha māsa śukaḷa pakṣa cauṭhī tithi gurubāra
