div.note: apaharai = muṁ nije chori kari rakhili, ātmasāt kali |
arjuna boile mātā go kāli muhiṁ gale
raibrata pabongte mote dekhu kinā bhale | [ja]
arjuna coile kāli muṁ yibi yātrā kari,
raibrata pabongte sinā dekhu motekāli | [cha, kha]

lg.l: para dukhe kātara muṁ para loke bandhu
prasanna paramānanda muṁ chatrīku ḷe sādhu | 367 |
sohodrā boile tumbhe ye kahila sabhābe
tumbhe śaraṇ matsaḷa muṁ śaraṇa paśili ẏebe | 368 |
tu ye boluthāu muṁ para dukhe dukhī
śatadhanu paḷāi tumbha tahiṁ paśilā śaraṇa
śatadhanu paḷai tumbha tahim paśilā śaraṇa
pitā indraku jiṇi khāṇḍeba bana dhaṁsi | 371 |
anaṅga debatā mote kare dhari chāpa
adoṣe nārāja mote bindhu acchi aniryāpa | 372 |
agni debatāra tumbhe khaṇḍaṇa kala ludubadu byādhi
mote uddhari dhara ẏebe deiṇa mauṣodhi | 374 |
bābu sarpa bighāta ye hoilā mora kāẏe
biṣa jhāḍi pakāa mote pāṇḍaba dhanurjaẏe | 375 |
mahata jana prāṇī se jagata uddharanti | 376 |
śate sahasra praḷambita ghena mohora dainī | 377 |
kṣudhāra beḷe anna dile hoi yete puṇya
daridra prāṇīṁki ye yatane diai dāna | 378 |
lg.note: tumbhe paralokara bandhu muṁ śaraṇa māguacchi | [ja, jha, ṭa, ta]
adoṣe nārāje mote karai prābhaba | [ja, ḍa, ḍha, ṭa]
kāma garaḷa ghāri ye achai mora kāẏe | (ja, jha)
ẏe biṣa jhāḍi tu rāuḷiā gāreḍi dhanurjaẏe | (ga)
mahataḷanamāne bhagata uddharanti | (jha)
muhiṁ anastuṇī tumbhe bāndhaba phālaguni | [ja, jha, ṭha]

lg.l: buḍili kāmajaḷe mote kimpāi uddhari na dharu | 379 |
nikaḷaṁka candramā jāṇi tohora mukha goṭi
dekhaiṁ kinā mohora andhapataḷa yāu phiṭi | 380 |
āgo sohodrā tote mohora aneka daẏinī | 381 |
paradārā doṣa go nāśai sabong tapa
mohora chāra deha tora tahiṁ lāgiba ẏe mohora pāpa | 382 |
mā go ṭhākura sebakara ẏeka yoga kāhiṁ
tu mohora mātā go chādi mela mora āśā
dekhi tohora samāne baḷā yā manīṣā | 384 |
hari baḷarāmahuṁ tumbhe śate guṇe garuhaṁsī | 385 |
āho arjuna tu labhilu stirī hatyā gati | 387 |
kabāṭa phei dekha bābu prāṇatyāja hoilā | 388 |
pratakṣe labhilu bābu stirī hatyā goṭāẏe | 389 |
lg.note: mā go ṭhākurāṇī sebakara ẏeka yoga kāhiṁ | (kha)
brāhmaṇa chāṇḍāḷara mitrayoga nāhiṁ | (pa, ga)
dekhi tohora samāne jaṇe baḍhāa muhāṁsa | (ja, jha, ḍa, ḍha,)
mūrccchāgata hoi paḍilā gosāmaṇī | [ṅa, gha, ca, ṭa]

lg.l: bobi dei na marani pātha hoilāka tūnī
sohodrā boile muṁ kemanta karibi go sakhī | 394 |
na rahai ātmā mora kāma āsakate
chāḍibi jība ātmā boli kaṭāra ghenai hāthe | 395 |
podu poḍu sakhī go stirījanma goṭā
āho dhatā puruṣa tu manda kr̥tya kalu
āpaṇāra śarīra gheni paraku khaṭāi bhr̥tyakārī
ati pātaka kale stirī janme abatari | 398 |
stirī nathile go puruṣa heba kāhiṁ
puruṣa bidhātā stirī atāi go bihi | 401 |
lg.note: “ẏebeheṁ sannidhaku āsu kinā mahātamā” pare :– (gha, ṇa, ta) pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
arjuna boile satyabhāmā hoila ki bāi
ẏesaneka bacana tumbhe boila kisa pāiṁ
bobi = bobāḷi |
satyabhāmā boile go na bhāḷa saṁghāta (gha, ña, ṭha)

lg.l: thambībhuta hoi basile deba na puṁrai kicchi | 429 |
tu kimpā bichara na karu dhanurjaẏe | 430 |
sādhu sādhu pātha tu kṣatriẏa śuddhaśāḷī | 433 |
tuhi kimpā yibu āu hastinā puraku | 434 |
bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa ādi kari dekhibu sabunti | 435 |
ẏete boli bije jagamohana dvārikā bhmabane
arjunaku gheni deba bije kale siṁghāsane
guṇḍurī jaḷā bāṭe chāhaṁi cakṣu ḍhāḷi | 439 |

lg.note: puṇḍarīka jaḷākabāṭī bāṭe chāhāi cakṣa meli (ka)

guṇḍurijaḷā = pakṣīyukta jaḷākabāṭī, pūbngre jaḷā bāṭe nānādi
pakṣī bā padma prabhr̥ti citra karāyāuthilā | atyanta choṭa ākārare
bātāẏanamāna karāheuthilā |

lg.l: yācilāra drabya ye chāḍu bīra pāthe | 441 |
sehi se jāṇai hāde paradārāra bāratā | 442 |
icchāẏe śr̥ṅgāra kalā yesaneke mana icchi | 443 |
rātreṇa sarile deba śītaḷa amr̥ta muṇohi
dibya palaṁkare śeja ye netara supāti
kabāṭa na kilibu ho bīra sabongsācī | 448 |

lg.note: raṅgā abatāre yāra ratiśāsre jitā |
se jāṇai hāde para dārāra bāratā | [kha]
pada pare keteka pothire adhikā pāṭha |
raṅgā abatare sujane śuṇa mora bebastā
muhiṁ se jāṇai para darāra ye kathā |
mānitī gauroba samasta upekṣi
iccchā śr̥ṅgāra kali lajjāku tyakti |
māīṁ māusī piusī samastaṁku hari
khuḍī deṭhāī jhiārī boliṇa na bāri |
yāhāku yetebeḷe iccchā ramai muṁ bane
kāmara mahātmā śuṇa se ẏesane |
jāti ajāti ye kāma na bārai
pr̥thīre rasa svāda śr̥ṅgāra aṭai |
śeja (ya) = śayyā |
lg.l: āmbhe tiāri go ailu bīra phālaguni
arjuna śaẏana mandire samarpi āsa yāiṁ
kāryya subidhāna kara amr̥ta yoga pāi | 451 |
sohodrā beśa beśana hoi ujāgara rāti | 452 |
sohodre boile sakhī re sādhu sādhu to mahiṁmā | 453 |
arjuna śaẏana mandire prabeśa deḍha prahara ye rāti | 456 |
tini pure tini kabāṭa ye bajra kiḷiṇī
ẏemanta samaẏe satyabhāmā sohodrāṁku gheniṇa dvāre prabeśa turita | 458 |
kabāṭa pelante ye na caḷai kiḷīṇī
arjuna arjuna boli ḍāk adianti śatrājitara dulaṇī | 459 |
bābu arjuna kabāṭa pheḍi mora sannidhaku āsa
se jagamohana nāthara āgyāṁ muhiṁ pāi
sohodrānta gheniṇa muṁ aili tora tahiṁ | 461 |
tu ho phālaguni ẏehāku karibu nā rakṣā | 462 |
lg.note: palaṁke basiṇa pātha guṇai śaramantra | [jha]
jagannātha yāhā tote kahile biśvāsa | [ja, jha, ga, ta]
ẏe yebe tote bābu baḷāilā āśā
tu ho dhanurjaẏe purāa ẏehāra manīṣā | (ja, jha)
lg.l: ẏehā śuṇi bhitare thāiṇa bolai sabongsācī
tohore muhiṁ aneka pāibi ye bāci | 463 |
huḍi kahilu mā go na jāṇilu kichu
mātā hoi kimpā go kaṭāḷa karuachu | 464 |
hari baḷarāme mā go yāhāra sohodra bhrātha
tāhāṁku saṁkoca kimpe na kalā tohora citta | 465 |
ki boli blibe mote gobinda deba haḷī
ẏeḍe baḍa bongśare mā go lagāuchu kāḷi | 466 |
pāpa puṇyaku kyāna nāhiṁ kimpe na bichāra
ẏeheneka pāpa kathāku kimpe kaṭāḷa kara | 467 |
muhiṁ śuṇili ẏebe driyodhana ṭhākura hoibe bibhā
tu mora gurupatnī karibi ye sebā | 468 |
ṭhākura bhāruyā hoibu pañchu kaṭake ṭhākurāṇī
sebake kimpā icchā karu go mahātmāṇī | 469 |
caḷa yā sohodrā go phiṭilā tora kaṣṭa
sohodrā boile tu aṭu baḍai nilaja
toho chāra tule bhāba kimpā baḍhāile debarāja | 471 |
tu tāhāku bandanā karu ho kemante

div.note: tohore mātā go muṁ pāibi apachāti {khyāti] | (bahu pāṭha)
bhitare thāiṇa bolai phālaguni
tohore bahuta muhiṁ hoibi hinimānī | [kha, cha]
tāhā chāraku ẏete kimpe pauruṣa kari | [ta, gha]
muhiṁ tohora bhāriyā nia ho mote pātha | [gha, ṛa]
nihāi = niścaẏa |

lg.l: āho dhanurjaẏe kabāṭa pheḍa bābu kinā
kṣatrīkuḷa bānā tora pratagyāṁ ye sata
na kara nirāśa mote tu prāṇanātha | 476 |
mahata kuḷe jāta hoi tu ẏeḍe nirlajīṭi | 477 |
dhika hou tyohora nanda yaśodā pitā mātā | 478 |
sustirī hoile bongśaku hoẏe dhani dhani | 479 |
gopāḷa prakr̥ti ye aṭai baḍa manda | 480 |
ẏe yeteka bacana tu boilu go māta
tuhi ye boilu rāmakr̥ṣṇa mora bhāi
agastiṁka putra hoile ki pratigraha hoi | 483 |
gopāḷa kuḷe janma hoi prakr̥ti tumbhara hīna
satyabhāmā boile tu āmbhanta kete nindu | 485 |
āpaṇe yāhā arji tāhā karma boli pātha
āmbhe abā antara jāta hoiluṁ tumbhe ta mahata | 486 |

div.note: sustirī hoile hoẏe dui kuḷaku dhani | [ga, ṭha]
bongśika duhitā hele bongśa kare sādhu | [kha, cha]
satyabhāmā boile tu keteheṁ bongśa nindu | [kha, cha]
āpaṇe yāhā kari tāhā karma boli pātha | [ḍa, ḍha, ña, kha, cha]
ārdhanā = ārādhanā |

lg.l: mahata jana dekhi āmbhe tumbhanta āśre kalu
īśvare sebā kari ta niṣphaḷa hoilu | 487 |
dante tiraṇa gheni sohodrā tote muṁ daẏinī | 488 |
muhiṁ ye thora bhr̥tyara bhr̥tya dāsara ye dāsa
tu deba stirī hoi kimpā mānabe karu āśa | 489 |
tu parama sadhebī go mote ṭhākurāṇī sinā | 490 |
puṇa puṇa bhitare thāiṁ pātha karai pariṇāmi
mā go jāṇile kopa mote karibe baḷarāma svāmī | 491 |
aneka kaṣṭhore yahuṁ boile dr̥ḍha bāṇī
śuṇi rāge pratiuttara dile nandara nandinī | 492 |
āho arjuna tu āmbhanta kalu jhiṁghāsa
dhika dhika jībana tora hou phālaguni
dhika hou tohora kunā piara jananī | 494 |
kṣatrīpaṇa bolāu ẏe tora sabu micha
kimpe āna nāma tote dileka bibaccha | 496 |
ẏe tohora māẏeṁsa pātha gridhinī pachī khāu | 497 |
mohora kaṣṭa yāithāntā tu marithile se kāḷe | 498 |
bābu dukhīra saṁghāta mote uddhara dhanurjaẏe | 499 |
aneka bhracchanā muṁ ye boili tote āja
rāgeṇa svāmī āsi mote karu kinā grāhija | 500 |

div.note: āho arjuna tu āmbhanta kalu nirāśa | [ṭa, ja, ḍa, ḍha]
bhraccchanā = bhartsanā |

lg.l: yujheṣṭhiṁka śapatha tote kointānta droha karu
jagannāthaṁkara āna tote yebe kabāṭa na pheḍu | 501 |
śuṇi hasi uṭhilā ye pāntaba dhanurjaẏe
āna pāḍi tāhāra ghenilā jāti br̥tti
se kathā sohodrā go hoilā tora kati | 503 |
birahitā stirī ābara puruṣa ye bāi
rāgī brāhmaṇa ābara dhundara yogī hoi | 504 |
anīti stāna ohokuḷa myapātra nirbhaẏa kuḷabadhū
akuḷā abhabi ye aṭhāba thāna bāsī
ẏete loka sohodrā go dharmaku nuāsi | 509 |
tu yebe kaṭāḷa mote kalu nandara dulāḷī
āra beḷe na kalu mote dvārikāku āsibā bhaḷi | 510 |
apaṇḍita loke sinā caurya paṇe kāryya | 511 |
nohoi nohoi mā go ẏemanta ye dharma
koṭiẏe siṁgha prātrama tohora bhāi baḷarāma | 412 |

div.note: rāgī brāhmaṇa ābara durddaṇḍa (bindhaṇā) ye gāī | (ga, ṭha)
amārga patha abhābi ẏe bhratha | (ja, jha)
dakṣiṇe saunanda mūṣaḷa bajra laṅgaḷa dhari abiśrāma | (ja, jha, tha)
āna = rāṇa |

lg.l: pr̥thibī heḷa ghenai kādambaī rasa bhoḷe
dekhuṁ dekhuṁ mahā anaḷe kemane debi jhāsa | 515 |
caḷa caḷa gosāṁaṇī go chāḍiṇa mora āśa
mūrucchi mela pañchu ātmā go mohore hua tu nirāśa | 516 |
aneka dukha tu go pāiluṇi māheśvarī
śukapachī prāẏe mā go āśā hoilā gohori | 517 |
tahiṁ āśe nirāśa go hoilā śukapachī | 518 |
kāka tahiṁki āśā kari hoilā niṣphaḷa | 519 |
sundara susañcha dekhi tu baḷāilu āśā
kāḷe na pūrilā mā go tohora manīṣā | 520 |
na jāṇī huḍi ye paḍilu go mahātmāṇī
mohora dainī gheni bāhuḍa baḷarāmaṁka bhaẏeṇī | 521 |
sohodrā boile ye arjuna bacana śuṇi
badhira śuṇai ki kambu śabada bāṇī | 522 |
tu ye na śuṇilu ye dharma artha bola
subāṇī bola śuṇi hoilu yebe kāla | 524 |
na rahani ẏethuṁ bege yāa yā bāhuḍi
samāsyā na dei pātha śutilā badana mādi | 525 |
aneka binoẏī hoi boile beni ye kāmenī

div.note: pr̥thibī heḷa ghenai ye kādambarī rasa dāne
kapiḷāsa upāḍilā ye haḷ amūṣaḷara mūne | (ḍa, ḍha)
kheḍe = kheḷe |
tisirā = tr̥tīẏa |

lg.l: samāsyā na pāiṇa se hoile nirāśa
bho karma puruṣa aneka binoẏī boli
satyabhāmā boile tu na bhāḷa saṁghāta
niṣphaḷa hoiba ki go praśurāmara dhāḍi
puruṣa ārata chāḍi ye āmbhe tāṁku lodi | 530 |
satyabhāmā boile deba kāryya nohilā kicchi
padmana bhmabanaku caḷiyāa beni ye kāmenī | 535 |
māẏābatī āge tumbhe kaha ẏehu kathā
se kāmākṣī kichu jāṇaiṭi puruṣa mohana bāratā | 536 |
aneka buddhi tiāraṇa kale jagannātha svāmī

div.note: niṣphaḷa hoiba ki go kāmadebara dhāḍi | (ṭa, ga)

“sohodrā mandire bijaẏe pratigāmī” pare ‘ja, jha’
pothire pāṭha :–
sohodrā aneka aḷaṁkāra jhīnabāsa pinddha,
satyabhāmā caraṇa dhari trodhabhare kāndi |
sakhī kemanta kariṇa muhiṁ ye rakhibi jībana kāẏe,
ẏethaku kāraṇa mote karasi go māẏe

lg.l: aneka aḷamkāra gheni jhīna ye basana
māẏābatī pure se bijaẏe kaleka bahana | 541 |
praḷamba hoiṇa ye śutile daṇḍa lāi | 544 |
āśiṣa śubha bāñcchā karanti sohodrā śatrābatī
ahio sulakṣaṇī tumbhe hoa go putrabantī | 545 |
ye tumbhara manobāñcchā prāpata hou māẏe
beni bhmaja bhiḍi debī āliṁgana kaẏe | 546 |
mā go soma bongśare jāta pārthiba phālaguni
mā go ẏeka śarīra aṭanti hari arjuna beni | 549 |

div.note: pūbong pr̥ṣṭhāra abaśiṣṭāṁśa
chāla go sohodrā ẏebe yibā āmbhe jhāti
yāhā se āgyāṁ mote deichanti śirīpati |
bhitara puraku go yibā dhatikāra
yāhāre kāryyasiddhi hoiba āmbhara |
ẏehā śuṇi sānanda ye nandara nandinī
māẏābatī pure yāi prabeśa hele puṇi |

lg.l: tuhi ta āpaṇe jāṇu tāhā māheśvarī | 550 |
mā go somabongśa ṭhākura se madhya bhmabanaku
ẏe kathā na yogāilā baḍaṭhākuraṁka bichāraku | 553 |
sehi se dhāraṇā ye hoiba ẏe pr̥thī | 554 |
boile pāruki sohodrā arjuna ẏeka yoga kari | 555 |
beni rātra pariyante bahuta khaṭiṇa maṇāilu | 557 |
śoithāi na śuṇai se badhīra jana jāṇi | 558 |
mā go yeteka maṇāiṁ āmbhe kahilu tāku binaẏa bāṇī
pāṣāṇa jhaḍai go āmbhara bāky aśuṇi | 559 |
nirāśa hoiṇa bāhuḍi ailu beni rāti
mā go sohodrāku yesaneke bhajai dhanurjaẏe
satyabhāmāṁka bacane ye sohodrā bege uṭhi
māẏā batīṁkara hātha dhaile beni goṭi | 562 |
basa go māta boli bolanti māẏābatī
karibi kāryya tote arjuna hoiba prāpati | 563 |
mā go kapāṭa kiḷi yebe śoithāẏe dhanurjaẏe
tahiṁki acchi mora padamantra ye gotiẏe | 564 |

div.note: kapāṭa = kabāṭa |

lg.l: pāṭaṇa nāme ye kahile mantra goṭi
ẏe mantra paḍhi chuiṁle sāta kapāṭa yiba phiṭi | 565 |
uluka bidyā mā go sādhya karāibi tote
ẏehā paḍhi arjuna tahiṁki tu yibu niśā rātre | 566 |
tu sabunti dekhibu tote na dekhibe kehi
ẏe bidyā prasanne samasta kāryya siddha hoi | 567 |
sahasra yojane thile bheṭiba ẏeka pādi | 568 |
ẏe añjana bidyā tte go deuacchi māẏe
rātre chāhiṁle diśiba tote sahasra yojana yāẏe | 569 |
ẏe añjana gheni chāhiṁle diśiba adyāpi | 570 |
puruṣa baśya yeṇe hoiba go māta
ẏe mohana mauṣadhi tote karucchi prāpata | 571 |
śarīre pakāa tāra sādhana mantra guṇḍi
ẏe bidyāẏe tote baśya hoiba phālaguni
to tahuṁ betrake kehi nohibe priẏabhābinī | 574 |

div.note: chāḍiba dambhapaṇa se hoiba parābhabī (ja, jha, ṭha)
yadyapi tapodhana nohithiba lobhī
chāḍiba brahmapada se hoiba parābhabī | (ka)
kāma āśre yeṇe hoiba saṁsiddhā | (ḍha, ga, ṇa, gha)
kāma uccāṭa pāi bhramai rasa bhoḷe | (ḍa, ḍha)
parābhabī = prābhaba pāibā, parābhaba pāibā |
betrake = binā |

lg.l: sādhana mantra bidyā ye kahilā māẏābatī
sakaḷa bidyāre se nirjitā tesana nārī
ẏeṇe baśya tote hoiba gāṇḍima dhārī | 570 |
kahilā māẏābatī ye sakaḷa kāryya siddhi
anya puruṣa ke tā tahuṁ uburiba | 572 |
na sādhi gyānabantī se bhabānī mahātmāṇī | 583 |
se samasta bidyā ye kahilā sohodraṁku
mā go āhuri kathāẏe muhiṁ kahibi tumbhaṁku | 584 |
mā go tohora arjunare yetebeḷe hoiba pīrati
mā go dr̥bhāra mattabhoḷa aṭanti baḷarāma
yādaba baḷa gheniṇa se karibe sāṁgrāma | 586 |
mā go yebaṇa kāḷe dahana hoile anaṅga

div.note: sakaḷa bidyāre nirjitā yebaṇa hāde nārī
subhadrāṁku dilā se sabong bidyā kāmadeba manohārī | (jha, ña)
anādi aparṇṇā se trailoka jana pārai bodhi | (ṭa, ḍa, ḍha)
thambana = stambhana |

lg.l: brahmā biṣṇu maheśvara indracandra baruṇa kubera sūryye
baḷarāma ādi kari hāribeti arjunara teje | 590 |
tu ye mahata go arjuna tote bheṭi
mā go kāmadebara bibāna achai mora tahiṁ
ẏe bibāna begeṁ tu go yāa yā ārohī | 592 |
sāṁgrāma kāḷe ẏetheṁ bije karu dhanurjaẏe
ẏebe go mātā ẏethuṁ bije kari yibā
hastināpuraku yibi āgyāṁ mote debā svāmī | 597 |
gobinde boile ho yātrā ucchabara kāḷe
tu mohora sodara aṭu prāṇara sakhā
mote chāḍi kemante yāi loḍu tuhi ẏekā | 599 |
yeuṁṇa kathāku tu mane karuachu bhrānti
tahiṁki āmbhe sapakṣa tohora kisa bhīti | 600 |
beni bhmaje śrīhari ye kale koḷāgrata | 601 |

div.note: tu ye māheśvarī arjuna tote bheṭi | (ja, jha)
yataneheṁ bandhu janamānanta loḍi sāṁgrāma anakūḷe | (ta, tha)
salajita = salajjita |

lg.l: rātre bije kale ye yāhāra śaẏana stāne | 605 |
sohodrāku gheni yāa arjuna śaẏanara stāna | 607 |
saṣṭikara thamba candana kāṭha rua śeṇī
palaṁka upare basi se nārāja āmañchi | 611 |
sāta kapāṭa kiḷiacchi bajra ye kiḷiṇī | 612 |
chatrībr̥tta paṇe pātha śara guṇai adyāpi | 613 |

div.note: hīrāra prabandha rua agara ye śreṇī
gaṇḍi nabāta ye tejapatra chāẏeṇī | (bahu pāṭha)
candana catusama hoicchi khañjaṇī
ki abā paṭāntara bārāsvatī pura nāṇi | (ña)
dibya bhmabane bijaẏe bīra sabongsācī
palaṁke basi bīrabara śara guṇuacchi | (ḍa, ḍha)
saṣṭika = sphaṭika |

śara guṇuacchi = mantra dvārā śaraku āẏatta karuacchi,
manabhedī śaramantramāna ābr̥tti karuacchi |

lg.l: arjuna śaẏana stāneṇa turite yāiṁ pāi
ḍaka deiṇa phuṭile se śatrajitara kumārī
samāsyā na diai se gāṇḍima chāpadhārī | 617 |
māẏābatīra mantra paḍhi se nandara dulaṇī
chuante phiṭilā sāta kapāṭa nibiḍa yantra ye kiḷīṇī | 618 |
mantra paḍhi ẏeka kapāṭa chuante sāta kapāṭa galā phiṭi
arjunara sannidhe se ye sohodra yai bheṭi | 620 |
śīghre bāma kare dhailā se sohodrāra bāḷa | 622 |
boilā nāsā śrabaṇa tora pakāibi hāṇi | 623 |
tu ki lo rākṣāsuṇī pichāsuṇī jāti
mohora śiẏana stāne āsi paśilu niśā rāti | 624 |
sumara lo ḍāṁkeṇī tohora debatā ye iṣṭa
strīliṅga nohile āja hoantu muṇḍa kāṭa | 625 |
sumarai yaśodā ye nija mātā tāhāra | 626 |
arjuna boile tu pāmerī duṣṭa manda
tu kimpe sumarilu yaśodā debī nanda | 627 |
sohodrā boilā se mora pitā māta
teṇu kari muhiṁ ye sumarili tāhānta | 628 |

div.note: dhanya mahimā se puṣyera kumārī | (ṭa, ta, gha, ṇa, tha)

lg.l: arjuna boile lo tāṁka jībanahiṁ dhika
gopāḷa janma se ye aṭanit abibeka | 629 |
arjuna boile tu kimpe sumarilu yadusāīṁ
sohodrā boile se aṭanti mora sohodra bhāi | 631 |
kuḷe kaḷaṁka lagāi ye bandabāṭi hele | 632 |
tohore kari teḍe svāmī dhika yāu | 633 |
kiñchita abhimāna āmbhe na sahu jagata | 634 |
dharma alaṁghite ye satyaiṁ na laṁghu
sukha bhoga tejyā kari dvādaśa baraṣa banabāsa kali | 636 |
prathame prāga tīrthe kali muṁ srāhāna
tathāpi na chāḍilā mohora bhrānti mana | 637 |
gaẏā tīrthe puṇi gali se srāhāne
pitr̥kāryya kari bongśaku kāreṇī kali gadādhara daraśane | 638 |
paradārā haraṇa doṣa lecchibāra saṁkalpa kalāiṁ nikaṭe | 639 |
na haribi para stirī na karibi para dhane icchā
para hiṁsā apabāda na sahibi ẏesaneka manīṣā | 640 |

div.note: tohora māẏeṁsa go gr̥dhinī pachī khāu | (ja, jha)
satya laṁghile ye dharmahiṁ na lāgai
pāṣāṇa rekhaṭi āmbhara bola aṭai (ka)
paradārā na karibi kalpanā kali āṇṭe | (cha)
abhimāna = apamāna |
bāchā = bākya |
kāreṇī = uddhārakarttā, muktidātā, sukhadāẏaka |

lg.l: paradārā doṣe mohora citta nohu bandī | 643 |
ẏe tīrthamānaṁkare paśi muṁ ye kalaiṁ manabāñcchā
paradārā śr̥ṅgāre mote na karāa icchā | 645 |
parastirī haraṇuṁ ye nāhiṁ āna pāpa
kauśike srāhāna kari mādhabe kali tapa | 646 |
saṁkalpa kari paradārā chāḍili re taruṇī | 647 |
bāma pāda taḷipā dhūḷi arjuna aṅge boḷi | 651 |
chāḍiṇa arjuna ye sohodrāku kalā koḷa | 653 |

div.note: suputra boli yehne bolanti jagata | (ḍa, ḍha)
bāmadeba taḷipā marddi maḷi arjuna aṅge śāmaḷi | (gha, ta, ṇa, ḍa, ḍha)

lg.l: dekha ho mahārājā mantra sadhanara bidyā
mā go br̥ṣṇibongśe janami hoilu mānahīna
stirī kuḷe janama hoi tu kimpā ẏeḍeka agyāna | 656 |
mā go prāṇīṁki kiñchita sukha sinā śr̥ṅgāra rasa kaḷā
pāpa ācari prāṇī aḷape tahiṁ malā | 657 |
mā go rahilā pāṇire ye bhajigalā bandha
aḷapa āẏaṣa hoai tuṭai ye kandha | 658 |
ẏeteka na pūruṁ ye pakāi mahārasa | 659 |
mā go keteheṁ yatane ye gaḍhilā kāẏā goṭi
acea agyāne ye paḍai mahī loṭi | 660 |
puṇi bahiyiba tiriśi dibasa tiriśi rāti | 663 |
mā go ẏete bāge thile ye atuṭa hoi kāẏe
sādhaba ujāṇi ye chandiba pañchu indri
ẏemanta kari pāḷi se hoai nirmaḷa
yesaneke sindhu ye na laghaṁi kūḷa | 669 |
para dārāẏe asatī go svadārāẏe yati
ẏete bāge thile śrī āẏuṣa bardhuti | 670 |
mā go paradārāẏe piṇḍa kari dhātā srijilāka mote
gyāna thāuṁ thāuṁ muṁ tā laṁghibi kamante | 671 |
sohodrāẏe boile tumbhe kahila na jāṇi
mote pradāna se karibe jāṇa tote | 673 |
ghr̥ta bhojana pāile ki ruṣai brāhmaṇa | 674 |
nidhi pāile ki daridra yāi ghuṁci
pāṣāṇa śarīra ki tora aṭai sabongsācī | 675 |
mahātamā puruṣa hoile sehr̥ hoiba kāma bhogī | 677 |
puṇi māẏābatīra añjana gheni chāhiṁlā apāṅge
madana śara bhedilā ye arjunara aṅge | 678 |
sohodrāṁku beni bhmaja bhiḍi mukhe dilā cumba | 679 |
sabhābe salajjite sohodrā basilā mathā poti | 680 |

div.note: kebaṇa aśubha tote hoiba akāraṇa | (ña, ḍa, jha, ta)
nidhi paśile ki daridra yāi ghuñchi | (aneka pāṭha)
campaḷā = cañchaḷatā |
nirijhāsi = niḥśeṣeṇa, jhāsi, jhāsa dei, parityāga kari ||
yati = saṅyamī |

lg.l: āho kāmadeba tu nāśa karu parama yogī | 682 |
parama niṣṭhā yebe hoai parama yogī
bhojana niṣṭhā ye kṣudhā beḷe miḷai
baṇija niṣṭhā yebe bikā yāi tule
kautuka niṣṭhā yebe hātha chāḷai bhale | 685 |
kahibāra niṣṭhā yebe śuṇībāra loka bujhai | 687 |
sohodrā boile tu chāḍa tghaḍa pātha
apratiṣṭhā nārī muṁ, tu chuimuṁ kemanta | 688 |
kemanteṇa chuuṁ mote chāḍa chāḍa bīra
niẏana karicha tumbhe tīrtha tīrtha buli
aili tuma pākhaku tumbhe baḷe dhara
muhiṁ ta abaḷā tumbhe baḷabanta bīra | 692 |
rāmaṁku bhaẏe tumbhara thāẏe parā citte
teṇu baḷe dhari mote karucha ẏemanta | 694 |

div.note: guṇḍakerī = rāga biśeṣa |

lg.l: chāḍa chāḍa gurupatnī aṭe muṁ tumbhara
tumbhe parā nyāẏa mārge thāa abirate | 696 |
tuhi se mahā paṇḍita bibeka dharmika mahata kuḷaśīḷa
nandara nandinī muṁ mo bhāi kāmapāḷa
baḷe kaṭāḷa karuchu tu dvārābatī pura | 698 |
ki re yujheṣṭhiṁka bhrātā tu bolāu
para stirī aṅgasaṅge kimpā mana deu | 699 |
chāḍa chāḍa dhanurjaẏe tu kaṭāḷa karu kete
nabatana yubatī muṁ mote tu dharuchu kemante | 700 |
tote lajjā heba mote maraṇaru garu
chāḍa chāḍa dhanurjaẏe mote ẏehā kiṁpā bichāra na karu | 701 |
chāḍa chāḍa dhanurjaẏe boli arjunaku dilā peli | 702 |
arjuna śarīre lagānte se madane acchi buḍi | 703 |
nandara nandinī go rakha mo jībana | 704 |
sohodrā boile tumbhe aṭa parama yogī
ẏete baḍa mudrā pātha tora hāde pāribaka bhāñji | 705 |
ẏeḍe baḍa nāgarī tu aṭu mahādhr̥tī | 706 |
mote gocara nohilā tohora ye māẏā
ẏebe se jāṇili stirīṁkara ẏeḍeka nirddaẏā | 707 |
sohodrāẏe ḍākadyanti satyabhātā arjuna mote kaṭāḷa karuacchi
muhiṁ bāḷastirī go na jāṇai kicchi | 709 |
kebaṇa padārtha go acchi mohora tahiṁ
mote māgai go muhiṁ pāibaiṁ tāhā kāhiṁ | 710 |
dekhuṁ dekhuṁ dharma muṁ ye laṁghibi kemante | 711 |
satyabhāmā boile arjunaku na kara jhiṁghāsa
stirī se upekhanti nā puruṣaṁka doṣa | 712 |
mā go manabāñcchā siddha hoila tohori
prāṇa apāna byāna ubāna samāna pañchuātmā
ẏe mohora śaraghāta tumbhe beḷeka sambhāḷa | 719 |
hāsya lāsya parihāsa surati rasa kheḍe
bhāñjilā kheda tāra surati rasa bhoḷe | 722 |

div.note: laha = nakha |

lg.l: bhmaje bhmaja bhiḍi paḍi tāḷa beni jānu
rasa khaḷita hailā pāilā debī sukha
sohodrā boile arjuna mora pañchuprāṇa rakha | 725 |
nakhadanta ghāte sesohodrā śarīra hoilā bikoti
buḍilā śarīra se na cetai yubatī | 727 |
rati raṅga rase na aṇṭai rajanī | 729 |
aneka ratiraṅga rase na aṇṭai rajanī | 732 |
ẏeke yubā yubatī ye duje kāma kheda
yubā yubatī cachure ye na māḍai nida | 733 |
arjuna boile tu go yāa yā sohodrā | 734 |
sohodrā boile pātha apāra acchi rāti
mote dekhi bimukha kimpā hoilu suta kontī | 735 |
arjuna boile sakhī ẏeta cauryya śr̥ṅgāra
gupata nohiba ẏe abaśya hoiba prachāra | 736 |
pāpare dūṣita mote kalusi re sahi
baḷarāme jāṇile ye na bratibā kehi | 737 |
prabeśa hoila yāiṁ meḍhara śaẏana purī | 740 |
śayyā chāḍi srāhāna debārccana ye sārilā sabongsācī
raibrata pabongte caḷanti ye yātrāra bidhāne
sāta bongśa gheniṇa se bije deba janārddane | 742 |
bājanti dundubhi ye ḍhola niśāṇa mahurī
yātrā raṅga binode bije se dvārikāpura nārī | 743 |
raibrata pabongte miḷanti yātrā raṅga kari
jaḷatrīḍā binode nābe bijaẏe samasta yādeba | 745 |
karpūra bāsilā ye panira jaḷa pāṇi
māranti picikā ye śiśira br̥ṣṭi jāṇi | 746 |
aneka sambhara deba kahita ki pāri
trīḍādi binode se kale bije nābe | 749 |

div.note: ceḷa = bastra |

lg.l: maṅgaḷa dhūni kari huḷahuḷi dianti sakaḷa nāẏekā | 752 |
śaẏana mandire yāiṁ bijaẏe kr̥ṣṇa pāthe | 754 |
svāmī sohodrā arjunara ye hoilā aneka pīrati | 755 |
ẏeka kabāṭa chuiṁle phiṭai sāta kabāṭa yantra | 756 |
jaẏa tu jaẏa deba kāḷindī ballabha padmanābha | 759 |
jaẏa tu jaẏa lakṣmaṇā ballabha bāsudeba
jaẏa jaẏa jānakī ballabha kodaṇḍa kāṇa pāṇi
jaẏa jaẏa satyā satīra ballabha catrapāṇi | 762 |
jaẏa tu jaẏa saṁsāra rakṣaṇa datya dhaṁsanā
jaẏa tu jaẏa jagannātha jaẏa bajrasehnā | 764 |

div.note: jaẏa tu jagamohana deba kāḷīẏa dhaṁsana | (bahu pāṭha)
jaẏa tu jaẏa deba nārāẏaṇa saẏaḷa jana mauṛamaṇi
jaẏa tu jaẏa deba catradhara antaryyāmī | (ja)

lg.l: jaẏa jaẏa atuḷāẏita ballabha kambu catrapāṇi
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa jaẏa maṅgaḷa bāṇī | 767 |
rātre biḷasai se sohodrāku gheni phālaguni
baḍhilā pīrati ye arjuna sohodrā beni | 772 |
dibase hari meḷe se rātre ātayāta
ẏemante pīrati tahiṁ baḍhilā dina sāta | 773 |
sauri bāra kauḷaba nāme karana gaṇḍa nāme yoga
meṣa saṁtrāntiki ye pandara dina bhoga | 775 |
nadīra bhitare se ye ucchaba nabare
rebatī sohodra ādi trīḍā karanti jaḷe paśi | 778 |
tiḷa aẏeṁḷā gandha catusama mathāẏeṇa boḷi
ẏeka āreka karanti parihāsa trīḍārasa keḷi | 780 |
ke jaḷa bhitare paśiṇa pāṇi phiṅgi
ke buḍi āreka goḍa dharanti āsi begi | 781 |
ke parihāse uchuḍanti ye gupata hoi jaḷe
beḍhiṇa trīḍa karanti ye sakaḷa stirī br̥nda
ke picikā māri piṅgi dianti pāṇi
ke tāhāra śire bāli niuḍanti āṇi | 785 |
ke tahiṁ ati bege nianti keśa dhari
jaḷe ḍeiṁ paḍilā se māninī māna gheni | 787 |
thaḷe āṇi kari ye rebatī kale ubhā
ditīẏā candra jāṇi nakha kṣata diśai śobhā | 789 |
kṣidra nakha danta goṭi goṭi birājai hiā
rebatī dekhi boile mā go kariachu kāhā | 790 |
nakha danta ghāte tora bidāraṇa hiā | 791 |

div.note: ke nei buḍabanti trīḍā kutūhoḷe | (gha, ṇa, ta)
jaḷare ḍeiṁ paḍilā se lajjābhāba gheni | (kha, cha)
ditīẏā candra jāṇi diśai nakharehā | (ña, gha, ṇa, ta)
nakha danta ghāte bidāraṇa stana yuga | (ga, gha, ta, tha, ḍa, ḍha, ṅa)

lg.l: tu abā pīrati baḍhāilu stirī mātra karme
kebaṇa puruṣa mā go kalā biḍambana ẏeḍe utakarme | 793 |
yebaṇa puraku paśi na paranti rudra brahmā
ẏethaku paśite bharasā kalā keuṇa mahātamā | 794 |
rāma kr̥ṣṇara bhagnīṁki se karilā parābhabī | 795 |
sadhu sādhu mahimāṁ ye gāḍha darpa paṇa
sādhu sādhu mahimāṁ se aṭai baḍa jana | 796 |
ke tote biḍambanā kalā go sohodre
bahana paḷāu se na jāṇantu ramacandre | 797 |
sohodrā śrabaṇa lāgi debī pucchanti bārata
mā go tote bidambaṇa kalā ki pāṇḍaba bīra pātha | 798 |
chatrībara sundara se aṭai parama yogī
se hi se pāribanā tote baibhogī | 799 |
muhiṁ tote śaraṇa gali rakṣā karasi go māta | 800 |
tu parama māheśvarī mote karibu nāhiṁ ki rakṣā | 801 |
mā go stirī se jāṇanti sinā stirīṁka bedanā
tuhi mote rakha go hoiṇa bajrasehnā | 802 |
keśa bāsa asambhāḷa hoiṇ adebī kandi | 803 |

div.note: anaṅgabāṇa puṣyaśara ghārilā mote sinā | (ḍa, ḍha)
dantare tiraṇa hāthe koṭhāra gaḷāre bhari | (ḍa, ḍha, gha, ṇa, ta, ja)
baibhogī = bibhogī, biśeṣare bhogī |

lg.l: akuḷe dūṣita go na kali mohora kāẏe | 805 |
bongśe nikaḷaṁka ye sārthuka arama yogī
muhiṁ doṣakr̥ta harili se sāttvika puruṣa lāgi | 806 |
rebatī boile muhiṁ abā karibaiṁ gopya
ẏe kathā gopyāna kale nohi kicchi kāryya
abaśya ukuṭa go hoiba baḍa lāja | 808 |
yadyapi harilā se tote aṭai agyānī
yāu ẏebe arjuna tote dvārikā puru gheni | 809 |
ẏemantara samaẏe satyabhāmā māẏābatī duheṁ hoile prabeśa
rebatī tuṣṭa hoile tāhānta dekhi ẏesanaka bacana śuṇi | 812 |
keuṇa kathā goṭi mā go kahasi āmbhanta | 814 |
bibhā na kari ẏehāku ta kala nāśa | 816 |
āpaṇa ta jāṇa stirīṁkara yebaṇa kathā
bho gosāmaṇī ẏe yebe kāryya kalāka huḍi
stirī kuḷe janami go bistāra na kari | 818 |
yemante āna ẏehā na jāṇanti kehi
nija pure bije kale deba janārddana | 821 |
kapāṭa pāḍi nicinte śaẏana kale phālagune | 825 |
kare arghya gheniṇa ye nandara kumārī
pelai kapāṭa se yantra acchi pāḍi | 826 |

div.note:
‘ṇa’ pothire yantra kabāṭa phitibāra pāiṁ goṭie mantrara
ullekha dekhāyāe –
“pelai kapāṭa se yantra acchi pāḍi” ehi pādānta pare–
māẏābatī mantra manare sumarile
guru mānya kariṇa mantra ādhyāna kale |
mantra–o aṣṭa betāḷa | tumbha nāma dharante phiṭai kabāṭa phāḷa
na phiṭu boli kāhāra āgyāṁ |
śrī māẏābatīṁkara koṭiẏe āgyāṁ |
oñ māẏābatī dile mantra | subhadrā sumarile mantra |
phiṭu yantra kabāṭa | diśilāka bāṭa |
mohora bābu betāḷa mohora bola karibu |
yahiṁki peṣibi tahiṁki yibu |
na yāu boli kāhāra āgyāṁ |
śrī gorekha bīra bitramādityaṁkara koṭiẏe āgyāṁ (ṇa)

lg.l: biṣama anaḷa jāḷā aṭai kāma kheda
yubā yubatīra bheṭe aṅge nuāsai nida | 830 |
rati śāhāsre nirjita se aṭai bīra phālaguni

div.note:
“baṛhilāka ratiraṅga aneka meḷa bhāba” pare – “jha”
phothira adhikā pāṭha :–
biṣama anaṅga laharī kāminī mane kheda
biṣama anargaḷa kāmenī mane kheda |
oñ ulluka kuhuka dila rati
muhiṁ paśai mote kehi na dekhantu dibasa rāti |
na dekhu boli kāhāra ye āgyāṁ
cauṣaṭhi siddhaṁkara koṭiẏeka āgyāṁ |
āpaṇā bāma pada taḷipā dhaileka dhāti
mantra sumari dhūḷi kapāḷe boḷanti |
tahuṁ ye debī bāhuḍi āsai dhāti
samastaṁku dekhinti tāṁku kehi na dekhanti |
ulluka mantra se māẏābatī thile kahi
tāhā sumarile se haraṣa mana hoi |
ẏe mantra paḍhiṇ adebī tahuṁ ye aile
āpaṇā mandire āsi nityakarma sārile |
āho caitana māẏābatī mantra ẏesaneka bidhi
ẏe mantra ye sādhiba kāryya hoẏe siddhi |
sohodrāṁka hāthare yeuṁ mūḷikā acchi
se mūḷikā prasāde arjuna sohodrāku bāndī kariacchi |
svātī nakṣatra śanibāre sāhāṇa malāṅga neba
trisaṁkaṭa ḍeuṁriā pūroi hāthare bānddhale samastaṁku baśa ye kariba | (jha)

lg.l: parastirī parasaṅga nāhiṁ yāhāra pāṣāṇa śarīra | 832 |
uccāṭa mantre tāhāku bhmalāi sohodrā kalā sādhi | 833 |
uluka bidyā paḍhi debī āsai taḍati | 834 |

div.note:
“uluka bidyā paḍhi debī āsai taḍati” ehi pada pare ‘ṇa’
pothire adhika pāṭha |
sododrāṁku rati dile āhuri ẏeka jaḍi
adr̥śya hoiba gheni sehu jaḍi |
yāhāra hāthe thāi tāku samasta diśai
samastaṁku dekhai se tāku kehi na dekhai |
sāṁgrāme jaẏa hoi śatr̥ku jiṇai
saṁśaẏa pheḍiṇa ẏehā kahilāiṁ muhiṁ |
manu boile muni se kebaṇa ye jaḍi
tāhā mote āgyāṁ hoiba yogārūḍhi |
agasti kahile śuṇa ho rājana
se mahā mūḷikā aṭai baḍa jāṇa |
aśvinī nakṣatra maṅgaḷabāre gandha gohirā āṇi
pūbong katire sudhā cera guā deiṇa puṇi |
trisaṁkaṭa ḍeuṁriā kariṇa aṇṭāre rakhithiba
sāṁgrāme jaẏa kari samasta jiṇiba |
mūḷā nakṣatra rabibāre ye ẏehi br̥kṣaru hāde puṇi
uttara bhāgaru guā dei baḍa cera ẏeka āṇi |
luhā ḍeuṁriāre pūroi aṇṭāre rakhithile
paśupātra ādi na kāṭai aṅga hoẏe bhale |
śanibāra śrabaṇā nakṣatre śimūḷi malāṅga āṇile
ḍeuṁriā kariṇa tāhā hāthe bānddhathile |
apāra dūruṁ gamana kari pārai
dudurā malāṅga mathāẏe yebe thāi |

lg.l: baiśākha śukaja pākṣa rātri traẏodaśī bhoga tithi
se rātre baḷarāme palaṁke achanti pahuḍi

div.note: stirī puruṣa rājā samaste hoẏe baśa
ẏe malāṅge durgāṁku mohile śambhuīśa |
āho manu kr̥ṣṇatuḷasī malāṅga karkaṭa saṁtrānti dina
śanibāra anurādhā nakṣatre āṇima |
hāthare ḍeuṁriā kari rakhithiba
tāhāku āṇiṇa ye tahiṁre bānddhaba |
abaśya se prahara aṇabāhuḍa hoiba
saraḷa gacharu ye patra sāta goṭi mathāre rakhithile samasta baśya hoiba |
stirī khopole ye puruṣa baśa hoi
puruṣa khoṣile stirī baśa yāi |
samasta jantu baśya yebaṇa oṣadhe
tāhā tohora āge kahidebā hāde |
lakṣmī nārāẏaṇa hara pābongtī gachamūḷa
indrāẏeṇī gachamūḷa yama nāśenī gachamūḷa |
kuhuka kuṇḍaḷī gachamūḷa, bāibā gachamūḷa |
ẏe daśamūḷa somabāra mr̥gaśirā nakṣatre āṇiba
subarṇṇa ḍeuṁriāre pūroi pāṭasūtāre bekara bānddhaba |
tebe se samaste baśya huanti bhale
jana jantu baśya, īśvare pābongtīṁki baśya kale |
nārāẏaṇa debatā ye lakṣmīṁki baśya kale
candra puṇi tārāgaṇamānanta baśya kale |
suryya kyoti chāḍileṭi tārā debīṁki
pabana debatā baśyakale añjanā mahātmāṇīki |
kāmadeba baśyakale ye kāmakarāḷī
ẏe mantra śikhile nei kāmadeba khoḷi |
eṇu kari mohileṭi sakaḷa jantaṁku
kusuma śare ye mohile samastaṁku |
malāṅga = br̥kṣa biśeṣa, nirmūḷī br̥kṣa, anya br̥kṣopajībī br̥kṣa |

lg.l: svāmī saubhadre tumbhara ye aṭanti sāna bhaẏeṇī

div.note: pabana mahābaḷī hoile ye oṣadhi prasāde
hanumanta laṁkāgalā ẏe oṣadhi malāṅga hāde |
yeuṁ rābaṇa puraku digapāḷe nuāranti paśi
bāṭe gamante pāde huḍanti aharniśi |
se nabare anteśvara puraku hanu galā
rābaṇa mandodarīra śaẏana dekhilā |
oṣadhi prasāde nānā jantu rūpa dhari
cihni nuārile tāku se asura ādi kari |
indura mañjārī kukura brāgha hoi
nānā prakāre cūpa pabeni dharai |
asura māilā, laṁka poḍilā bahani
khaḍage na cchiḍilā pabane na uthilā jaḷe na buḍilā pābeni |
rābaṇa āgare aneka māẏā kalā
āho manu kari pārile yaśa hoẏe bhalā |
kāẏā baḍhai ye aẏuṣa huai
śarīra ārogya samarthyapaṇa dehe thāi |
jaḷe buḍile āpe kiñchite pāri hoi
ẏehā śuṇi rājana muniṁki pachārile
aḷape thāi yebe dūraku na yāi bhale |
samasta janaṁku adurśya hoiba
hātha bega hoi lākha sutrobinddhaba |
nirbhaẏa hoi dehe na bhedaiṁ śahasra
ḍāka śubhiba rupa hoiba adr̥śyā
bho brahmabettā mote ẏemanta āgyāṁ heu
sāṁsārika janamananta upugāra rahu |
rājāra bacana agasti muni śuṇi
ruṣi boile ho śuṇa nr̥pamaṇi |

lg.l: bho debī tumbhara ye tāhāṁku nāhiṁ dekhilā

div.note: jambhodīpa parāẏe sātadīpa āmbhaku diśai
āumāna āmbhanta se adr̥śya nohai |
aneka maṇḍaḷa ẏe saṁsāreṇa acchi
prathame sūryyamaṇḍaḷa tārāmaṇḍaḷa acchi |
iṣitamaṇḍaḷa, brahmamaṇḍaḷ akāuṁrīmaṇḍaḷa, dr̥śyāmaṇḍaḷa śibamaṇḍaḷa lakṣmīmaṇḍaḷa |
mahāśūnyaṇḍaḷa upare nirākāramaṇḍaḷa |
nirākāramaṇḍaḷ aupare parama nirākāramaṇḍaḷa
parama nirākāra upare agni ye maṇḍaḷa |
agnimantaḷa upare nityasthaḷa pura
ẏe sapta maṇḍaḷa upare mahājyoti pura |
ẏe pure rātra dibā jaḷa agni nāhiṁ
pabana jaḷa sthaḷa candra sūryya nāhiṁ |
agamya agocara aśakya alekhya
agamyākāra anyākara alopya |
āmbhemāne teṇu dekhuthāiṁ sabong |
ẏe samaẏe nānādi sthāna āmbhe gamana karu
mahādeba, brahmā, biṣṇu, durgāṁka, āgyāṁ pramāṇaru |
āmbhe agamyaku gamana karu ẏe śikaḍa prasade
mane meru caupāśe āmbhe pheru apramāde |
meru pūbong bāta pacchima bāta lakṣe yojana
meru uttara bāta dakṣiṇa bāta lakṣe yojana |
ikṣu samudra lakṣe yojana pramāṇa
madhu samudra ṣoḷa lakṣa yijana |
ghr̥ta samudra lakṣe yojana bidyamāna
dadhi samudra cauṣaṭhi yojana lakṣa bitapana |
śikaḍa = cera |
prataccche = pratyakṣe |

lg.l: bichāriṇa se kanyā sinā karibā pradāna
uddhaba anādhr̥ṣṭa gale ye driyodhanaku nimantri | 842 |

div.note: kṣīra samudra śate aṭhāaśi lakṣa yojana
ẏemante sapta samudra hoilā duiśa āṭha lakṣa yojana |
pr̥thī gheni hoilā pañchāśa yojanaṭi
se meru taḷaku potā acchi aśikoṭi |
uparaku meru acchi lakṣeka yojana
ẏethi bhitare meru prānte āṭha goṭi pabongta puṇa |
se pabongta uparaku acchi āṭha sahasra yojana
ẏethi bhitare yete mūḷikā mahoṣadhi
amara padārthamāna acchi aneka br̥kṣa ādi |
nadī sarobara kūpa bāmpī taḍāga jora nāḷī hraba
khaṇā khāla ḍiṅgara pabongta ucca nīca ẏethi madhya |
pabongta muṇḍiā bāli māṭi pathara khr̥pa br̥kṣa acchi
ẏe bāhāre kaṇṭā budā ābara laṭālaṭi acchi |
chāihāi patara mañjā mañji yete padārtha acchi
ẏe bāhāre taḷaku sātapura acchi |
prathame pātāḷa, rasāntaḷa, atitāḷa, bitaḷa, bhutaḷa, birukṣatāḷa, sutaḷa
seṭhāru ābara aṭai sabu jaḷa |
sātatāḷa puṇa candra sūryya nāhiṁ
tārā pabana ādi samasa śūnya diśai |
āho caitana tu puccchilu bāratā
ẏe jambhodīpa meru pabongta acchi gahana latā |
lakṣe mukha brahmā yebaṇa kāḷe upujilā
biṣṇaku dhyāẏe kari se samasta bhiāilā |
meru pabongta ye tāhāra tridaṇḍa
samasta mūḷikā mahoṣadhi ẏe pabongte ruṇḍa |
meru pabongte yebaṇa mahoṣadhi acchi
cinti pārilā lokaṁku mr̥tu ye na gaccchi |

lg.l: ẏesaneka smaẏe dūta prabeśa hele yāiṁ | 843 |
chāmure argya dile nei driyodhana rājaku

div.note: yete oṣadha prastāpa tote yeteke kahilu
ẏete ẏete dūre āmbhe tapabaḷe bulu |
jaḷa anaḷ aśūnyare kāhiṁ ye na miśu
roga byādhi bibarjita parama parastāpuṁ |
teṇu ẏe oṣadhimāna āẏatta āmbhara
aḷapa kathā goṭiẏe kahibā ẏebe kara |
ẏeka br̥kṣa goṭie achai meru śr̥ṅgara
se br̥kṣa kḷeśanaśana aṭai nāma tāra |
patara goṭi māpa sāta hāta lamba
īśara paramāṇa patara tāra thamba |
biṣṇu śaṅkha catra cihna tāhāra hr̥daẏa
pabanu se gachuṁ ātayāta hoi āra |
mahāsañcha br̥kṣa ākāśeṇa baṛhiyāi
yama debatā nārāja tāhāra dehe hoi |
phaḷa laṁghi na karāi br̥kṣara aṅga chāhiṁ
phaḷa goṭiẏe pabana debatāra dehī |
indra bajra chaurī yāhāra bakaḷa
tetiśa koṭi debatā gheni sañchile ḍāḷamūḷa |
bakaḷa phaḷa phula hoiṇa sakaḷa
se br̥kṣa mahimā jāṇanti śaṁkara |
se br̥kḍaru āṇimuṁ yebe śikaḍ khaṇḍiẏe
yebaṇa dine āṇimuṁ tāhā śuṇithāa rāẏe |
kārttikamāsa tuḷa saṁtrānti dibasa
śanibāra svātī nakṣatra hoithiba biśeṣa |
yetebeḷare rabi caḷibe taḷaku
beḷa jāṇi srāhāna sari āṇima śikaḍaku |

lg.l: saja sāja samadaṇḍa dvārikāku yibā ẏehikṣaṇe | 847 |
driyodhana āgyāṁ dile chāla dvārikāku yibā | 849 |
baḍāi sambhabonge ye kāli hoibāka bihā
ratha gaja sanya gheni baje kurunāhā | 851 |
aśilakṣa rutha ye bāuna marbhamta hāthī
aneka bīratūra śabada ghana ghana bāji | 853 |

div.note: yebe ẏe gachara phula goṭiẏe miḷiba sedina
tebe āṇi tambā ḍeuṁriāre pūroi karibu ghaṭaṇa |
gaḷāre kaṇṭha taṭare rakhithibu
yahiṁki mana karibu tahiṁki tu yibu |
adr̥śya dr̥śya heba bahuta gamana karibu
amara hoiṇa tu ārogya hebu |
agamye gamya karibu debaloka tu dekhibu |
rāmakr̥ṣṇaṁkara bhagnī sohodrā aṭai
āmbhanta pradāna ye karibe haḷasāīṁ | [kha, cha]
bihā = bibhā |

lg.l: beni koṭi śubhaśaṅkha subarṇṇa bandhāẏeṇa phuri
bihaḍanti rāute ye chokhāra turaṅgama caḍhi | 855 |
mukuṭa bānddha rathare ārohanti sabong sehnā | 856 |
aneka sambhabong thāṭha kahita ki pāri
caḷai samadaṇḍa ye māḍiṇa yūṇa chāri | 857 |
pacha paṭoẏāre se caḷanti thāṭha gheni | 858 |
driyodhanara bara beśa kahita ki pāri
shadeba hasai ye nāsikāre kara bhari | 859 |
bābu ki nimante tu hasilu keuṁṇa prastāpare | 860 |
tu mahā paṇḍita bābu bhūta bhabiṣya gyāṁtā | 861 |
sahadeba boile tāta hoiba baḍāi rasa
ẏe kathāru āna ki hoiba antarai

div.note: asaṁkhaḷī + asaṁkhaḷā, asaṁkhya |
pacha ogāḷe ye chālanti daṇḍa gheni | (ta, gha, ṇa)
pacha hoḷe ye caḷanti thāṭha gheni (kha, cha)
bidure rāmakr̥ṣṇa peṣichanti dūta sabuṁkara bichāra bichāra ẏeka hoi peṣile ẏehānta | (ja, jha)

lg.l: gosiṁha badha kari dvārikāku gale satyabhāmāku ye gheni | 866 |
ẏeka dine śrī jagannātha pucchā kale baḷaāmaṁku
svāmī arjunaku pradāna ki karibā sohodrāku | 780 |
āmbhara samāne bandhu hoi ki samasari | 871 |
driyodhana rājāku debāre āmbhara bahuta pīrati | 872 |
garbheṇa rāga bhari hari tūni ye hoile | 783 |
arjunaku sohodrā saṅge teṇu karāile chorā pīrati | 876 |
aneka bujhānte ye arjuna kalā nāhiṁ | 877 |
sohodrāra bacana yahuṁ arjuna na kalā
teṇukari se mantre baśa hoile sabongsācī
arjuna sohodrā teṇe ẏeka yoga hoiacchi | 879 |
yadyapi driyodhana hoi yiba bara beśe
yujheṣṭhi boile bidura kaha driyodhana rājāku
ẏethu bāhuḍile lāja nāhiṁ nā kāhāku | 882 |
bidure boile ẏehāra baẏara baẏasa alpa, baḍai darpa
śuṇile driyodhana ye kariba āmbhanta kopa | 883 |
āmbhe rahibā yāiṁ chāla raibrata pabongte
prathame rajastirī yehne kicchihiṁ na jāṇai
prathame sājilā thāṭha bodhe ki pherai | 885 |
ẏe kathāre lāja puṇi heucchi bahuta | 887 |
manohara bane rahile sandhyā abakāśa beḷe | 888 |
bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa rahichanti ye paruṣe | 889 |
bidura ye hakāri boile śuṇa ho dvārikāra duta
sohodrāṁku driyidhanaku debāra aṭai ṭiki sata | 890 |
tumbhanta peṣilā dina ke ke thile basi
kāhā kāhā anumate tumbhe hela peṣi | 891 |
sāta bongśa yādabe samaste āstāne chanti pūri
āmbhaṁku āgyāṁ dile samaste sanamata kari | 893 |
bidure boile upādhi jana ke dvārikāẏe acchi
anadhr̥ṣṭa boile gosiṁha kari achai bīra sabongsācī | 894 |
śuṇiṇa rājā driyodhana baḍa sānande boilā
se kanyā pare biḍambaṇ ahoilā āmbhe pāiluṁ bārate | 897 |
driyodhana boile sudriśeṇa catra yeuṇa pura karai rakṣā
mānara chāra hoi paśibāra tahiṁki kāhāra apekṣā | 898 |
ẏeheneka aniryāpa kathā kaha tumbha bhaḷi
ẏemanta jāṇile tāku jīāiṁbeki deba haḷī | 899 |
snāhāna tarpaṇa ye deba pitr̥kāryya sāri | 901 |
anādhr̥ṣṭa uddhaba ye turite āgahoi gale
svāmī bara beśa kari āṇilu kurupati
kṣaṇeka biśrāma nāhiṁ rājā caḷai anubrate | 905 |

lg.note: śubhilā kokiḷ adhvani pāhilā rajanī | (ca, tha)
ratnabeṇī nadīre samasta nityakarma sāri | (ja, jha)
bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa śalya yujheṣṭhi sahite | (ṭa, ña)
sohadra = ahodara ||

lg.l: arjuna boile yeheneka bichāra deba svāmī
baḷadeba boile arjuna bichāraku yogāilā he mādhaba
bibhā yogāḍa gheni raibrataku hua saja | 910 |
bibhāra yogāḍa gheni muṁ yibi ki āga hoi | 911 |
nebi saja kari ye yautuka drabyamāna | 912 |
yāhāku heu abaśya pradāna karibā kumārī | 914 |
samasta saja karante āditya gale asta
driyodhana rājāku ye āṇilu dūta peṣi

lg.note: “yāhāku heu abaśya pradāna kariba kumārī” pada pare
cha, ṇa, gha, ta re bhinnapāṭha :–
samasta saja karante āditya hele asta
caitrakeśarī bane bijaẏe kurunātha |
rudrabeṇī nadī tīre caitrakeśarī bana
tahiṁra kūḷe biśrāmilā driyodhana rājana |
snāhāna bhojana ye sarile samasta |
śaẏana mandire bije kala kurunātha | esamasta pāṭhāntara apapāṭha ||

lg.l: svāmī parare dūṣita hoileṇi tumbhara saubhadre
tumbhe tadanta ẏehā na jāṇa rāmacandre | 919 |
candrabhagna dekhiṇa ye aparate kali pheḍili basana
thana yaubana bidāraṇa nakha danta cihna | 921 |
śuṇiṇa kāmapāḷaṁkara ye na phurai kicchi
svāmī chāmure mithyā kahile ye aṭai mahāpāpa | 924 |
tumbhe deba guruṁka pare ye parama guru
tumbha chāmure ye mithyā kahai nirañjane droha karu | 925 |
sātukīki rāi āgyāṁ dile deba haḷapati
āre ugrasenaku hakāri āṇani mohora kati | 926 |
sambhāra karucchi rāẏe bibhāra yogāḍa yeteka lāgi
amr̥ta rasa pāka yogāḍamāna karanti sambhare | 929 |
kope bolanti tu ye nr̥pati ẏe bhmabane
sohodrā biḍambaṇa hoilā tote na kahanti chāragaṇe | 933 |
ugrasena boile deba sarūpa nohe ẏe kathā
ẏe bhmabane paśite trāsa karai pabana debatā | 934 |
kāhāra sāhasa bharasā ẏe karma karibāku | 935 |
anādi aparṇṇā se mithyā na kahanti | 936 |
ẏehā śuṇi bichāra ye karanti rebatī
adoṣī lokanta ẏe kimpe debe ẏeḍe baḍa śāsti | 938 |
nicaẏe hatyā doṣe muṁ hoibi kāreṇī | 939 |
rebatī boile tumbhe ānaṁku kopa na kara
jāṇiṇa kemante deba na kahibi muhiṁ
adoṣī lokanta nāśile hatyā lāgiba mukuiṁ | 941 |
āgyāṁ pāi sātukī ye caḷai bahane
ṭhākuraṁkara āgyāṁ bije karibā deba svāmī | 944 |

lg.note: ẏe bhmabane na paśai nāśakara debatā | (ta, tha, ḍa, ḍha, ṅa, ṇa)
mādhabi = sātyaki |
lg.l: pāẏe yāiṁ deba ye karanti niuchāḷi
baḷarāme rāge kalyāṇa na kale bāñcchā
ẏemanta kari hari dvārikā karu kire rakṣā | 947 |
bābu āśvāsanā kari poṣiku tu śvāna
ante se tohora mukhe dilāka cumbana | 948 |
bābu goḷakuṇḍā jārajātakā se aṭanti pāṇḍabe
sohodrāku harilā pātha na jāṇuki bāsudebe | 949 |
śuṇiṇa biṣāda ye hoile jagannātha svāmī
svāmī ke tumbhanta kahilā ẏesaneka bāratā
vāmī arjuna ye se aṭai mahāyati
yati nindā kale āpaṇāku paḍai durgati | 952 |
svāmī sujana lokaṁku ye anīti kari kahile
dharma ki gacchiba guru gauraba nindile | 953 |
svāmī tumbhe kimpe ẏehā na kara bichāra
ẏeḍe baḍa bharasā ki acchi pāṇḍaba bibacchara | 954 |
baḷarāme boile tu śuṇa go rebatī
keśabara āge tume kaha yesaneka rīti | 955 |
nānādi kathā kahi stirīhiṁ se karanti manda | 957 |
jāṇi kari pramadā nāma dilā stirī jātiṁku | 958 |

lg.note: śuṇi thambībhuta ye hoile janārddana | (ja, jha)
pramadā = sundarī strī |

lg.l: tumbhe se āpaṇe bhiāṇa kariacha ẏehā | 961 |
catrakūṭa buddhi ki ke sāmaratha heba bābu
nicaẏe tu puṇi aneka ẏethe dvanda bhiāibu | 962 |
driyodhana rājāṁku bola se yāu ye bāhuḍi | 963 |
dekhibā āja arjunaku kehne rakṣā karibe gobinde | 964 |
tiraṇa pramāṇe kari kāṭibi tā māẏeṁsa
uthiṇa gabana ye kaleka deba bege | 968 |
boile śrīhari baḷarāme jāṇile kathā hoilāka phuṭi
sohodrāku gheni dvārikāru yāu ye kirīṭī | 970 |
rātra pāhile arjunara tule hoiba sāṁgrāma | 971 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa āgyāṁ gheni tahiṁ caḷile śatrabatī
arjuna śaẏana mandire yāiṁ miḷile tatakṣaṇānti | 972 |

lg.note: ẏete boliṇa deba āstānuṁ kale bije |
niabakāśa mandire bijaẏe debarāje | (ja, ṭa, ṭha)
lg.l: kabāṭa pheḍha mote saṁpāda kara pātha
rātra pāhile ẏethi aneka dvanda hoiba saṁgrama | 976 |
sohodra bikaḷa ye hoile tāhā śuṇi
tumbhara bhmabanaku svāmī chāla yibā ẏehikṣaṇi | 977 |
kaḷi dvande pirojana nāhiṁ deba kicchi
ābara kimpāiṁ ghuñchāi loḍu kaṭāḷara beḷe | 981 |
caurya paṇe nā muṁ pāibi apachāti | 982 |
ẏemanta kathāmāna mote na kaha saubhadre
āsu kete daṇḍa gheni tumbhara bhāi rāmacandre | 983 |
se kāḷe aneka mate kalai muhiṁ nāsti
arjilā saṁhāthe mora karme yāhā accha | 985 |
muhiṁ nāśa yibi yebe tohora nimante | 986 |
āpaṇāra kalā kr̥taku karma sinā boli

lg.note: pirojana = paraẏojana |
apachāti = apakhyāti |

lg.l: arjuna boile muṁ jāṇaiṁ sabong kathā
kāhāra beḷe anyasthā nuhai kapāḷa ghaṭitā | 989 |
arjuna bolai caḷa go satyabhāmā kahiba jagannāthe
kiñchita daẏā mātra se karithāntu mote | 990 |
nāraẏaṇa agrate ye kahile sakaḷa prati | 991 |
sohodrāra chaḷe abaśya karibi muṁ aneka sāṁgrāma | 993 |
kiñchita daẏā mātra se karithāntu mote | 995 |
padmana śāmba gada mūḷe kumāranta hakarāi
lakṣe chaḍa ahibrata putranta ye rāi | 997 |
sohodrā ẏeṇe ye barilā bīra arjunaku | 999 |
arjuna tule abaśya kāli karibe hāde rāma yuddha
āmbhe kemanta karibā kaha bābu sādhya | 1000 |

āmbhe ta chāḍi nuāru deba bīra dhanurjaẏe
śuṇiṇaparama sānanda ye hoile deba janārddana
ẏesana bichāra karante tini pahara ye rāti
pañcha marbhuta gaja daśa marbhmata aśva yodhī
caubiṁśa br̥nda tule pādānti baḷa khedi | 5 |
rātra prahare thāuṁ se dhāiṁle gupate
arjuna śaẏana mandira yāiṁ beḍhile turite | 6 |
svāmī samadaṇḍa gheni bije kaleṭi baḷabhadre | 7 |
āja tumbha saṅgare se karibe mahāyuddha
anathara bāndhaba tumbhe gheniyāa mote bega | 8 |
kṣatrībara nātha se kādambari pane bhoḷā
sukumāra śarīra goṭi nāśa na kara bahana hoi paḷā | 9 |
amūlya śarīra goṭiki na puṇa paḍai pramāda | 10 |
arjuna boile kimpā trodha karu go sohodre
ẏemanta mānaṁku yebe muhiṁ karai bhrānti
tohora tule kimpe muṁ karanti caurya pīrati | 12 |
māribi sāta bongśa ye ruhāibi kathā
sahodraṁka dukha dekhi na puṇa karu mane byathā | 13 |
tumbhara śarīra goṭi hoithāu ye nirmaḷa | 14 |
mote ta pradāna na kale muṁ hoili ye yubā
muhiṁ mohor aicchāẏe tote baraṇ akali abā | 15 |

lg.note: brahmā surapati gheni āsantu rāmacandre | (ca, gha, ṇa)

lg.l: tuhi se śaraṇa mote rakha phālaguni | 17 |
tumbhara baḷadarpa tumbhe se jāṇa nāhā
muhiṁ stirī mātra mote dharmahiṁ se sāhā | 18 |
svāmī dvārikāru bāhāra tu hua mote gheni
dhyāẏe kari tāhā ye sohodrā sumarilā | 20 |
mane sumarante se pabanahuṁ bege āsi
aneka śahasra tahiṁ ye achai aneka dhanu
se ratha janma hoilā ādi samodra manthanu | 22 |
tetiśa koṭi debatāẏe ye anyuanyo hoi
madhye kāmadebaṁku se ratha dile nei | 23 |
se ratha rati debī ye ati yatne thoithilā | 24 |
toṣe se ratha dile anādi siddhanārī | 25 |
se rathe bijaẏe ye kale phālaguni
se rathe thile ye sādhya huai bhmabana tini 26 |
sohodrāku gheni arjuna bije puṣyeka ratha
satyayuge tārakā yuddhe yehne kumāra bikāśi
sehimati hoiṇa ye arjunara teja parakāśi | 29 |
aneka ratna birājita tāhāra ye kāẏe
diśai ye phālaguni pururabā indra prāẏe | 31 |
lg.note: puṣyeka = puṣpheka |
lg.l: hāboḍā śara ye māilā arjuna mahābīra
dvāre thile sahasre rathī bhāñji hoileka cūra | 32 |
sehnānta bhedī narāja piṭhi kati phuṭi
sehi sarūpe diśai ye bāsabara tanu | 35 |
mane dharante se yāhāra śara bhedī
khāṇḍaba bana dahi ye jiṇilā bibudhādhi | 39 |
īśvaraṁku jiṇi ye kirāta rūpa dhari
gosiṁha badha karilāka sāṁgrāma ghora kari | 40 |
arjunara prahāre ye paḍile aneka bīra | 41 |
bāhāra hoi āsai pātha śara binddha
śate śate yoddhā paḍuachanti ẏekā narāja ghāte bhedī | 42 |

lg.note: bāhāra hoi āsante ye arjuna karai śara br̥ṣṭi |
śate śate yoddhāmāne paḍuchanti mahī loṭi | (ja, jha)
maẏāṇa = madana |
pañchāṇa = siṁha |
bibudhādhi = indra |

lg.l: ẏebe se dvārikā bhmabana śobhāhiṁ pāilā | 45 |
amara pure yesane bijaẏe śacī indre | 46 |
sādhu sādhu sohodrā go tohora jananī | 47 |
sādhu sādhu arjuna boli maṅgaḷa bākya toḷi | 48 |
yebaṇa kuḷe jāta hoilu bongśa tora sādhu
se somabongśe sohodrā go hoilu kuḷabadhū | 49 |
samaste karanti ye jaẏa maṅgaḷa bāṇī
lakṣe ṣāthiẏe sahasra ye bāsudebaṁkara nandana
ārohaṇa kale ye yāhāra gaja aśva yāna | 51 |
sohodrāṁku gheni tahuṁ caḷai pāṇḍaba bibacche
śāmba gada achanti ye arjuna bāma pākha kati
arjunar adakṣiṇa bhāge caṛhi rathe ratho | 54 |
ẏemāne ābori achanti arjunara pacha kati | 55 |
śrī jagannathaṁka bhagati dvārikāẏe yete jana
svāmī dvārikāẏe thilā ye pāntaba phālaguni
rathe basi yāuacchi ye sohodrāṁku gheni | 58 |
lg.note: arjunara yubatī hua aẏi nandara dulaṇī | (ja, jha, ḍa, ḍha,)

aśisahasra kumare ye saṁpakṣa hoiachanti | (ka, ca)
saṁpaksa = samapakṣa, sahāpakṣa |

lg.l: haḷa mūṣaḷa gheni ye bāhāra debarāẏe | 59 |
āho ugrasena dhāaṁ gheni tohora thāṭha
bḷe sohodrāku gheni yāucchi pāṇḍaba pāpiṣṭha | 60 |
sāta bongśa yoddhāẏe paḍile sabonge māḍi | 61 |
garjana nāda kariṇa dhāmanti sabong chatrī | 62 |
dakṣiṇe saunanda mūṣaḷa bajra laṅgaḷa bāma hāthe | 64 |
udegiri pabongta prāẏe pratakṣe diśanti deba haḷī | 65 |
re re kāra śabade kampai brahmāṇḍa | 66 |
kāhāku ẏeḍe kopa kara deba svāmī | 68 |
bolanti bhmajaṅgadhāraṇa śuṇa re bābu kr̥ṣṇa
bhagnīki hari neuacchi pāṇḍaba pāpiṣṭha arjuna | 69 |
ābara pratagyāṁ dekhi cauryapaṇe ẏeḍe darpa
baḷātkāre hari niai ye tāra ẏeḍeka pratāpa | 70 |
māẏeṁsa kāṭibi tāra tiḷa prāẏe kari | 71 |
mānabe utapatti hoi tāra ẏeḍeka pratagyāṁ

div.note: māẏeṁsa kāṭibi tāra tiraṇa prāẏe kari | (ketaka pāṭha)

lg.l: gobinde boile deba kopa kara śānti
arjunara kisa doṣa āmbhara bhagnī manda jāti | 73 |
ẏeḍe baḍa bongśe jāta hoi upekṣā kalā lajjā
bandhu kuṭumba sahodra sabu kalā paritejyā | 74 |
yubā kanyku heḷāẏe āmbhe na kalaiṁ pradāna
bajranābha pradāna ye na kalā dohitī
bibhā na kalā ye bāṇāsura uṣā nāme kumārī
yubā kanyā āhe deba mātāpitā ghare thile
lajjā anyathā nohiba deba kopa ye saṁhara | 79 |
arjuanku jiṇi nuāribāṭi upujiba bahuta lāja | 80 |
abichāre kopa kale āpaṇe hoẏe dhaṁsī
agyāne dvanda kale sampada hoẏe nāśi | 81 |
khāṇḍaba bana dahana kalā agnira nimante
toṣe aneka śahasra dile baśyānara daibate | 82 |
kirāta rūpe jiṇilā ẏe īśvara debatāṁku
toṣa aneka śahasra dile se arjunaku | 83 |
akṣaẏe troṇa beni se dileka pabongtī
trailokye jiṇantā se hoilā suta kontī | 84 |
ṭaskara jana yehne na śuṇai dharmabāṇī | 85 |
baḷarāme boile tumbhe bahana hoa saja

div.note: toṣeṇa pāśupatra śara dileṭi arjunaku | (ja, jha, ña)

lg.l: baḷarāmaṁka tahuṁ ẏesanaka niṣṭhaura bacana śuṇi
tāḷadhvaja rathe bije kale deba haḷī
baḷarāme boile tohora kare catra nāhiṁtya banamāḷī | 88 |
gobnde boile muṁ na jāṇaim tadanta
kaumodakī boile muṁ na jāṇaiṁ tadanta
kaumodakī gada sudriśeṇa catra nāhiṁ mohora hātha | 89 |
teṇu kari svāmī muṁ hoicchi śūnya hātha | 90 |
tonora bichāre ẏehi ariṣṭi kalāka arjune | 91 |
atihiṁ abheda kalu ye pāṇḍaba hīna jāti
satyabanta loka sinā sahodre rakṣā karanti | 92 |
ẏekā bhārijā ramaṇe pāñche nianti dina | 93 |
laghu janaṁku hari kalu ye biśvāsa
āpaṇe dhaṁsi hoilu kāryya ye hoilā nāśa | 94 |
andheka badha kāḷe yesane diśanti ẏiśanti kapāḷī
nirdhūma agni jāṇi arjuna śarīra parajaḷi | 96 |
lalāṭe kasturī citā karṇṇe amr̥ta kuṇḍaḷa beni
śire sīmanthinī sañchilā ye aṣṭaratna gheni | 98 |
hr̥dara padaka bāheṇa tāḍa toḍhara bāhuṭi

lg.note: nirdhūma agni jāṇi ye arjuna teja jhaḷi | (ja, jha)
karṇṇe karṇṇāñchaḷa mekhaḷā birājai kaṭi | (keteka pāṭha)
kanaka añchaḷa gaṇḍasthaḷe mahālekhana birāja kaṭi | (keteka pāṭha)
lg.l: bhmajare kaṁkaṇa ye pāde nepūra beni
tāḷadhvaja rathe yāiṁ dekhile svāmī baḷabhadre
baḷarāme boile tu dekha re śribatsa
āmbhaṁku bhaẏe bhrānti na kalā pañchumane
gobinde boile svāmī śarīre thile baḷabīryya
śauryyabanta loke sinā karanti caurya karyya | 104 |
āre āre pāṇḍabā yibuṁ āja kāhiṁ
ẏe mohora bhagnīki tu harilu kebaṇa darpe
khagabara chāmure ki darpa karanti kāḷasarpe | 107 |
trailokya madhyare āja ke tote karu rakṣā | 108 |
prīti buḍailu tuhi stirī mātra lobhe
tohore nāśa gale yujheṣṭhi rāja debe | 110 |
keuṁṇa darpe yāuchu re mohora bhagnīki gheni | 111 |
lg.note: hemabanta bimāne yehne diśanti sahasra yoni | (aneka pāṭha)
sarupa doṣa ẏehāra sahibā kesane | (ka, kha, ca, cha, ña)
samaratha loke sinā karanti caurya | (ja, jha, gha, ṇa, ta)
lg.l: sumara re pāṇḍabā tohora mātā pitā
sumara re pāṇḍabā tohora iṣṭakuḷa debatā | 112 |
mohora kicchi doṣa nāhiṁ tumbhe bichāra baḷadeba | 114 |
tohora bhagnīki deba na kalu tu rakṣā
āpaṇe svaẏambarī hoi se mote kalā icchā | 115 |
starī liṅga hoi mote harilāka baḷe | 116 |
tu deba trailokya nātha aṭu saṁtriṣaṇa
na bichāri kopa mote karuchu akāraṇa | 117 |
prāṇa gheni ẏethuṁ tumbhe ghuñchi yāa yā beni bhāi
ẏeḍe baḍa sampada na buḍāa sohodrāra pāiṁ | 120 |
micheheṁ pratagyāṁ mote na kara deba saṁtriṣaṇa
phuṭuki bidyā kahile nohaiṭi baḍa paṇa | 121 |
tumbhara bhagnī ye mote kalāka anīti
ghuñchi yāa svāmī tumbhara āmbhara thāu prīti | 122 |
āre āre arjunaku dhara boli bolanti baḷadebe | 123 |

lg.note: tohora anīti mote heucchi abidhi | (ḍa, ḍha, tha, ca, ga, ṭha, kha)
arjuna pratagyāṁ śuṇile gāḍha pahija
arjunaṁku dhikārī boile debarāja | (aneka pothi pāṭha)
lg.l: bindhanti nārāja ye abicchanne samasta yādaba bīre
kakaḍā br̥ṣṭi jāṇi śare paḍanti upare
śara garjana ye dhanu ṭaṁkāra bāṇī | 127 |
dhara dhara māra māra śubhmacchi ghora bobi
maẏeṁṣā badha kāḷe yesane ḍākanti bhairobī | 128 |
arjunaku pacha kari padmana hoilāka āga | 129 |
śāmba gada padmana ye atrūra sātukī
arjunaku pacha kari padmana hoilāka āga | 129 |
śāmba gada padmana ye atrūra sātukī
arjuan katire hoi uṭhile thāṭha dekhi | 130 |
dekhiṇa yādaba baḷe ye paḷāile bhāñji | 132 |
kāhāra tule svāmī āmbhe karibuṁ samare | 133 |
lakṣe ṣāṭhiẏe sahasra bhrathanta gheniṇa padmana
ke samara kariba se padmanara tule
tetebeḷe nasti kimpā na kalu tu muku | 137 |
lg.note:
gobindara putra yahuṁ uṭhile thāṭha dekhi |
dekhiṇa yādaba baḷa paḷāile samare śahasranta upekṣi | (gha, ṇa, ta, ṅa, ca)
maẏeṁṣā = mahiṣāsura |
pahuḍanti = śastra dhari ubhā hoiachanti |

lg.l: ẏeṇe lajjā mote ye hoilā apramiti | 138 |
āmbhe abā icchā kalāiṁ baḍa jaṇe debāku
ye yāhāra kanyā nemanāhiṁ ki sehi
āmbhara dvanda kale kāryya kāhiṁ rahi | 141 |
badanti agasi śuṇ aho baibasuta manu
barabeśe samadaṇḍa gheni ailā gāndhārīra tanu | 142 |
kauroa rājā āge bāratā yāi kahiṁ | 144 |
śuṇa debādhi deba rājeśvara nr̥pati cūḍamaṇi
sāta bongśa yādaba baḷa gheni kr̥ṣṇa baḷarāma
yābata kāḷe pāṇḍabe mote karanti anīti | 148 |
āho bhīṣma droṇa bidura tumbhe bujhila kemanta
tumbhe se ẏeka yoga kari loḍa pāṇḍabanta | 149 |
baḷatkāre arjuna sohodrāṁku harilā dvārikāẏe paśi | 151 |
lg.note: ẏe trailokye lajjā mote karāilu śrīpati | (gha, ṇa, ta, ṭa, ḍa, ḍha)
dhātā ye ghaṭasūtra kariacchi sohodrā arjunaku | (ka, ja, ṭa, jha
basudeba nanda kr̥ṣṇa kāmapāḷa anumate | (aneka pāṭha)
lg.l: bhīṣme boile āmbhe sahadeba mukharu śuṇiluṁ
kimpā āmbhe kanakabhadrā nadī kūḷaru tote bṣhuḍāi loḍilu | 152 |
āmbhara bacana tu ho ye na kalu kurudebā
ẏebe ẏethuṁ kemante āmbhe lajjāpāi bāhuḍiṇa yibā | 153 |
driyodhana boilā ho aṭaiṭi ki ẏemanta
yadyapi rudra brahmā indra āditya deba saṁpākṣa huai
trailokya madhe āja ke arjunaku rakhai | 155 |
caḷāa re thāṭha mora arjuna katiki
bhīmasena kopa kalā driyodhana kopa dekhi | 156 |
bāāna bāāna bhāra gadā beni kare gheni
yujheṣṭhi boile bābu raha raha bhīma
arjuna tule sāṁgrama karatni kr̥ṣṇa baḷarāma | 158 |
yābata kāḷe hari āmbhanta karai rakṣā
tāhāra kopa kale āmbhara kisa kakṣā | 159 |
yujheṣṭhi boile bābu śuṇa re sahadeba
śrīhari arjuna beni bhāba ki abhāba | 160 |
jagannāthaṁka bola śuṇi arjuna sohodrāku harile | 161 |
yadyapi baḷarāme kale yuddha arjunaṁka tule
dhanu catra gadā sahite hari arjunaṁku dile | 163 |
lakṣe ṣāṭhiẏe sahasra aśi suta jagannāthaṁkara
arjunaṁku ābori yādabaṁka tule karanti samara | 164 |
bhīmasenaku boile bāṭa kaḍhāa re bhāi
arjunara ta hiṁki chāla yibā bega hoi | 166 |
bhīma boilā driyodhana daṇḍa gheni paḍuacchi māḍi
pachakati diśai tumbhara se keuṁṇa rājāra saini | 170 |
dekhi ratha gaja aśva nr̥pati kurudeba | 171 |
sahasre pura kari arjunaku beḍhile rājadeba | 174 |
mandara khuā kari yehne debatāẏe manti | 176 |
ẏeheneka kauroba yādaba baḷa hoile bārānidhi
arjuna mandara yehne manthai ye dadhi | 177 |
kurubaḷa thāṭha manthana ye karai sabongsācī
asaṁkhya dekhi biṣāda se hoile śrībacchi | 178 |
driyodhanara thāṭha dekhi se bīra brikodara

div.note: arjunara ratha khuā hoi samastaṁku rodhi | (ṭa, ṭha)
arjunara ratha mandra giri, tahiṁki pātha mahāyodhi | (gha, ṇa, ta)

lg.l: bāāna bāāna bhāra gadā beni kare gheni
haḷ amūṣaḷa gheni āpaṇe paśile sāṁgrāme | 181 |
bidyādara puruṣe na rahile gagana maṇḍaḷe | 183 |
baḷarāmaṁka bhīṣmarmūrtti dekhi ho bīra pātha
kesaneke śarīra dharibi muṁ svāmī dukhe | 187 |
arjuna boile sakhī miche noha bāi
ẏemanta kathāre go āmbhanta ki pāi | 188 |
ẏethu anantare baḷarāmaṁka sannadhe prabeśa kurupati
bhīṣma droṇa duheṁ rathuṁ ohlāile tatakṣaṇānti | 190 |
baḷarāme boile tumbhe śuṇa ho gāṅgeba

div.note: ẏehikṣaṇi aneka roḷa karibe haḷahasta | (ta, gha, ṇa, cha)
kehi na bratibaṭi baḷarāmaṁkara ḍāke | (gha, cha, ḍa, ḍha)
kehi na bratibaṭi baḷarāmaṁkar kope | (aneka pāṭha)
ẏemanta kathāre ki mbhaku jiṇai | (ṭa)

lg.l: na jāṇi arjuna doṣa kalā abā | 194 |
kuru pāṇḍaba deba nohanti bhinna bhinna
ye driyodhana pratakṣe se aṭai arajuna | 195 |
mohora tahiṁ thāi pāṇḍabaṁku aneka senehā | 196 |
jībante pāṇḍabanta na thoibi muhiṁ āja | 198 |
khāṇḍaba bana dahana kari jiṇilā amarādhi
agniki toṣa kalā ye deiṇa mauṣadhi | 200 |
se pāntabāsura māri tumbhakaiṁ kalā rakṣa | 201 |
ẏe dvāpara yuge hāde arjuna aṭai bhāroi malla

div.note: mohora anna khāi pāṇḍabanta hoichanti sāhā | (ṭa, cha)

lg.l: tāhā sumaraṇā kala ye arjuna baḷabantā | 211 |
pināka dhanu prabeśa ye māẏābatī ratha | 212 |
bābu minaketana ture ẏe rathare basa | 213 |
se rathare basilā ye rukmiṇī nandana | 214 |
kauroba thāṭha se ye āborilā bega | 215 |
samastaṁka kare diśai śaṅkha catra cihna | 216 |
śrībhmaje dhanu dhari se nārāẏāṇa baḷā
paḍanti nārāje yesaneke ākā śuṁ bajrasūci
baḷīẏāra chorara ho pratagyāṁ puṇa dekha | 219 |
ābara yuddha kari loḍai āmbhara saṅgare | 220 |
kope haḷa mūṣaḷa ye bulāi deba haḷī
trailokye pāṇḍabā re āja kehu tote rakhu | 222 |
arjuna boile rāma pīrati baḍa jaṇa
sāṁgrāma kale ke kāhāku occha puṇa | 223 |

div.note: sāṁgrāma kale ke kāhku uddhāraṇa | (aneka pāṭha)
occcha = hrasva, laghu |

lg.l: kaicchā jagajeṭhī muṁ dukhī janaṁka sodara | 224 |
tu yebe mohora tule hoibu abhāba
ẏekā arajuna muṁ tu sahasre baḷadeba | 226 |
prasanne parama bandhu muhiṁ trailokya bhmabana ghoṭi
bajra mūṣaḷa bulāile rāma uprodha upekṣi | 228 |
koṭiẏe kabā dhanu dhaile ye rohiṇīra tanu | 229 |
ākreṣi nārāja ye peṣile puṇa puṇi | 231 |
ẏekā śahasra jyoti āditya teja prāẏe
pahuḍai bāsabi ye śrīkare nārāja gheni | 233 |

div.note: śara sambhāḷiṇa deba halapāṇi | (ṭa, ga)
deba śahasra ye prahāra kale haḷapāṇi | (aneka pāṭha)
śahasraku śahasra ye arjuna prābhabi | (ṭa, ṅa, gha, ṇa, ḍa, ḍha, cha)
baḷarāmaṁka śahasramāna ye paḍu acchi bhmabi | (ḍa, ḍha)
bhagatamatsaḷa = bhagatabatsaḷa |

lg.l: nārada bije kale daṇḍa bīṇā bāi
kaḷi kutohoḷa dekhibā peṭa ye pūroi | 236 |
lāgu lāgu sāṁgrāma ye hou raṇaraṅga
sādhu re pāṇḍabā jībana tohora dhanya dhanya aṅga | 237 |
lāghaba śare yahuṁ rāma nuārile jiṇi
kope prahāra kale se deba saṁtriṣeṇa | 240 |

div.note:
“kaḷi kutohoḷa dekhibā peṭa ye pūroi” pāṭha pare
“ka o ṭa” re bhinna pāṭha :–
lāgu lāgu boli kaḷi dhokaḍiru pakāile dhūḷi ye muṭhāẏe
kautuke muni khemaṭā nāṭa kaẏe
ṣāṭhiẏe sahasra kaḷi munīre pūroi
niti gheni buluthānti nārada goṣāīṁ |
se kaḷi muṇiki halāi dhūḷi pakāile
lagilā kaḷaha mahā kopānaḷe |
bhāriyā kaḷi, mā dhokaḍi, jhia kāṇḍoī
pua kaḷaha, āpe kaḷaha gheniṇa bulai |

“ohobaḷa thāṭhe arjuna mahāyodhi” pāṭha badaḷare ‘kha’
pothire pāṭha :–
beni jaṇa pakānti beniṁkara śira chedi |
kr̥tāntaka śara ye māile baḷadeba
sūryya śara māri tāhā chedile pārthiba |
kr̥tāntaka śara yahuṁ arjuna ye chedi
tāha dekhi baḷarāma hele mahātrodhi |
asra chedante ghenile amoha śakati
arjuana uparaku binddhale haḷapati |
anaḷa jāṇiṇa śakatir ateja
ākreṣiṇa binddhale rohiṇī tanuja |

lg.l: rāmara nirghāta bāṇa bege pakāilā chedi | 241 |
arjuna rakha boli śubhilā ghora bāṇī
rāmara śahasra dhāramāna samasta chedilā kirīṭī | 247 |
bhmaja bāṇa boli kari ye anādi deba śara
se bāṇa śrīkare ye ghenile nīḷāmbara | 248 |
apalaṭaka śara se na jiṇile na bāhuḍai
yāhaku peṣiba tāhāku abaśya nāśa karai | 249 |
aṣṭāṅge jiṇi nuāri tāhā nīḷāmbara peṣai
praḷaẏa kāḷa prāẏeka bāṇa āsanteṇa diśai | 250 |
se bhmajabāṇa dekhante paḷāile sakaḷa saini
ẏekā rathe rahilā pātha sohodāku gheni | 251 |
samasta bhmabana byāpilā ye bhmajabāṇara teja
peṣante sakaḷa brahmāṇḍa ki hoiba dahija | 252 |
ẏe nīḷabāṇa peṣi arjuna tu bhmajabāṇa kara saṁgharaṇa | 254 |

div.note: dhātikāre māile deba nidrābatī bāṇa | (gha, ga)
dhāramāna | prakharatā |

lg.l: ẏehā śuṇi nīḷabāṇa peṣile bāsabara baḷā
baḷarāmaṁka bhmajabāṇa se garbhe saṁharaṇa kalā | 255 |
ākāśe tridaśa deba kale jaẏe jaẏe
ājahuṁ bijaẏa nāma tora hou boile surarāẏe | 256 |
puṣya br̥ṣṭi kale deba arjunara mātha
tahuṁ bijaẏa nāma pāilā bīra pātha | 257 |
bahuta sāṁgrāma se ye hoilā raṇa madhya | 258 |
bahuta samara śāmbara tule karai dhuśāsana
gada kumara tule durjaẏara samara anukṣaṇa | 259 |
sahadebara saṁge samara karai śakuni mahāmantrī | 260 |
bhīṣaṁkara tule akrūra yuddha karai ḍāka | 261 |
bhūrisabongāṁkara tule se samara karai aneka | 263 |
karṇṇara ratha dhari se pakāilā bhāñji | 266 |
bhājiṇa cūra ye hoilā ratha beni

div.note: ājahuṁ dhanurjaẏe nāma tora hou boile surarāẏe | (gha, ña, ṭha, ka)

lg.l: aneka sanya samare māilā śaẏambara airi | 270 |
mahiṣā nāśa kāḷe yehne bihaḍanti kātyāẏanī
śveta hāthī ẏeka caḍhi deba dharma ye yujheṣṭhi
śrī jagannāthakara sannidhe yāiṁ tāṁku bheṭi | 273 |
yujheṣṭhiṁki dekhiṇa se jagamohana ye svāmī
ratha teji yāiṇa ṭhākuraṁka sannidhe pariṇāmi | 274 |
kara prasāri dharme kalyāṇa ye bāñcchi
āṣya ārogye tohora apāda khaṇaṇa hou ho śrībacchi | 275 |
bābu ẏeḍeka anīti kimpe kalāka arjuna | 276 |
abichāre pātha kimpā baḷātkāra kari hari | 277 |
bābu tohora thāuṁ kimpe ẏeḍeka paramāda
tumbhara tule kimpā āmbhara ẏeḍe dvanda | 278 |
āja ẏethuṁ kehu yibeki deha gheni | 279 |
hari caubiṁśa yojana ẏe raibrata pabongta
dhr̥tirāṣṭa poẏe na puṇa hoanti prāṇatyāja
arjunaku samādhāna ki rūpe karibā debarāja | 281 |
ke kāhāra sodara yoke kāhāra prīti
svāmī ẏeheneka samara karucchi tohora bhāi
brahmā rudra indra ke miliba tāra āge | 286 |
mote ẏe agocara boli bolanti śrībacchi | 287 |
śasraṁkara teje paḍile deba dahija hoibā | 288 |
āreka bāṇa ye chaichāḍe galā gaḷi | 290 |
droṇa asaṣṭame ye paḍile moha yāiṁ
gada kumara gadā nei piṭilā abhuta | 292 |
śate bhāra garu ye gadā bhārā pāi
droṇaṁku koḷa kari aśastamā padile nibujāi | 293 |
dhāmanti śalye ye boliṇa āre āre
bajra mudugara piṭile dei gada kumara upare | 295 |
dekhiṇa gada kumare tāhā bāma bhmaje dhari
śalya mahārathī hātaru gadā ghenile uchuḍi | 296 |
lg.note: droṇaṁku koḷa kari aśastamā moha yāi | (ṭa)
lg.l: sehi gadā gheniṇa ye neuṭāi piṭi
droṇaṁka aṅgare śalya paḍile mahī loṭi | 297 |
droṇa guru aśastamā ābara bībabara śalya
ghumāiṁ acete paḍile tahiṁ bhāroi kuḷa malla | 298 |
gadā paḍi tāhāra ye bhāñjilāka buku | 299 |
dhāmaiṁ māruti ye tahiṁ hoiṇa paracaṇḍā | 300 |
nohai nohai svamī ẏe kautuka yuddha
sodara nāśa kimpā karibā raṇa madhya | 302 |
aneka ratha saini piṭi kalā dhūḷi | 304 |
śāmba kumāra gada kumāra baḷīẏāra padmana
ẏe chāri kumāre yāṁ bheṭile rājā driyodhana | 305 |
pañchāśa koṭi ratha ābara gaja pāñcha khabong | 306 |
mukuṭa bandhā yoddhāẏe achanti lakṣa chāri | 307 |
aśva pādānti baḷa tahiṁ pañchāśa koṭi marbhmata | 308 |
bhaṇḍārakara dhana mūḷa ẏekā kṣatrī goṭikara
ẏe bidhire lakṣe chatra dharā yoddhā achanti driyodhana chāmura | 309 |
āmbhara thāṭha dekhi dhāiṁle chāri bīre
paśile raṇa raṅge ye manthana kale thāṭha
gahaḷa thāṭha dekhi se bihaḍanti kumāre
nāāje paḍi cūra heuchanti tāhāṁka upare | 313 |
gola yuddha kale thāṭhe ye paḍilā hālahoḷi
ajaṁkara hābuḍa ghāte ratha hele dhūḷi | 314 |
samare goḷa dhandoḷa ye hoilā mahāroḷa
yama bije kale ki kāḷadaṇḍa gheni | 316 |
dhuṁānti gaja yūtha mathāre aṁkuśanta khundi
thorahasta dhari kachāḍai achāgaḷa bhīma mahāyodhi | 328 |
gada kumara mahimāṁ na yāi gocara
śāmba gada padmana ẏe tini kumāranta
ẏehāṁka rūpa dekhi yodhāmāne hoile śaṁkita | 320 |
sabu kumāre diśanti biṣṇu teja prāẏe | 321 |

lg.note: beḍhile kaurabaṁku chāri se murāṭa | (ḍa, ḍha)
bindhanti nārāja se piṭānti mudugare | (ja, ṅa, ca, ka)
keśarī teja prāẏe kopeṇa anargaḷā | (ja, jha)
yodhā = yoddhā |
lg.l: śāmba gada padmana ẏe kumāra tini
thāṭha bhagna kale se saṅgeṇa pābeni | 324 |
raṇa bhagna hoi yahuṁ paḷāile kaurobe
gadā bulāiṇa se ye gada kumara
hāthīra kumbha sthaḷa ye bhājilā gadābara bighāte
paḍilā maẏematta jaja ye garjiṇa bhūmigate | 327 |
puṇi saturi bhāra gadā gheniṇa ārambha kurupati | 328 |
pacheṇa dhāiṁlā puṇi gada ye kumāra
pabongta prāẏe kari bujāi bīra piṭi
bābu chāḍa chāḍa keśa boile padmana
gada kumara boilā svāmī ẏehāre samasta dvandamāna | 332 |
āgyāṁ dia khaḍage ẏehāra pakāibi muṇḍa kāṭi
ẏekā ẏehāra nāśa gale sarai araṣṭi | 333 |
padmana boilā ẏehāku na kara bairāga

lg.note: pare “ṭa” pothire adhika pāṭha :–
pacheṇa dhāmaiṁ gada kumāra
raha raha boli ogāḷilā āgara |
huṁkāra śabada kari gadā piṭilā dhātikāre
mohe driyodhana paḍilā bhumire |
pabongta prāẏe paḍilā dhr̥tirāṣṭi
niceṣṭe mānagobinda paḍilā tumi loṭi |
gada kumara boilā svāmī kāṭibi ẏehāra badana | (ḍa, ḍha, gha)

lg.l: svāmī driyodhana rajāra teṇe heucchi śirakāṭa | 335 |
kumāramāne ye driyodhanaku nele keśa dhari
tāhāṁku loḍanti ye prāṇe nāśa kari | 336 |
rāgeṇa gheni le deba saunana mūṣaḷa | 338 |
baḷarāmaṁka bhīṣma rūpa dekhiṇa arjuna mahākope
baiṣṇabī catraku pātha dhariacchi dakṣiṇa kara | 341 |
bāma kare dhariachi kaumudī gadā teja
arjuana chāmuku dhari āṇī dile śaambara airi | 343 |
driyodhana keśa dhari gadakumara bāma pāṇi
dakṣiṇa kare khaḍaga bulāuchi kr̥tānteka jāṇi | 344 |
sodara nāśa yāuacchi boli se hoile mahākaṣṭi | 346 |
hāthī tejyā kari driyodhanaku kale koḷe
raha raha gada boli āge ogāḷile baḷe | 347 |
pradyumnara mukha chāhiṁ se badanti yujheṣṭhi
mohora prāṇara ballabha ẏe sodara bhāi goṭi | 348 |
lg.note: trailoky ghoṭilā se nīlāmbaraṁka sarūpa | (ja, ga, ḍa, ḍha, ña)
śaambara = śambara asura |

lg.l: ẏe mahātmā kiẏe svāmī kimpe ẏehāku āboranti | 349 |
ẏehāṁkara kaniṣṭha se ye aṭanti bīra dhanurjaẏe | 350 |
driyodhana rājāṁku dile keśa bandhanu pāri kari | 352 |
baḷarāme dekhile ye arjunara jyoti kānti
māẏādhara māẏā se ye kaleka hr̥ṣīkeśi
narasiṁgha mūrtti jāṇi pratakṣe ārtha diśi | 355 |
yahuṁ se dekhile arjunara bhīṣma mūrtti
kopa saṁhari deba hoile śānti mūrtti | 357 |
tuhi se arjuna hoi pāṇḍaba dhanurjẏe
tuhi se pārthiba ho sādhu tora kāẏe | 359 |
micheheṁ dvanda āropili tote muṁ na cihni | 360 |
ẏekā śarīra tohora pratakse rudra brahmā | 361 |

lg.note: arjuna tumbha ye aṭā ẏeka ātmā | (ja, jha)

lg.l: ye se hari se pratakṣe arajuna
baḷarāmaṁka pāde śate sahasra daṇḍa pariṇāmi
alaṁghita doṣa mora kṣamā karibāka deba svāmī | 366 |
niceṣṭa baḷa śānti se hoile sāṣṭāma | 367 |
binaẏa bhāba hoi se pāṇḍaba sundara
aneka tusti karai se svāmī nīḷāmbara | 369 |
namaste sapata śākhā ṣohaḷa naẏana kuṇḍaḷī | 372 |
namaste bajra lāṅgaḷī dāruṇa dukha bhañjā | 376 |
namaste abodha bodhana tuhi deba baḷarāma
namaste kautuka puruṣa tuhi sabong kāma | 379 |
namaste namaste deba tu deb prāṇapati
namaste akhiḷa jagata rūpa ādi nāthā | 381 |
svāmī chāri yuga yāhāra nimiṣeka kahi
śṇākāra puruṣa tote na cihnanti kehi | 383 |
teṇu kari hr̥daẏare bhābai sāroḷā dāsa muni | 385 |
śuṇa ho sugyaṁ jane ẏe ṭi śrī mahābhāratha
siddha kāntāẏenī go sāroḷā caṇḍī mūrtti
pitāmahara śāpe se sāroḷā caṇḍī mūrtti
ātmā toṣilu se ye śoṇite triputi | 388 |
anubarate bara yāci diai toṣa mane | 389 |

lg.note: pitāmahara nandinī se aṭai baiṣṇabī
ātmā sādhilā śiśumunā beda bhābi [ja, jha]
pitāmaha yoge hoilā ādiyognī
ātmā toṣilā se śrīkr̥ṣṇa bhāba gheni | (ka)

lg.l: budha jana raṁjana bhābe sāroḷā dāsa mor anāma | 391 |
ẏe ṭi śrī mahābhāratha amiẏa rasa kathā
binoẏī bhagati māgai sāroḷā dāsa bhāratha gīte | 393 | || 1393 ||
lg.head: {@subhidrā pariṇaẏa@}

lg.l: tu ye pucchākalu yudha rohiṇīra tanu | 1 |
samasta jiṇilā patha bijaẏe ẏeka rathe | 2 |
baḷarāme bije kale dvārikāẏe arjunaku gheni | 3 |
pure acchaba se ye kale janārddana
prohite gheni bichāra karanti bibhāra bidhāna | 4 |
arjunaku gheni bijaẏe dharma yujheṣṭhi ṭhākura
samadaṇḍa gheni rājā bijaẏe karu āsa
sohodrā arjunaku bibhā karāu āpaṇe basi | 7 |
ẏehā śuṇiṇa bidure caḷile bega hoi
pabanahuṁ bege yāiṁ bidure mānagobindaṁku bheṭi
bābu mote rāi paṭhiāile dharma ye yujheṣṭhi | 9 |
lg.note: bhāinta gheniṇa dharma yujheṣṭhi nr̥pabara | (ja, jha)
nandinī = ānandadāẏinī |
yudha = yuddha |

lg.l: bāṭe āsu āsu āmbhe kahilu nāhiṁki tote | 11 |
kemante yibaiṁ juhiṁ pāilāiṁ baḍa lajjā | 13 |
ẏebe āmbhara ucchba kimpāiṁ na yibā
tebe se āmbhara kuḷaku huantā baḍa lāja | 17 |
bichāra kara ẏebe tumbhe pāṇḍabe noha dvandī
agni debatāṁku toṣa kalā deiṇa mauṣodhi | 21 |

lg.note: bairoṣi = biśeṣeṇa roṣi, trodhayukta, birasi, bibādī |
lg.l: āho driyodhana māna tejyā kara bābu
ẏebe bāhuḍi gale paibu kāryya sabu | 24 |
bāhuḍi yiba chāla kicchi na bichāri kāraṇa | 25 |
yadyapi āmbhe ho rāga kariṇa na yibā
āmbhara na gale ki rahiba tāra bibhā | 26 |
kathā mātra rahiba nā samasta kāḷaku
ẏebe yibā yogāi se āmbhara manaku | 27 |
uṭha boli mānagobindara dhaileka dui hātha | 29 |
śakuni boile bhīṣme boile yeuṁ bāṇī
mohora bichāraku bhala prāẏe na maṇi | 32 |
bhaganasta hoiṇa chāhiṁbā kāhāra mukha yāiṁ | 33 |
manda se kalu ābhe ailu paḷāi
dvārikāre ẏebe kāhā mukha chāhiba āmbhe yāiṁ | 35 |
yatane bandhu paṇe āmbhe āsantu bije kari | 37 |
lg.note: gupate arjunaku achanti ẏeṇe bari
yatane ẏemāna sañchile deba hari | (keteka pāṭha)
lg.l: śaka ni boilā thāṭha caḷāa hastināku
ābara kisa bhābare yiba tumbhe pāṇḍabaṁki ṭhāku | 38 |
nanā bādya śabade śubhai garu dhuni | 39 |
bidura sahite gale ye tāhāṁkara tule
hastinā bhmabane yāiṁ driyodhana bije kale | 40 |
dvārikā pure pañchu pāṇḍabe karanti bichāra | 41 |
bābu bidura ye gale driyodhanaku āṇi
biḷamba hoilā ta kimpe naileka puṇi | 43 |
svāmī aneka boile ye bidura droṇa gāṅgeba | 44 |
kāhāri bacana se na kalā driyodhana
rātra dibasake paẏāṇa kari hastinā yāiṁ bheṭi | 46 |
ẏete kahi sahadeba tahuṁ hoile mauna
raibrata pabongte se karanti bibhāra ucchaba | 50 |
sīukāra baraṇa ye kaleka beni dine
jheṣṭhi kr̥ṣṇa pañchamī uttarāṣaḍhā dhanu lagne | 51 |
lg.note: nānā bādya śabade śubhai śaṅkhadhuni | (ga, cha, ṭha, ña)
lg.l: ye nakṣatra yoge nāhiṁ pāpa graha
śanicara rāhu ketu nāhiṁ nā sandeha | 52 |
sohodrā debīṁkara uttara bhodua mīna rāśi | 53 |
ghaṭa beḷe yoga kale śubha anakūḷe | 54 |
tāra candra nakṣatra ye yoga lagna beḷa gheni
raibrata pabongte āsi dhaumba prohite bije kale | 57 |
ṣāṭhi sasra śiṣyanta gheni se āsi hele upagata | 58 |
jaẏa muni śuka muni mārakaṇḍa biśvāmitre
ẏeteka ruṣiṁka tule ye aneka bāḷakhiḷā
aneka binoẏī ye karanti pāda pūjā
airābata bāhāne se bijaẏe deba indra
pārijātaka puṣya br̥ṣṭi hoilā sabuṁkari māthe | 64 |
lg.note: gāgraba = gārgaba |
dhaumba = dhaumya |
jaẏa muni = jaiminī |

lg.l: gagane biḷāsuṇiẏe jaẏe jaẏe dhuni toḷi
nandara koḷe nei ye basāile dohitī | 67 |
chāẏā maṇḍope deba bijaẏe sahasra yoni
gobinde bije kale śrīkare argha gheni | 68 |
sadhu sādhu bhadrā go jībana tora dhanī | 71 |
bācchiṇa bara tu go barilu māheśvarī
puruṣa paṇaku ta śakatā nāhiṁ tini purī | 72 |
kṣatriẏa paṇaku ta ẏe trailokeṇa jitā
nandara nandinī tu jībana sādhu sādhu
andha rājā putra sehu aṭanti kaurobe | 75 |
saṁsāra jana mukhuṁ tahuṁ sādhu sādhu bāṇī śuṇi
bho svāmī na jāṇi arjuan tule kdaruthila dvanda
saṁsāra jane maṅgaḷa bāṇī bhāṣile yāhāku

lg.note: karanti bharaharaṣa sakaḷa tatuṇī | (ḍa, ḍha)

lg.l: ẏeḍeka kūṭa buddhi bābu āmbhe ta na jāṇu | 79 |
nanda rājā koḷe sohodrā jagata mohinī
śaṅkhe kuśa jaḷa tiḷa lāi baraṇa sīukāra | 82 |
bājanti bādyamāna śubhai maṅgaḷa śaṅkha dhuni
maṅgaḷa gītamāna ye gābanti sulabha kāminī | 83 |
arjunara mukhaku chāhiṁ bolanti sabong bāḷī
bolanti pūbonge ẏe praẏāge dilā jhāsa
teṇu ẏe svāmī gheni kariba abhiḷāṣa | 86 |
pūbonge tapa na kari ẏebe kimpā mari
para lalāṭe sindura dehi marai muṇḍa koḍi | 87 |
puruṣa kuḷe uttama ye pāṇḍaba sundara
stirī kuḷe subhāgī sohodrā pāilā ẏehu bara | 88 |
yeuṇa stirī pūbonge kariṇa thāi gāḍha tapa
ati bhāgye pāilā se ẏesaneka juāṁi | 90 |
lg.note: śarada candra badana dekhiṇa sabong bāḷī |
ānanda manare se dianti huḷahuḷi | (keteka pothi)
ānanda mane se mandana śare ghāri | (ga)
bhebaḷi = bihva ḷita |
dhani = dhanya |
āī = mātā |

lg.l: dānara dhani ẏe arjunaku parigraha kari | 91 |
ẏe pura dhani ye sohodrā ẏethi jāta
prāpatara dhani arjunara dhailā ye hātha | 92 |
bāndhaba kuḷa dhani ẏe bandhu pāile phālaguni | 93 |
āuramāna dhani ye kuṭu mbamānaṁkar aśirī
dhani dhani dekhantā ẏehu barakanyāṁkara mukha
pūbongra dhani āmbhara phiṭilā sakaḷa dukha | 95 |
puruṣa kuḷe dhani ẏehāra ẏesaneka sarūpa
pitā mātāṁkara aṭai dhani dhani ye jībana
guṇa bichārante rātra dibāye na sari | 98 |
paṇḍu bicitra śāẏāntanu tini puruṣa gheni | 99 |
asmata pitr̥ pitāmaha prapitā ye maha
nandara pitā aruṇa ananta sudeba sadeha | 100 |
ubhaẏe tini puruṣa asmat pitr̥ pitāmaha prapitāmaha sahite

lg.note: āuramāna = anyamāne |
asmat = āmamānaṅkara |
dhuni = dhvani |

lg.l: deśa kāḷa bākye bibhā karānti prohite | 105 |
kuśa gaṇṭhi pakāile kariṇa maṅgaḷa dhuni | 106 |
śacī indra parāẏe diśileka bara kanyā śobha | 107 |
ḍāhāṇabrateka śuṅkhe kuśa tiḷa yaba nānā tīrtha pāṇi
nandara hāthe dhaumya prohite dile āṇi | 108 |
daśa ghoṣa pāṭa khaṭa bibidha ratana | 109 |
nanda ye pāñchalakṣa dile dhenu gāī
pāñcha lakṣa batsā ye aṇḍira māī hoi | 111 |
pañcha sahasra nāga śate sahasra turaṅga
koṭiẏe bārāsa ye chokhāra turaṅgama bājī
lakṣeka ratha ye beni lakṣa maẏematta
jaṇe jaṇe yautuka dile subarṇṇa śate śate bhāra | 115 |

lg.note: bārāsa = begagāmī ghoṭaka |
bājī = aśva, ghoṭaka |
chokhāra = utkr̥ṣṭa |
lg.l: yaśodā daibakī ābara jagannāthaṁkara yete patnī
raibrata pabongta mādi paḍai yūṇ achāri | 119 |
beni kara yoḍi ubhā hele bāsabaṁka chāmure | 120 |
svāmī amarādhi nātha tu jagatara ādhi
tumbhanta goṭiẏe dei muṁ paśili śaraṇa
daśa doṣa mohora kṣamā kara surarāṇa | 123 |
śate daṇḍa praṇapatya hoile bāsabara padmapāda | 124 |
aneka purasari bolanti nandaku ghei koḷe | 125 |
go goṣṭha dhana dhanya subarṇṇa yete icchā
samasta pāiluṁ āmbhe yautuka maneṇa yete bāñcchā | 126 |
trodhabhara hoi nanda sohodrāku dianti bākye
ājahuṁ paragotrī hoilu boli kahanti mahāśoke | 127 |
aśr̥jaḷa br̥sṭi tahim kaleka sabong rāṇī | 128 |
tahuṁ se lājā homa purohite karābanti | 129 |
beda bākya paḍhi tahiṁ baśyānare toṣi | 130 |

div.note: muhiṁ yautuka dei pāribi ki prabodhi | (gha, ṇa, ṅa, ḍa)
ādhi = adhikāra |

lg.l: se utiṣṭa ghr̥ta pāraṇā karābanti bara kanyā
bidu janamāne ye karanti beda dhuni
āchobana sāri ẏeka āsane basile beni | 132 |
argha bandābanti jananī gheni aneka kāminī
huḷahuḷi dianti dūbongāṁkura taṇḍuḷa kare gheni | 133 |
santāna upuju tora somabongśa karu ude | 134 |
mā go tohora tahuṁ somabongśa heu rakṣā | 136 |
aneka dhana ratna basra dileka badhāi
dāridra haraṇa hoilā ye yāhāra icchā pāi | 137 |
he sujana janamāne ye yāhāra icchā
āṣya dhana dhānya putra mane kara bāñcchā | 138 |
sañchaẏe prāyata hoẏe mane ye yāhā māgi | 139 |
arjunaku sohodrā dei nārāẏaṇe ẏesaneka toṣa
ẏe ucchaba ānanda śuṇi sujane ānande ullāsa | 140 |
śrī biṣṇu purāṇa ẏe mahābhāratha kathā
araṣṭi na lāgai durāpāta khaṇḍai sarbathā | 141 |
aśvamedha yāga kalāra yeteka phaḷa śr̥ti
ẏehā śuṇile pai koṭi koṭi tīrtha puṇya | 143 |
ati puṇya tīrtha ẏe aṭai paramānanda | 144 |

div.note: ẏehā śrabaṇa karānte na thāi pāpamāna | (ta, gha, ṇa, ṅa)

lg.l: śuṇimā sabadhāne ho biṣṇu purāṇa bārata
bhārā nibāra ṇa arthe mānaba deha gheni | 146 |
aneka dāna dile tahiṁ yujheṣṭhi mahīpāḷe | 147 |
pratigraha kari dile arjuna kāma artha kari | 148 |
bibhā bidhi sāriṇa bara kanyāṁku kale āśiṣa bāñcchā
bhmañjasi bipuḷa bhoga ye tumara mana icchā | 150 |
bidu janamāne samaste kaleka beda nāda
dvārikā bhmabanaku ye sambhare kale bije | 152 |
aneka haraṣa se ye dvārikā bhmabane
bahuta bidyādharī gandhabongnta gheni bije maghabāne | 153 |
amara āstāne ye sudharmā nāme sabhā
ākāśuṁ citrasena āṇi mañchare kalā ubhā | 154 |
āpaṇe nanda rāẏe sabu samādhāna kari | 155 |

div.note: āpaṇe nandarāẏe sabu sambhodhanā kara | (gha, ṇa, ta, ṭha)

lg.l: ẏe mohora bongśare acchi yeteka doṣa
sambodhi se argha dei bahuta binopi
daśa doṣa aprādha kṣamā karibā adyāpi | 161 |
puṇa puna bonopanti pāthara dhari kara | 162 |
samārjanā sāri gale nija ye bhmabane
amiẏa rasa yogāḍa paraśanti debī ye rukmaṇī
aneka parihāse tahiṁ lāgilā rasa bāṇī | 164 |
ẏeka āsane bhojana kale bara kanyā beni
amr̥ta rasa āpyāne toṣa surarāja debā | 166 |
amarādhi nātha sukhe ākāśe gale caḷi | 167 |

div.note:
“amarādhi nātha sukhe ākāśe gale caḷi” pāṭha pare ṭa pothire
adhikā pāṭha–
mauśeyyā nāṭa ye subarṇṇe nirmāṇa
sohodrāṁku gheni tahiṁ śoile phālaguṇya |
tr̥tīẏa dina tahiṁ uccchaba karile
sakaḷa stirī miḷi mācha ye bikile |
upanandaku kale kaibrata ye beśa
jāla khaṇḍi gheniacchi daśānanda śiṣa |
anantanandara mātā śaradhā nāma keuṭuṇī
tuḷaka gheni ṭokāire mācha bikai puṇi |
tuḷaka gheni ṭokāire mācha bikai puṇi |
sohodrāṁkara se aṭanitajā āī
upananda śaradhāra diara aṭai |
ẏemante uccchaba sāriṇa sabong nārī
tr̥tīẏa dina līḷā sārigale sabong bāḷī |
taturtha dibasa prabeśa mātreṇa
taturtha uccchaba karanta tahiṁ puṇa |

lg.l: moti cūriṇa ye nibongāṇa kale guṇḍi
paḍhiṇa bipre śire argha dile āṇi | 170 |
bahuta bidhi ānanda kahita ki pāri
candana agara trapūra baṭā lāgilāka haḷadī

div.note:
baiśāḷa = bibāha bedīre haridrādhibāsa, gandhādhibāsa, baiśaḷā
ropaṇa |

baidika mantrapāṭha pūbongka karpūra, candana prabhr̥ti barakanyāṅkara hastare,
kaḷasare, bedīre lepana krāyibā bidhi | bāuṁśa ḍaḷa poti
bedīre mantrapāṭha | bedī kathā kahibāru anya kathāmāna bujhā
yāuacchi ||
tāhā lepana kale chāmuṇḍiā taḷa piṇḍi | (jha)
candana agara trapūra haḷadī |
ẏeka ārake phiṅkanti sugandha āmodī | (gha, ṅa, ta, cha, ṇa)
nibongāṇa = nirmāṇa |
śiḷoka = śḷoka |
samādi = sampādi |

lg.l: bārita na galā tahiṁ mānita gauroba
dutīẏa parihāsa baḍhalā haḷadī lepana śarīra | 179 |
āditya asta huante prabeśa āsi niśi
kr̥ṣṇabeṇi nadīki sabonge srāhāna kale paśi | 181 |
caḷile yādaba bīre ye yāhara purī | 183 |
bara kanyā bandāpanā kale sabong debī
rohiṇī nakṣatra ye bhogya se dinara | 185 |

div.note: caturthe baḍhalā snāna sārile madhuhārī | (gha, ṇa, ta, ṅa)

“sapata maṅgaḷā bidhi sārile sādhabī pare” ‘ṭa’ pothire adhika
pāṭha–
aṣṭa maṅgaḷā dina arjuan sohodrā asura asurī
sedina kanyā baraku chāhiṁle bidhabā koṣṭhi kārī |
abaśya se stirī bidhabā huanti
putra putra kicchihiṁ nuhanti |
aṣṭa maṅgaḷā dina subarṇṇa beṅgaḷā bhāṅgile
arjunaku upananda ghare rakhāile |
sohodrā rahila śatrājitara nabare
aṣṭama bhogagalā nabama dina aile nārāẏaṇa pure |

lg.l: ratha gaja aśva saini sājiṇa samadaṇḍa
hastinā rājyaku āmbhe samadaṇḍa kalu saja | 189 |
parama sānande mote āgyāṁ debā haḷī
bho deba dharmanandana tumbhe bije kariyibā
sohodrāku koḷe gheni bijaẏe bīra pāthe | 193 |
samaste dhani dhani karanti sohodrā sādhu sādhu | 195 |
ẏemāne tule yānit ye dvārikā bhmabanuṁ | 196 |
aneka ratha gaja aneka yogāḍanta gheni
aneka rājye ye āsanti debe paśi
sakaḷa narendramāne argha dianti se āsi | 198 |
bābu arjuna gheni āsuacchi kanyā goṭi
sanyabaḷa gheni tu yāa yā pāchoṭi | 203 |
tumbhe ucchaba na kariba na yiba pāchoṭi
ya abā piṅgaḷa jāti huanti abā rāgī
bābu mohora śapataṭi na dhara āna mana
uṭha uṭha āstānu bābu yāa tu bahana | 207 |
āstānuṁ bāhāra se ye hoile kurusāīṁ | 208 |
aneka ratna maṇḍita bije gaja piṭhi
baidhabī nadī kūḷe bheṭile deba yāiṁ | 210 |
ẏeka bheṭa hoiṇa se beni saini

div.note:
“mahā sambhare rājā bije dhr̥tirāṣṭi” pādara śeṣa pare ‘ja’ ‘jha’
pothi dvaẏare adhikā pāṭha :–
sahadebaku chāhiṁ tahiṁ puccchanti dharmarāẏe
āge diśuacchi ta baḍa saini goṭāẏe |
mantrī boilā ẏe āsai mānacatra bratī
ratha gaja aśva saini gheni pāchoṭi āsanti |
sahadeba mukhuṁ yahuṁ śuṇile ẏemanta bārata
śuṇīṇa sānanda tahiṁ hoile dharmasuta |
ẏemante ohobaḷa sanya āsanti caḷāi
baidhabī nadī kūḷe bheṭa hele yāiṁ |
uchuḷai bādya ye kampai bhmabana tini | [gha, cha, ṅa, ḍa, ḍha]
utāhuḷa = uttāḷa |

lg.l: pura nārīgaṇamāne āsanti bara kanyā dekhi
īśvare bije kale ki kapiḷāsa upekṣi | 216 |
sādhu sādhu ẏe pātha sundara phālaguni
sādhu sādhu sohodrā ẏe nanda rāẏera nandinī | 217 |

div.note: dhāmanti yubatīmāne āsana (gr̥hadvāra) upekṣi | [ja, jha]
caḷanti khagabara bāhāne baikuṇṭha bhmabana | [gha, ta, ṅa, cha, ṇa]
īśvara bije kale ki saṅge gheni pābongtī debīṁki |[ga]
sādhu sādhu mahimā sohodrā phālaguni
sādhu bidhātā ẏehānta sañchita kalā āṇi | [ja, jha]
aneka pāṭachatra tahiṁ uḍai caukati | [ja, jha]

“aneka pāṭachatra chāmara ḍhāḷanti” pāṭha pare ‘ṭa’ pothire
adhikā pāṭha :–
kointāẏe bije kale dropatī acchi pāśa
haraṣare dropatīra mana ye birasa |
boilā sautuṇī ẏeka hoilā mudei
mo ṭhāre āu seha na rakhai bāsaba tanai |
puṇi bichāranti mora achanti chāri pati
nohu pache arjuna mora bhīma acchi chatrī |
sabhābe dharmarāja aṭanti yujheṣṭhi nr̥pati
nakuḷa chatri sahadeba acchi mantrī |
ẏemanta bichāri debī chālai haraṣa birasa
arjuna jāṇilā dropatīra mana ye birasa |

lg.l: kointā debī ye bije kale gāndhārīṁka pāśa
āgo utsaba dekhi saṁsāra jane houchanti haraṣa | 220 |
mā go bara kanyā draśane pāpa hou kṣaẏe
gāndhārī boile tumbhe kahila ye bhala
svāmī mohora yebe basicchi andha hoi
mohora sampada dekhibāra kāryya ki achai | 226 |
ābara kimpā mote kuṭumba jane gañji | 227 |
gāndhārī boile debī śuṇa go kointe
sampada bipada ye aṭai ẏeka arthe | 229 |
aneka bipada ye hoiba puṇa kāli | 230 |
mā go karme jāta kali śate putra goṭi
samaste duṣṭa se ye pr̥thīki bhārā seṭi | 231 |
tu se sampada go dekhibu kointā
pua tora rāja go tu hoibu rājamātā | 232 |

div.note: bho dhātā, anāsta hoili boli bolai gāndhārī | (gh, ṇa, ta, ṅa)

lg.l: mohora putre ye madhu piṅgaḷa jāti
tahiṁki kṣaẏe kāḷa mora śakuni mahāmantrī | 233 |
agāda jaḷe yehne bheḷā dadarā nāba
keteheṁka bhārā se ye sahiṇa pāriba | 234 |
nara chāṇḍāḷeke se hoibe ẏeka meḷā
daṇḍeka acchi go buḍibāku mora bheḷā | 235 |
tāhāṁkara nidhane ye muhiṁ na bratibi
ẏe putramānaṁkara kaṣṭa muṁ na dekhibi | 237 |
tu se ānanda hoibu putraṁka ucchaba dekhi
tohora jībana sārthuka go debi kointā
jāṇiṇa srijilā tote dharma ye debatā | 239 |
