āpaṇāra sampada dekhi na pārilu gosāmaṇī | 240 |
putrara sampadaku mohora parama hiṁsā bahu
āpaṇāra sampadaku mā go ẏemanta se kahu | 243 |

div.note: parara bipattiki paśaṁsā karu sahī
āpaṇāra sampadaku ẏemanta se kahi | (ca, kha)

lg.l: aneka śubha maṅgaḷa bāñcchā se karanti | 247 |
aneka ucchaba se ye dianti badhāi
mā go supuruṣaku sustirī thilā janma hoi | 248 |
nija nabare parabeśa bara kanyā gheni
tada nimante gala dvādaśa baraṣa bane
dine dine khina tanu mora yehne śīta pabane | 255 |
dibasa na sarai beśa biḷās maṇaiṁ dukha | 256 |
taba gabana dinuṁ muṁ banadurgā kali oṣā
se sabong māheśvarī pūroile mohora manīṣā | 257 |

div.note: sukha bhoga mana haraṣe pīrati thānti gheni | (gha, ṇa, ta, ca, ṅa, cha)

lg.l: śuṇi dhanurẏe ye haraṣa bhāba mana
koḷe dhari priẏā mukhe dilāka cumbana | 259 |
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badanti yogeśvara
sohodrā bibhā śuṇi khaṇḍilā durgati tohora | 264 |

div.note:
“sohodrāra bibhāẏe parama rahasyagati” pare
‘ṭa’ pothire pāṭha |
hastināre arjuna rahilā sāta māsa
subhadrāra tule karanti abhiḷāṣa |
dropatī puraku ye karichanti pāḷi
pāḷire sohodrā chāḍi pātha dropatī puraku caḷi |
nānadi kautuke bañchanti pāṇḍabe
bhīma arjuanra dui dui bhāriyā prastābe |
ẏeṭi mahābhāratara madhyapabong kathā
sañchapi kahibāku muṁ kisa sāmarathā |

div.head: {@puṣyābhiṣeka@}

lg.l: janme janme muhiṁ ye debīre bhagati | 4 |
na paḍhi paṇḍata muṁ mūrkhare ābhāsa
ẏethu anantare ye bilaṁka deśa rājā
tahuṁ kebaṇa kr̥tya hoilā kahibā mahāmuni | 7 |
ẏeka mane śuṇa manu baibasuta śrotā | 8 |
atrūraku āgyāṁ dile gheni āsa pātha | 10 |
sohodrāṁku gheni tule dvārikāku calasi ho pātha | 13 |
nārāẏaṇaṁkara āgyāṁ muṁ dvārikā yibāra nimante | 14 |
teṇu kari dūta se peṣile śīghra kari | 15 |
śuṇiṇa sānanda se ye hoile yujheṣṭhi
badhūnta gheni dvārikā caḷa ho kirīṭī | 16 |
sohodrā gheni pātha bijaẏe puṣyeka bimāne | | 17 |
āge bāṭa kaḍhāi se atrūra sārathi mahāmantrī
arjuan praṇapatya hoile deba pāda pr̥ṣṭhe | 19 |
trailokye śubha yaśa tote hou ye sāṁgrāme | 20 |
dvārikāre ucchaba ye karanti rājā ugrasene | 21 |

lg.note:
“arjuna praṇapatya hoile deba pāda pr̥ṣṭhe” pare
‘kha’ pothire adhikā pāṭha |
uṭha uṭha boliṇa boile banamāḷī
śrībhmaje koḷa kariṇa arjunaku toḷi |
hāthe dhari arjunaku saṅge ghenigale
āstānara upare neiṇa tāku basāile |
sohodrā antapuraku caḷigale bahana
ye yāhāra anumate kale mānya dharma |

lg.l: jaẏa jaẏa dhuni bhāṣanti sabong debī debā | 25 |
sādhu sādhu dhanurjaẏa tora mānaba janma | 28 |
tāhāṁkara koḷe bābu basibāku hoilu sāmaratha | 29 |
abhiṣeka kāḷe debe karanti sādhu sādhu dhuni
sātukī kanaka daṇḍa gheni achai dakṣiṇa bhāge
kanaka chatra neta ulākha atrūra dharai āge | 32 |
bijaẏe jagamohana caḍhi śveta pāṭa hāthī
bhramanti dvārikā bhmabana ye caubiṁśa yojana
jaẏa jaẏa bhāṣanti ye sakaḷa munijana | 34 |
bhramaṇa sāri bijaẏe deba candraśāḷa purī

lg.note: śūnye bibāna ārohī dekhinti bnr̥ndāarka | (ṅa)
trailokara nātha āpaṇāra tatta lya kariṇa sabongsācī | (aneka pothi paṭha)
śrīrāma abatāra deba trailokya uttami | (gha, ṇa, ṅa)
ulākha = gātroparistha citraṇa, gastura upare nāma lekhāhebā |

lg.l: rātra praharake tahiṁ śejyā hoilā dibyasthāna | 38 |
yesaneka bebhāre hoi saṁsāre pati patinī
bibidha raṅga trīḍā karanti ye beni
pāda argha dei caraṇe karanti daini | 42 |
aneka pr̥jā bidhi kale beni māẏe
puṇa puṇa praṇapatya huanti nāradaṁka pāẏe | 43 |
muni boile go tumbhe aṭa māheśvarī
pūbong tapa chaḷe putra pāila narahari | 44 |
ẏehu janmeṇa tumbhe ye na kala kicchi oṣā
upuriki sañchita kimpā na kala manīṣā | 45 |
puṇa janama hoibu hoi nārāẏaṇaṁka māta | 47 |
nārada boile āmbhara brateka se acchi
tāhā kale prapata hoi mane yāhā bāñcchi | 48 |
daẏā kari āmbhanta mahātamā dharma kathā kaha | 49 |
nārada boile tumbhe śuṇa go daibakī
prastābi kahibā tumbhanta dharma artha bāki | 50 |
sakaḷa pure prabeśa āmbhe āmbhe sakaḷa dharma jāṇu
pachārile āmbhe ye samasta kathāhiṁ bakhāṇu | 51 |
mā go kāmākṣī boli kari ẏeka brata goṭiẏe
tāhā gheni le dharma prāpata hoẏe māẏe | 52 |
daibakī boile muni he tumbhe paṇḍita bhigyaṁbanta | 53 |
ẏehā sañchapi kaha he brahmāṁkara śiṣa | 54 |
debakī yaśobantī śuṇanti kahanti muni deba
oṣākaiṁ makara māsa sampada tāra hoiba | 55 |
makara māsa kr̥ṣṇa pakṣa traẏodaśī pabitra
tithi bāra nakṣatra ye ẏeka yoga hoi paḍi
se oṣā nāma hoiba kr̥ṣṇā ye gaurī | 57 |
āī go apoḍā bhūmi khaṇḍi ye hoiba yāgaśāḷa
ajapā mantreṇa lakṣeka japa ye prasiddhi | 61 |

div.note:
“athabongbedī hoibe pañchiśa sahasra jaṇa” pare keteka
pothira pāṭha :–
pañchiśa sahasra hebe dhanubongedī jāṇa
śiśubedī hebe daśa sahasa parimāṇa |
ẏeteka kathā tumbhe parimāṇi bujha
ẏepari bhmañjibe ye niti lakṣeka se dvija |

lg.l: subarṇṇara lakṣe rukhā hoiba śatek aṅguḷi | 62 |
lakṣeka bhāra subarṇṇa nitye deuthiba dāna
ṣoḷa dina pariyante heuthiba annadāna abichanna | 63 |
sabukaiṁ nabatana basra deba bhmañjibāra beḷe | 64 |
aṣṭa ratne khañjilāra lakṣeka ye hāthī
lakṣe bhāra subarṇṇa dāna deba daibakī yaśobantī | 65 |
āpaṇā bongśika go lakṣeka sulabha kumārī
āhūti dāna beḷe deba go lakṣeka ratna bhari | 67 |
ẏemante dāna deba lakṣeka samasta yogāḍi
lakṣeka dvijabaraku deba lakṣeka kr̥ṣṇāñjana chaurī | 69 |
kāmya śrāddha kariba go gaṇḍā jībanta māri
pitr̥ toṣa nimante go kahile nārada tapachārī | 70 |
lakṣeka kuṁchā ye hoiba madhuśānti mata | 71 |
kr̥ṣṇa barṇṇa dhenu gāī kr̥ṣṇa bachā lakṣeka siṁgha piṅgaḷa
lakṣeka paḷa lakṣe kuṁchā pañchāmr̥ta deba

lg.note:
kuṁchā = kuñchā = āṭha muṭhā śasya parimāṇare māpa pātra bā māṇa,
māṭira ṭheki bā ghaḍi |

lg.l: lakṣeka debī ye lakṣeka chāgaḷa parabhabi | 76 |
ṣoḷa dina pariyante basiba dibā rātre
triẏā śuci kale prāpata hoẏe brata | 78 |
mithyā apabādī ṣoḷi dina pariyante nohiba
mā go chaḍa sahasra brāhmaṇa baraṇa hoiba prathame
puṣyeka acchi tāra nāma ye suganddha
ṣoḷa dinaku thiba lakṣe lakṣe sampādi | 81 |
ẏe bhābe yebe pratiṣṭhā kariba kāmākṣī
janme janme putra go hoibe śrībacchi | 82 |
nārāẏaṇamku putra rūpe māgiba manare śriẏā bāñcchi | 83 |
mā go para pure prabeśa para mana āmbhe jāṇuṁ
pachārile abaśya āmbhe satya ye bakhāṇuṁ | 84 |
śuṇi parama sānanda ye debakī yaśobantī
sādhana puruṣa tumbhe bhuta bhabiṣya gyāṁtā | 86 |

lg.note: māgantā janaṁku aharniśi dāna deba | (ṭa)
lg.l: keśa bāsa mukuḷā kariṇa ulagna ye śāẏī
bhaṇḍa gīta gāiṇa tu khatāiṇa nāci
jibhyā halāiṇ tu upara hātha kari yāci | 90 |
ḍakā hakā kariṇa puṇa kṣaṇake pāru bobi
bhaṇḍa tāṇḍaba kari tu aṇākāra puruṣa sebi | 91 |
āre diśu kinā boli bhracchanāẏe dianti gāḷi
gāla tuḍi pāḍi āpaṇe deu karatāḷi | 92 |
bhaṇḍa paṇa dekhiṇa se kutūhoḷa puruṣa
mahābhaṇḍa paṇe tu kāryya kalu siddhi | 95 |
hasi aṇākāra tote dr̥śya ye hoilā
teṇu kari dhabaḷahāra cihna tora śarīre lāgilā | 96 |
teṇu kari para pure prabeśra hoilu | 97 |
kalpa kalpa sebā kari yāhāku na dekhi
gāḷi kaḷi kari tu nirākāraṁku dekhi | 98 |

lg.note: cilā āḍacilā māri khatāiṇa nāci | (keteka pothi)
ati tape na pāranti aṇākāra sādhi | (ṭha)
tu se maharuṣi aṇākāra puruṣa boilā | (ṭa)
parama tape paramānanda ye dekhilu
teṇu kari brahma loke prabeśa hoilu | (ña)
lg.l: bhaṇḍa kari mote lecchiṇa kalu hiā
teṇu kari tote nāma dile kaḷahapiẏā | 100 |
kaḷi kari manda boli boilu mote huḍi
anubrate kākhe thāi ye kaḷi dhukuḍi | 101 |
kaḷibatā kaḷichatā kaḷihuḍa kaḷi tora ghara
nāma tora ẏebe ye aṭai kaḷikatara | 102 |
yadyapi amr̥ta yogāḍa tote hoiba prāpati
kaḷi na pāile tuhi ye nohibu triputi | 103 |
bhaṇḍa paṇe toṣa kalu sabuṁkari citta
kautuka upujāilu tu tāṇḍaba nr̥tya gīta | 104 |
amārga tape nātha sudaẏā kalā tote
tohora mahimāku kṣama hoibi ki muḍhamati | 106 |
kaḷaha dūra kari kaḷikāḷa mote bañchā | 107 |
kandarpa prāsaku tu prakr̥ti manda duṣṭa
ẏehu janme mote kaḷikāḷa daṇḍa na bheṭa | 108 |
muhiṁ tohora dāsara dāsa he nārada maharuṣi
kaḷi kaḷaṁke se dharma hoai bhāsi | 109 |
yugate kaḷi yuga ye ābara pāpa moha
kaḷi bañchāi moe dharma kathā kaha | 110 |
uddhāra kara mote na lāgu kr̥tānteka cihna | 111 |
svāmī ājahuṁ baḍhilu tu ye kaḷaha prakr̥ti
tote bhagati bhāba nātha kalaiṁ muṁ icchā
śrī nāradaṁka bacana mora hr̥dagate paśu
pābongtīṁka ballabha caraṇa reṇu śire gheni
saṁsāra pātaka dhaṁsiba śrī biṣṇu purāṇa śuṇile | 116 |
na paḍhili akṣara muṁ śāhasra na dekhi | 118 |
beda mantra prāpata mote hoilā śūdra janme
asaṁkhya sagara ẏe agocara mahābhāratha bāṇī
sohodrā haraṇa muṁ karili samāpata āṇi | 120 |
siddha kāntānī go jaṅkhe ra purabāsī
suganddhaka haraṇa kahibi mote āgyāṁ ye deasi | 121 | | 1779 |
lg.note: nāradaṁka mantra mora karṇṇe paśu | (gha, ṇa, cha, kha)
śriẏā ballabha caraṇ areṇu gheni | (ṭha)
pīẏuṣa rase kahili madhya pabong rīti | (ṭa)
amiẏa rasa kahili madhyapabong rīti | (gha)
bedamantra prāpata hoil śuddha mane (ña)
lg.head: {@sugandhikā haraṇa@}
lg.l: ẏethu ante nāradaṁku tusti kari daibakī yaśobantī
nārade boile se durāpada ṭhābe acchi
āṇimāku yebe go loka para sañchi | 3 |
hari baḷarāmaṁka beḷe nohai se sādhi | 4 |
laṁkā dhaṁsana bāndara āśre kari tāha thāi anubrata | 5 |
ẏehā śuṇi daibakī yaśobantī biṣāda hoile mane
kāhāku bolibu ke puṣya deba āne | 6 |
bho muni parama puruṣa moe āgyāṁ debā
muhiṁ yāi puṣya āṇi pāraiṭiki abā | 8 |
āīmāne go sambhāra saja tumbhe kara
suganddhakā yete lāgai se hoilā mohora bhāgara | 9 |
yadyapi yakṣa nāga tāhā achai ābori
kāḷaku nikaḷaṁka karibi se yakṣa rākṣasaṁku māri | 10 |

lg.note: nirate se sthāna laṁkā damana āśrita | (ṭha)
jaguāḷi tahiṁ yakṣa nāgabaḷa apramita | (ja)
lg.l: mātāẏe boile bābu śuṇa re rāmahari
nārade kahile brata kr̥ṣṇa ye gaurī | 12 |
ẏe oṣā yebe āmbhe sampādanā karibu
janme janme tumbhara āmbhe mātā ye hoithibu | 13 |
nārade boile ho tumbhe śuṇa padmalābha
deba stirīmānanta ẏe oṣa madhyapuraku dulabha | 15 |
bābu nāradaṁku na bhāṅga boile baḷadeba
bābu āmbhe ye hoilu mañchapure utapatti
samasta janamaku ẏe oṣā heu parāpati | 17 |
nārade boile arjunaku āgyāṁ debā hr̥ṣīkeśi
suganddhaka puṣya āṇu niḷendī sarobare paśi | 18 |
āṇi pāribu ki ho suganddhakā bibacchi | 19 |
arjuna boile deba tahiṁki9 na kariba cintā
yeteka suganddhakā lāgai muhiṁ se diantā | 20 |
bratara bhiāṇa tumbhe kara begi begi | 21 |
nīḷa sundara baṭa uttara kūḷa āḍe | 22 |
āhuṭa yaba pramāṇe acchi apoḍā bhūmi khaṇḍi
bijaẏe māheśvarī tahiṁ bilaṁkā nāme caṇḍī | 23 |
tāhānta āgyāṁ māgiṇa nandara ye bāḷa
se sthāna ābori śubha dile yāgaśāḷa | 24 |
lg.note: āhuṭa = ābarttana śa{??}ja | chāriāḍe cattākr̥ti bā śaṁkhākr̥ti kṣetra |

lg.l: caḷai bāsabi ye suganddhakā puṣya āṇi | 28 |
bāẏaba nāme karaṇa śubha nāme yoga
tithi bāra nakṣatra yoga karaṇa anakūḷa gheni
tohora bhaẏare yamunāru yāi paśiacchi kāḷi | 34 |
se suganddha puṣye ābori achanti sarpe
arjuna marddipāribaṭi ki kāḷi nāgara darpe | 35 |
bainetra piṭhire bije kara ho bīra pātha | 37 |
lg.note: arjuna yāuacchi śatra rājāra madhubana | (ḍa, ḍha, ca, ṅa)
arjuna yāuacchi sura siddha bana | (ṭa)

lg.l: svāmī nārāẏaṇa bije karanti tora piṭhi
muhiṁ kṣama hoibi ki mānaba janma heṭi | 39 |
garuḍa bolai pātha tumbhe na bola ẏemanta
ke tumbhanta bhinnābhinna kariba kr̥ṣṇa pātha | 40 |
arjuna boile tumbhe ramyeka dīpe thiba
mote agocara paḍile muṁ sumarile āsiba | 42 |
garuḍa boile mote sumarile deba hari
bahana yibā mora piṭhire bije kari | 43 |
bainetra piṭhire yāiṁ arjuna kale bije | 44 |
śrībhmaje śobhābana lakṣe baḷa gāṇḍima dhanu
pratakṣe nārāẏaṇa ki bije kale gaganuṁ | 45 |
sura madhubane se gandhamādana nāme pura
ẏeka rātrake prabeśa se śatra rājāra banastara | 47 |
se baṭa achai sindhu dakṣiṇa bhāga taṭa | 49 |

div.note: ẏethaku bhānti na kara sohodāra pati | (gha, ṇa, cha)
śrībhmaje lakṣebaḷa dutī pinākī dhana |
pratakṣe nārāẏaṇa ki bije kale baikuṇṭha bhmabanu | (ḍa, ḍha, ṅa)
yojanagandha boli acchi ẏekai kaḷpabaṭa | (cha, ṭha, ṭha)
mekhaḷa antara = śarīra bhinna kintu dekhibāku ekāpari | (sārupya)

lg.l: tahiṁra bhitare achai puṣya ye suganddha
nirantare kamaḷa se ghañchaāḷa ghoṭicchi jaḷadhi | 51 |
se puṣyaṁkara teja ye bāḷa arka jāṇi
teje ujyaḷa diśai ude ki dinamaṇi | 52 |
yamunāra jaḷa praẏe se jaḷa jhalakai
kajjaḷa kaḷā prāẏeka puṇa se diśai | 53 |
ẏehi baṭa taḷe tmbhe hoithāasi gupata | 56 |
muhiṁ hāde dekhai se kāḷiẏara darpa
mote dekhiṇa āsanti se kete sarpa | 57 |

div.note: madhye sarobara se ye apñchabiṁśa yojana
nirmaḷi jaḷa se aṭai pūṇyasthāna | (ṭa, ja, jha)
debatāẏe kehi paśi nuāranti puṇi | (ṭa, ṭha)
maha garaḷa jāḷā tahiṁ rahiacchi kāḷi | (ja, jha)
ghañchāḷa = ghaneibā, nibiḍa bhābare ghoṭibā |
kāḷi = kāḷiẏa sarpa |

lg.l: kiṭi kiṭi śabade bikarāḷa ghora mukha
adhara bikāśi āsi beḍhile sabong saini
yaṣṭiẏeka kare gheni kope piṭai phālaguni | 62 |
dhātikāre ḍeiṁṇa se uṭhile br̥kṣa śikhe
br̥kṣa upāḍiṇa se dhāiṁle kopa hetu | 64 |
guṇa nāda kare pātha kare dhanu gheni | 66 |
binddhalā nārāja se droṇa guru sumari | 67 |
nārāja pūroiṁ se bnddhalā dr̥ḍha kari | 68 |
paṁku phaḷa prāẏe hoi chaichāḍe bāṇa phuṭi
chāri chāri nārāja jaṇake hoilāka br̥ṣṭi | 70 |
svāmī bīreka bindhai nārāja kareṇa dhanu gheni | 72 |
kopeṇa dhaiṁlā se kare gheniṇa parabata | 73 |

div.note: kiḷikiḷā śabade bikaṭāḷa ghora mukha | (ṭha, tha)
pūroiṇa nārāja gāṇḍima dhanu dhari | (tha)

lg.l: diśai sundara ki se jāṇi catrapāṇi | 74 |
re re kāra śabada tahiṁ karai arajuna
āre āre mānaba tora ẏeḍe darpa kisa pāiṁ | 77 |
bajra śahasra peṣi tāhā chedilā kirīṭī | 78 |
ẏeḍeka darpa bīre keuṁṇa bhmabana āsiacchi | 79 |
puṇa pabongteka dhari mārai rāma dūta
bābala śare tāhā chedilā bīra pātha | 80 |
nārāja bhedilā yāiṁ tehne hanumanta śarīre | 83 |
śarīra diśai tāra ḍaḷimba puṣya prāẏe
rome rome bhedilā ye hanumantara kāẏe | 84 |
gāḍha śara ghāẏeṇa rudhira paḍai gaḷi
raha raha boli ucceṇa hanumanta ḍāki
babala śara ye hr̥daru kāḍhi dekhi | 86 |
nārāja goṭi dekhi bichārai kapi indra
ẏe śara gheni tretaẏā yuge asuranta chedile rāmacandra | 87 |
amara bhmabana teji bijaẏe ki jambhobhedī | 88 |
kapiḷāsa teji ki ẏe bijaẏe mahādeba
ki ẏe debakīra nandana aṭanti bāsudeba | 89 |
hanumanta bolai ho mahatamā raha raha
kisa nāma tohora kāhāra koḷe jāta
śrīrāmacandraṁka dūta muhiṁ asura kuḷa manthi | 92 |
pabongta gheniṇa muṁ ye bānddhali bārādhi
arjuna boilā chāra pāmara heṭi kathā

div.note: muhiṁ yogeśvara ye kiskindā ādhipati | (gha, ka)
samudra chāra bānddhabā kisa baḷabantā | (kha, tha, ṇa, cha)
pāṭha pare mudrita pustakara manojña pāṭha–
jātire bānara tuhi khāu phaḷamūḷa
tu puṇi dekhāu āsi mo āgare baḷa |
binā doṣe mo saṅgate karuachu kaḷi
kāṭi tora śira debi ẏehikṣaṇi baḷi |
hanu bole jāṇili muñ caritra tohara
dhanuśara kare dhari karu ahaṅkāra |
kimpāi toḷilu phul asarobaru āsi
ẏehi sarobare indr ana pārai paśi |
phula nei na pāranti kehi mora ḍare
śrī rāmaṅku niti ẏehi phule pujā kare |
arjuna boilā keuñ rāma kāhiñ ghara
kāhāku tu pujā karu āre re bānara | (abaśiṣṭa para pr̥ṣṭhāre)

lg.l: śate caubiṁśa yojana samudra bānddhalu dināchāri | 95 |
muhiṁ nimiṣake bānddha pārai sindhu jaḷa | 96 |
hanumanta kahilā yāhā boilu ye tuṇḍe
nimiṣake bandha ke bānddha pāriba sapata brahmāṇḍe | 97 |

div.note: baraṣake ke bānddha pāriba sapata brahmānte | (jha, tha, ḍa, ḍha, gha, n‘a, ca, ṇa)
pūbong pr̥ṣṭhāra abśiṣṭāṁśa :–
hanu bole na jāṇu ki tuhi se rāmaku
purandara bhaẏa kare yāhāra dhanuku |
yāhāra ājñāre giri jalare bhāsai
yāhāra ājñāre muhiñ bandha bānddhalaiñ |
chāri dine helā śata caubiṁśa yojana
ẏe puṣpe tāhāṅku pūjā kare pratidina |
arjuna kahilā kahu tu se rāma baḷa
daṇḍaka madhyare bānddhadebi sindhujaḷa |
hanumanta boilā tu yāhā boli tuṇḍe
bānddha na paribe kehi cauda brahmāṇḍe |
arjuna boilā tora rāmara kibaḷa
rukṣa markaṭe āṇile muṇḍare śaiḷa |
baraṣake sehi bandha bānddhale se puṇi
rākṣasa ketuṭā rāma pakāilā hāṇi |
tā praśaṁsā kahu mote māḍu nāhiñ lāja
śarare sāgara muhiñ bānddhadebi āja |
hanu bole se rāmaṅku nindure mānaba |
tāṅku asambhaba nuhe śarare bānddhabā |
se śarabandha ki dāu sahiba āmbhara
ẏeṇu se pabongte bānddha achanti sāgara |

lg.l: arjuna boilā pabongta lochāẏe muṇḍe bahi ye āṇila
mohora śakatāpaṇa pratakṣe dekhibu ki markaṭa
laṁkā jambudvīpe karibi kṣaṇake ẏeka bāṭa | 99 |
micheheṁ dambha kahu ki sañchaẏe aṭu bāi | 100 |
bānddhabi śare sāhera dekha ho kapimalla | 101 |
āsa āsa boliṇa hanumanta kaḍhāilā bāṭa
āre āre pāmara micheheṁ bolāu yodhī
śuṇa ho markaṭa tuhi, bolai phālaguni
muṁ ẏehā bandhana kari pārai daṇḍa tini | 104 |
hanumanta boile śahe caubiṁśa yojana dīrgha
batiśa yūṇa prati, dvādaśa yūṇa utsarga | 105 |
bolai dhanurjaẏe tumbhe kahila na jāṇi
hanumanta boilā yāhā tumbhe boila bacana
karttabye yebe kari tāhā dekhibā naẏana | 107 |
se manabhedī nārāja āsi bheṭilā phālaguni | 109 |
arjuna boile tumbhe ye manabhedī mahāśara
mote kaṭāḷa ta ẏe ya karucchi bandara | 110 |
ẏe sāgare mahabandha tu hoa ẏehikṣaṇi
laṁkāẏe hāboḍibu śahe caubiṁśa yojana jiṇi | 111 |
ẏeteka tiāriṇa se chāḍilā manabhedī bāṇa | 112 |
tāhā dekhi āśriya hoilā añjanāra baḷā
hanumanta boilā tu bānddhalu nā śare śare
śola bheḷā jāṇi upuci ailā jaḷare | 115 |
kāhāra beḷe bandha bānddha hoẏe śara gheni | 116 |
tāha kemante sahiba ẏe śarabandha chāra | 117 |
se bandhare samara hoile na diśai bāṭa | 118 |
arjuna boilā se bandha ye hoile
sahiba nāhiṁki bhārā meru uṭhi basile | 119 |
hanumanta boilā ho sanya baḷa chāḍi
ẏekā mohora uṭhile bandha yiba buḍi | 120 |
rāma rābaṇa ye uṭhibe sanya baḷa gheni

div.note:
“śola bheḷā jāṇi upuci ailā jaḷare” ehāpare ‘gha’
pothire adhikā pāṭha acchi |
śate cauciṁśa yojan lamba se hoilā
laṁkāgaḍa pācerīre yāiṁ se hāboḍilā |
batiśa yojana prati dvādaśa yojana hoilā ucccharga

lg.l: śare sāgara bandhana hoilā se ati bega |
lg.note: ẏekā mohor auṭhile bandha paḍiba se jhaḍi | (ña, jha)
lg.l: lakṣe rābaṇa yuddha karantu ẏe bandhara upara
āhuri ẏeḍe dīrgha prati bandheka bānddhabi | 124 |
debaloka nāgaloka naraloka cauda koṭi bhmabanara
koṭiẏe brahmāṇḍa uṭhi kinā bandhara upara | 126 |
pratakṣe dekhi ho se tubandhara kathā
chatrībara pratagyāṁ rahiba nāhiṁ ki sarbathā | 127 |
hanumanta boilā tumbhe kahuacha bahuta ye gabong
ẏekā mohora bhārā ki to śarabandha sahiba | 128 |
se śara bandha upare hanumāna uṭhalā ātreṣi | 129 |
hanumanta uṭhante se śarabandha na ṭaḷai

lg.note:
“laṅgoḍe basāilā ye bīra ābeni” pare ‘ṭa’ pothire
adhikā pāṭha :–
kākha duire, kaḷāmukhā aśi marbhmata |
śaṅkhamukhā kapi basāila bāhāre dui marbhmata
dui hāthe dhailā dui sahasra pabongta |
muṇḍace lakṣeka pabongta bahai
lg.l: āḍi dīrghe hanumanta aśiyūṇa roṭa huai |

div.note: śaẏe kośa uñcha hoilā añjanāra suta
dhr̥ba catra yāiṁ mukuṭa lāgai hanumanta |

lg.l: arjuna garuḍa duheṁ bhaẏe tāṭakā huanti
jība na thilā prāṇī yemanta diśanti | 135 |
arjuna bichārai bandha buḍile nice nāśa gali
na jāṇi kimpe muṁ ẏehā saṅge dvandī heli | 136 |
dvārikāre thāiṁ jāṇile hari nice kaṭāḷilā hanumāna | 137 |
na jāṇi hanu saṅge pātha bibādī hoiachai
na gaḷe arjuna mora āu ki jīaṁi | 138 |
nārāẏaṇ pākhe yāiṁ miḷilā ye pachī | 140 |
garuḍa piṭhire bije kari uccabāca dekhanti | 141 |

div.note:
“bichārai garuḍa arjuna sañchaẏe nāśagalā” pare ‘ja’ pothire
adhikā pāṭha :–
ẏehā mane bichāriṇa binatā nandana
ākāśa mārgare se ye uḍilā bahana |
dvārikā bhmabane yāiṁ praceśa hoilā
nārāẏaṇaṁka agrate yāiṁ sakaḷa bāratā kahilā |
ẏeṇe mane arjuna sumarilā nārāẏaṇa
dvārikāru āsi svāmī bijaẏe tatakṣaṇa |
hanamanta arjuanra anyoanyi dekhi kari
garuḍa piṭhire thāiṁ tāhā dekhinti deba hari | (ja)

lg.l: kaḷpa kaḷpa asamkṣepa āẏuṣa aṭai yāhāra
arjuna mohor aṭai ye dutī ātmā
dvāpara yugaku sakhā ate bīra pātha | 145 |
ẏe mohora kāryye arjuna ta baḍa dukhī
ẏeteka bichāra kariṇa ye deba śirībacche
amodra jaḷare prabhma paśi hoile maha māche | 148 |
piṭhire basāi deba āborile śara bandha
śara bandha basilā ye nārāẏaṇamkara piṭhi
hanumanta dhāpa diai bandha upareṇa uṭhi | 152 |
mahābhīṣma rūpe tinipura ghoṭilā bīa hanu | 153 |

div.note: nārāẏaṇa jāṇanti yeteka baḷa tāhāra | (ṭa, ka)
rāmāẏaṇa bhoga kalā se ẏekastarī bāra | (tha, ṭha)
samodre paśi deba hoile rohi māche | (ṭa, ḍa, ḍha, cha)

lg.l: ẏesaneke bandha upare yāiṁ uṭhilā mahābaḷī
ẏeka pāda dei āra pādeka pakāilā toḷi
mukharu rudhira prabhmaṁkara paḍai ye gaḷi | 155 |
sapata dvīpa hāndoḷa ye hoai kampai basumatī | 156 |
asambhāḷa hoiṇa deba ye śrībacchi tahiṁ
mukha nāsikā bāṭare ye śroṇita bahai | 158 |
hanamanta boilā sādhu sādhu he dhanurjaẏe | 162 |
bho agasti ẏetebeḷe arjunaku kemante cihnilā hanumanta | 173 |
śuṇa ho manu puruṣa badaẏanti agasti

div.note: ẏeke ẏeke ulusi śahasraru kaḷaṁka chāḍile |
loha chāḍi kari kati prāẏe bhāsigale | (ṭa)

lg.l: dibya cakṣuku dr̥śa helā sapata brahmāṇḍa | 166 |
biśvarūpa prakāśante diśilā brahmāṇḍa khaṇḍa tini
dekhilā māruti ye pratakṣe pāntaba phālaguni | 167 |
pratakṣe nārāẏaṇa tu bhinna nohu pātha
mohora gyāna nāhiṁ tu mānaba kiḷe jāta | 169 |
ẏebe se jāṇīli tu biṣṇu nātha svaẏeṁ |
arjunaku gheni caḷilā tahuṁ khinikhinā ādhipati | 171 |
aneka sānande pūjā kale bīa pathe | 172 |
arjuan binoẏī bolai śuṇa ho māruti
mohora jyeṣṭha bhrāthā bhīmasena pabana tahuṁ utapatti | 173 |
tumbhar aāmbhara deba ẏekai sodara sabu | 174 |
sehi se sahi pārai na pabana debatāra bīryya | 176 |
bābu satya yugare se aṭai añjanā
ẏe dvāpara kahiṇa se kahai pābeni
pūbonge ẏete duraku ke āsite bhārjana | 179 |
saty ayuge hāde kañchana nāme brahmā
mīna māsa śukaḷa pakṣa pañchamī bāra śauri
kr̥ttikā nāme nakṣatra beḷa naba ghaḍi | 182 |
baba nāme karaṇa pīrati nāme yoga
maruḷa bāhane dhātā bije kale svarga | 183 |
āge brahmā badana birañchi badana pache
ẏe chāri bedare dhātā yogabeda lāi
ke re yoga mora sādhai anamite
br̥ṣabha bāhane ye bijaẏe pañchu baktre | 190 |
anīti kalu dhātā mohora yogabeda abhyāsi | 192 |
lg.note: satya yuge hāde añjana nāme brahmā | (kha, gha, ca, cha, ṅa, ḍa, ḍha, ṇa)

lg.l: guṇa abiguṇa muhiṁ debatāṁkara sabong bācchi | 194 |
īśvara boile tohora chāri ye badana
muhiṁ hāde pañcha badana aṭai pratakṣe
pañchu beda muṁ ādhyāna karai pañchu mukhe | 196 |
karatā puruṣa hoi tu kimpāi na bichāru
janitā mantre nei yogabeda kimpe bharu | 197 |
āura jyotira dhanu śiśumuna gāndhabonghiṁ lekha | 198 |
muhiṁ pañcha mukhe pañchubeda uṁkāribi sabu | 199 |
brahmā boile gabong tu bahilu mahādeba
muhiṁ hoi na pārai ki pañcha badana baktabya | 201 |
lg.note: janitā mantre kimpe ajapā mantra bharu | (ca, cha, tha)
tatpuruṣa sthānare tatpurukha
pare “kha” pothira adhikā pāṭha :–
pañchubeda yebe tu uccāra karibu
āmbhe tāhā sinā pañchu muhare śuṇibuṁ |
ẏehā śuṇi bahmā uṁkarile tuṇḍe
chāri muṇḍa upare jāta helā ẏeka muṇḍe |
kāhāku pachāribā beda kalu tu anīti | (ṭa, ñja, jha)
sāhi = sāthi śaddaja, sahāẏa |
pāṇigrāhī = mukhya byakti |

lg.l: brahmā muṇḍa upae bāhāra āreka muṇḍe | 202 |
muṇḍa upare bāhāra hoilā yebaṇa badana
īśvara boile, dhātā yugata ki; tohora pañchu badana
muṇḍe haranti muṇḍe karanti se jāta
tohorapañchu badana sahite kali muhiṁ sādhi
muhiṁ se bedabara nātha ye parasiddha | 209 |
aṅguḷi muṇḍe prahāra kale deba bhmaja daṇḍa
rāge īśvara prahāra kale bāmakara ghāte
cchiḍilā brahmāra muṇḍa lagilā īśvara bāma hāthe | 213 |
uchuḍi pakāile deba se muṇḍa goṭi
aneka bāge tāhāṁka hātharu na galā se phiṭi | 214 |
śūḷeṇa bidāri svāmī karanti khaṇḍa khaṇḍa
tadyāpi na chāḍilā se brahmākara muṇḍa | 215 |
mañcha bhmabane pāda ākāśe tāra mathā
śūnya tini bhmabana ādi kari ghoṭilā brahmāṇḍa
svarga mañcha sahite bistāra kalā tuṇḍa | 218 |
pitāku pucchā kalā tu ye mote kalu utapatti
āhāra dile sinā muṁ hoibi triputi | 219 |
āre re praśasta tuhi bhakṣa ẏe kapāḷī | 220 |
sadāśiba śūḷaku se ye na kalā kicchi bhrānti
īśvara hātharu uchuḍi ghenilā śūḷa ye śakati | 223 |
se hi śūḷa bulāiṇa ye piṭilā īśvara debatāṁku
kehi mukha na chāhiṁle hara tu kalu brahmahatyā | 225 |
brahmahatyā doṣaru kehi mukha na chāhiṁle | 226 |
kaṭaḷi brahma rākṣasa goḍāi acchi ghoṭi | 227 |
maru śikhe thāiṁ se ḍeiṁle samodraku
samodra bhitare thāiṁ ḍeiṁ paḍile agāda jaḷaku | 229 |

lg.note: svarga mañcha bistāra śarīra tāhāra piṇḍa | (ṭa, jha, ñja)

lg.l: bho biṣṇu nātha rakṣākara boli dile ghora raḍi | 232 |
yoga laẏa tejiṇ aye chāhiṁle anādi
dekhile īśvarakai brahma rākṣasa āṇai khedi | 234 |
biṣṇu nātha bhmaja baḍhāi dile yojana sahasra chāri | 235 |
nārāẏaṇaṁka kare catra dekhi brahma rākṣasa kalā bhīti | 236 |
bho īśvara baikulya hua kisa arthe | 239 |
cchidra muṇḍa goṭāẏe ta lāgiacchi tohora bāma hāthe
īśvare boile muṁ brahmāre hoili bibādī
aneka katu bākya mote brahmāẏe sampādi | 241 |
rāga sahi nuārili kaṭu bacana mote kahuṁ | 242 |
cchiḍi paḍilā se brahmāra jāta kalā muṇḍa | 243 |
se brahmāra muṇḍa cchiḍi lāgilā mohora kare
brahmāra rudhiru jāta hoilā ẏeka brahma asure | 244 |
lg.note: aneka kaṣṭhorabākye mote brahmāẏe sampādi | (da, gha)
lg.l: se brahma rākṣasa ye loḍai mote bhakṣi
teṇu kari deba muhiṁ trāse paḷāi āsiacchi | 245 |
samaste boile mote kalu ho brahmahatyā | 246 |
ẏehi durāpada saṁkaṭaru mote karibāka pāra | 247 |
hāthe thibā muṇḍa goṭi tuṇḍa ye bistāri
de de boli mote māge āṇṭa kari | 248 |
nārāẏaṇe boile ẏe kisa māgai śūḷapati
śuṇiṇa śrī nārāẏaṇa catra dhaileka kare
tini gāra ciri dile deba dakṣiṇa bhmajare | 250 |
meru phuṭi yehne gaṅgā yamūnā sarasvatī
dakṣiṇa bhmajaru rudhira bahilā tini mūrtti | 251 |
se brahmāra muṇḍa tuṇḍare rudhira baraṣi
sahasre baraṣe purilā tuṇe litāẏeka na diśi | 252 |
ẏete śoṇite tāra tuṇḍa na pūrilā
de de boli boluacchi puṇi śānti na bhajilā | 253 |
se brahma rākṣasa ye teṇe rahiacchi dure
sāṁgrāma de de boli ḍākai kopabhare | 254 |
brahmā ye īśvaraṁku mote āhāra deiacchi
muhiṁ āśākali tumbhe tāhāku kimpe rakhi | 255 |
āho mahātamā tu yebe rudhira māṁse hebu triputi
ẏehikṣaṇi debi tote tu hoibu śāntimūrtti | 256 |
īśvara bibhuti tāra tahiṁ bhitare lagāi | 257 |
rudhira bibhuti pitāra muṇḍare lāi medi

lg.note: muhiṁ tāhāku bhakṣibi tu kimpe tāku rakhi | (ñja, jha)
kara caraṇa kari puruṣeka sampādi | (ka)

lg.l: brahmāra jība lāiṁ ye toḷile ādideba | 259 |
se pratimā bhitare se yāiṁṇa sambhāilā | 260 |
amr̥ta dr̥ṣṭire chāhiṁle tāhāku nārāẏaṇa toḷi | 261 |
brahmā biṣṇu maheśvara tniṁkara jība gheni
brahmāra muṇḍu jāta se hoilā praśasta
nārāẏaṇa jāta kale yebaṇa tāhāra nāma śasta | 263 |
nārāẏaṇe āgyāṁ dile se śastaku hakāri
se brahma rākṣasaku pakāa bege māri | 264 |
se śasta praśaste ye hoilā samara
tridaśa debatāẏe tāṭakā hoile tāhā dekhi | 268 |
nityakarma bidhi patana ye hoile br̥ndāake
dib rātra boli na jāṇile debaloke | 270 |

lg.note: brahmāra jība lāiṁ ye śrijile ādideba | (ka)
ākāśe byāpilā ye duhiṁkari śira | (gha, ca, ḍa, ḍha)
lg.l: samaste trāsile ye nuārile tāhā dekhi
raha raha boli kari deba dhaile duhiṁkari bhamje | 275 |
nārāẏaṇa āgyāṁ dile tāku saṁhara karatāra | 276 |
dinakara nātha tāhā nei garbhe saṁharilā | 277 |
nārāẏaṇa āgyāṁ dile ẏehāku sambhāḷa ho puruhūta | 278 |
śastaku nele ye se surarāja deba
hanumāna boilā tu śuṇa ho phālaguni
ahalyākai chori śr̥ṅgāra kale āditya bajrapāṇi | 281 |
duhiṁkari garbhe ye śasta praśasta beni thile
indra āditya bīrye upujile beni baḷā
gautama tāhāṁka nāma dile śāmaśīḷā yabaśīḷā | 283 |
chori śr̥ṅgāra ta na jāṇanti muni
āhānika srāhāne gale beni putranta gheni | 284 |

lg.note: śāmatiḷā, yabatiḷā pāṭha dekhāyāe |
lg.l: daibe baiśākha māsa baḍa tapata bāli
se putranta srāge kākhe basāile tapaniṣṭhi | 288 |
khaṇḍe dūra āsiṇa ye añjanā boilā
chāli nuārilā pitā mo goḍata poḍilā | 289 |
gautama boile akāḷa kaṇḍa paḍucchi ki tuku
tote kākha kari calāibi ki aṇḍira puaṁku | 290 |
ẏemanta se kahilu tora parā mahāmuni | 291 |
muhiṁ sadabīrye nitānta jāta tora tāta
mote calāi kākhe ghenuṁ caurya putranta | 292 |
sandeśa pucchnti mahatamā br̥kṣa taḷe basi | 293 |
āmbhe ahalyāra yahuṁ dekhilu sundara paṇa
mr̥tu piṇḍa goṭika rakhi basithāu āī
daṇḍeheṁ na chāḍu āmbhe thāu āśramare | 296 |
āī ẏehimati hoi aneka kāḷa galā
añjanī boile tumbhe śuṇasi deba tāta
mr̥tu piṇḍa goṭi muṁ rakhithāiṁ nitya | 298 |
indra prāna hoi paśai ahalyāra garbhagate | 299 |
uṭhanti ahalyā ye prāṇa pāiṇa śarīra

lg.note: āī = āryya |
lg.l: bho pitā āditya debatāra yetebeḷe sarai keḷi
tahuṁ upujile ye ẏe beni ātmaje | 303 |
śuṇiṇa se kopa kale gautama mahāmuni
kṣīroda kūḷaku bāhuḍile beni putra gheni | 305 |
āī dekhibāra kathā kahilu bujhibā pratakṣe
dekhi ẏe kathā āmbhe karibuṁ parīkṣe | 306 |
se putranta phaṅgi dile agāda samodraku | 307 |
boile tumbhe yebe mohora bīrye jāta
ẏehi sarūpa gheni tumbhe āsiba turita | 308 |
anya bīrye yebe jāta karithiba jāẏā
markaṭa śarīra heu ẏe tumbhara kāẏā | 309 |
kapi mukha hoile ye se beni kumare
ruṣi ḍāka dianti āre śāmaśīḷā yabaśīḷā
mohora bīrye janma yebe āsa beni baḷā | 312 |
mohora birye janma yebe mānaba śarīre hua ude | 313 |
kṣīrodr̥ṁ bāhāra nohile se nandana beni | 314 |
mohora putra hile āsanti ninā bhale
sañchaẏe āna bīrye jāta se samodre gale | 316 |
añjanī kanyāku ye ghenile muni kākhe
goutame boile poḍu poḍu stirī jāti
tathāpi rakṣā kari nuārili tote kadācite | 320 |
para dārāẏe jāta kalu ye putra beni
se putra mukha chāhiṁle biśvaḷipātiā mahāpātakā | 322 |
agāda samudra bhitaraku duhiṁku dilu phiṅgi | 323 |
ahalyā boilā mote tu kimpā ẏehā kalu lo añjanī | 324 |
tohora mātā hoiṇa muṁ hoili dochārī
ālo tu mohora duhitā hoi nuārilu saṁhari | 325 |
sehu kapimukha hou tote nohiba prapati | 327 |
gautame boile go tumbhe na karibā roṣa
indra ādityaṁkara caritra ẏe tohora kisa doṣa | 328 |
tohora gyāne ki ānaku kalu paradāra
diapāḷe hoi se na kale bichāra | 329 |
lg.note: cauryye tohora ye hoiba tanaẏe
ẏehi kapimukha hou nohu tote āẏe | (ḍa, ḍha)
biśuḷipātiā = biśvāsaghātaka, pāpī, hatyākārī |
lg.l: satīki dūṣile para gr̥ha bāsa nāśa kale
āna pāpa kale se ānaku nirodhi
paradārā kale se ẏe kebaṇa bidhi | 331 |
ādityaku boile tu gagana nātha hoi paradārāẏe paśu
ẏe mohora śāpye tote rāhu ye garāsu | 333 |
indraku boile tu harilu mohora patnī
ruṣiśāpye nāśa gale āditya maghabā beni | 335 |
samodre paḍi kemante kale se beni poẏe | 336 |
bolai māruti tu ho śuṇa phālaguni
baḍabānaḷe paḍi heṭhabuḍa hoile bhāi beni | 337 |
koḷe kari dhaile se beni nandane | 338 |
stirī janma nāśa yāiṭi yubā utakarme | 341 |
paradārā bharasā go na kara tumbhe āśā
chori śr̥ṅgaraku go na baḷāa manīṣā | 342 |
lg.note: indrakra boile tora heu sasra yoni |
mora śāpye tora aṇḍa cchiḍu ẏehikṣaṇi | (kha)
lg.l: kṣaṇakara sukha go janmakara hoi doṣī
ādi aparṇṇā ye stirīṁkara baḍa tapa
hīna stirī hoile se madhyasarga bāse | 346 |
kāḷe se putra go sambhāḷana nohilā | 350 |
madhya baẏase se pāpa khaṇḍi pāpa arajilā | 351 |
paradārā doṣe śāsti diai yama debā
paradārā saṅgama na kara kehi icchā
biṣnu purāṇa śuṇile āpaṇe hoi rakṣā | 353 |
parama mā heśvarī go jaṅkhera pura bāsī
paradārā pātaka pakāa mā go dhaṁsi | 354 |
lg.note: kiñchita doṣe pāpī svāmī kope nāśi | (ṇa, ṅa, ḍa, ḍha, cha, ja, gha)
sukuntaḷā (śakuntaḷā) kanyā paradārā doṣa kari | (ja, jha, ṭa, ca,)
paradārā saṅgame kehi nohibāṭi rakṣa |
biṣa pūrori se āpaṇe karai bhakṣa | (ṭha, tha)
lg.l: yagyeṁ kusuma mā go pakāili bāñcchi
tohora prasāde mā go na kali muṁ kicchi | 355 |
prasanna hoi mā go khaṇḍa mor aẏe janmara pāpa
dharma bāñchite mote prāpata kara tapa | 356 |
parama māheśvarī mā go śrīcaṇḍī sāroḷā
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsaku debā go mukati anargaḷā | 357 |
śāmaśīḷā yabaśīḷā ye lāgile kebaṇa kati | 358 |
mānabanta boli ye ẏehāra nija putra | 363 |

lg.note: parama sānandeṇa rakṣākara tapa | (jha, ñja, ṭa, tha)
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsaku debā mati anargaḷā | (ṭha, tha, ḍa, ḍha, ca, cha, ṇa)
śatra rājāra kuḷe sujaṇeśvara yati | (ca, cha, ja, gha, ga, ḍa, ḍha)
śarajātira tanaẏa (aṁśumāḷī, aśva, māneśvara, aśvamāna, surasamāna) prabhr̥ti bhinna pāṭha dekhāyāe |

lg.l: se rājā aṭai mahā dhārmika catrabratī | 369 |
kiskindāku laban asamukdra naba yojana pariyante
samodrare se rāẏe tapa karai nitye | 370 |
putra dāna deba boli samodraku karai guhāri | 371 |
se dina khaḍadasena rājā samodraku karai sebā
bho ratnākara mote putra dāna debā | 373 |
ẏemantara samaẏe kūḷare lāgile bhāi beni | 374 |
birañchi nārāẏaṇa āgyāṁ dile sarguṁ bāṇī
ẏe dui putra pratipāḷa ho khaḍada nr̥pamaṇi | 376 |
āho arjuna sei dui putraku āṇī khaḍada nr̥pamaṇi
beni putra nāma dilā bāḷī sugrība puṇi | 377 |
śasta senāpati satya yuge indra tahiṁ thilā
tretaẏā yugare se indra bīryye bāḷī nāma pāila | 378 |
tetraẏā yuge jāta hoilā sugrība nāma bahi | 379 |
ādi praḷaẏa kāḷe tumbhe ketu maṅgaḷa
satya yugare jāta tumbhe śasta praśasta mahābaḷa | 380 |
tretaẏā yuge tumbhe bāḷī sugrība rūpe utapanna
dvāpara yuge tumbhe ho karṇṇa arajuna | 381 |
śuṇi parama sānanda hele pāṇḍaba phālaguni | 383 |
bhmañjiṇa triputi se paṇḍu rājāra suta | 384 |
parama yogī puruṣa mote karibā sadaẏe | 385 |
triputi hoili arjuna tu bara māga mote | 386 |
arjuna boile svāmī mote yebe hoilā anugraha
nandighoṣa rathare māra kapiketana hoi raha | 387 |
sāṁgrāmaku yibā beḷe chāhiṁbi tora mukha
paṇḍita loke tāta yātrā anakūḷa bidhi
hanumanta pratimā goṭiẏe dvāre thāpiba anubrata | 391 |
se thilā bhumiki nohai asura bhogī | 392 |
se annaku ātreṣi na pārai durāpāta | 393 |
āpaṇe dūṣita hoili svāmī tote na cihni | 394 |
pūbong puṇye mahātamā bheṭili muhiṁ tāṁku | 395 |
lg.note: pabana suta aṭai muṁ añjanā mohora māta | (tha) (e pāṭha śuddha)

lg.l: kapiketana cihna hoithibi tora nandighoṣa ratha | 397 |
beni kara yoḍi pātha padmapade paḍi
aneka tusti se ye karai purasari | 398 |
jaẏa tu śaraṇa jana rakṣaṇa nāha sādhu
jaẏa jaẏa śrīrāma bhagata dūta śreṣṭha
jaẏa jaẏa yama argaḷa bhañjana māruti | 404 |
jaẏa jaẏa kāḷāntaka danuja darpa naṣṭā
jaẏa jaẏa śrīrāma bhagara jana śreṣṭhā | 405 |
jaẏa jaẏa kāḷa kāma darpa bhañjā | 407 |
jaẏa jaẏa bhmabana utsaba tu paramānanda | 408 |
jaẏa jaẏa mahā yati mahā paṇḍita mahā yodhī
śrī hanumanta caraṇe śaraṇa mora sebā
śuṇante dhana putra prāpata hoẏe yathā | 411 |
hanumanta bolai pātha tu sumaribu yetebeḷe
sāṁgrāme ratha dhvaje karibi muṁ bije | 414 |
se biṣa laharī ghāẏe hāndoḷa hoẏe pāṇi
kajvaḷa kaḷaṁka praẏe pūri achanti nāgeṇī | 418 |
hanumanta boilā bābu śuṇa bīra pāthe
ẏe biṣa laharīre tu jhāsibu kemante | 419 |
kahnāi nāmeṇa ye nandara putra goṭi
bhāḷai anubrate kr̥ṣṇara bhaẏa ye lāgilā | 423 |
bāḷa kāḷe prathame potanīki dilā peṣi

lg.note: bāḷa kāḷe prathame prohi (he) ṇīki dilā peṣi | (gha, ḍha, cha, ja, ka, ṅa)

lg.l: śuṇiṇa kaṁsa keśī mane baḍa trāsi | 426 |
padma magāilā nandaku kaṭu kūṭa bacane | 427 |
kāhnu saṁtriṣeṇa gale padma puṣya toḷi | 428 |
nāgabaḷa gheni thilā tahiṁ kāḷi ye nāgeṇī | 429 |
garuḍa bije kalā dekhi kāḷī paḷāilā ḍare
toṣeṇa svāmī tāra śira basaile padmapāda cihna | 432 |
garuḍa bolai yebe nārāẏaṇa anugraha kale tuku
paḷā yā kāḷī tu mora adr̥śya sthānaku | 434 |
garuḍa paśi nuārai ẏe bhmabna bhitare | 436 |
lg.note: para ‘kha’ pothire adhikā pāṭha–
padma tolanteṇa se kaṭāḷilā kāḷi
dhāmante biṣa laharī paḍai uchuḷi |
daṁśilā se padmapāde ḍhaḷile acyuta
garuḍaku sumaraṇā kale haḷahasta |

lg.l: kinimante garuḍa ye na paśai ẏethi | 437 |
bābu anusara nāme ẏekai satya yuge
garuḍa ẏe pabongte āsi dineka biśrami
ẏehāku bhakṣile pitāra māṁsa bhakṣilā sari pāpa | 445 |
ke abā pakāilā āṇi āmbhara upare
āmbhara bola meṇṭi yehbe sarobare paśu
dahana hoi śarīra hou dhūḷi pāuṁśu | 447 |
teṇu ḷari garuḍa nuārai ẏethi paśi | 448 |
teṇu kari nicinte kāḷiẏa nāga ẏetheṁ rahiacchi | 449 |
nārāẏaṇa aṅge ghāuḍa kalā yeuṇa uḍaṅga
jāṇiṇa arjuna ẏethi tu huasi saṁsarga | 450 |
lg.note: teṇu kari nikhabonge kāḷiẏa nāga ẏetheṁ rahiacchi | [aneka pāṭha]

lg.l: sarobare paśilā bīra kare gadā gheni | 451 |
asita mārāga jiṇi diśe deha barṇṇa
beni pāde birājai tāra padma cihna | 452 |
kamaḷa patra upare arjuna yāiṁ uṭhi
kiḷikiḷā nāde nāge uṭhile dekhai kirīṭī | 453 |
tini sāta pāñcha pheṇā śirare birāji
kāḷi nāguṇīra sahasre br̥nda sanya gahana sarobara | 455 |
kāḷi nāgabaḷa dekhi se kicchi na karai bhaẏe | 456 |
toḷai kamaḷa se padmapatre dhīre dhīre uṭhi
piṭai nāganta se kareṇa dhari yaṣṭi | 457 |
nāguṇī baḷa dekhiṇa se diguṇa paracaṇḍā | 458 |
kajvaḷa barṇṇa pāṇi hoilā rakata br̥ṣṭi | 460 |
mahā bhīṣmarūpa dhari dhāiṁle aneka nāga
bāmakare kamaḷa toḷai ḍāhāāṇa kare yaṣṭi gheni

lg.note: sarobare paśilā bīra kare chāpa gheni | (ka, kha, ḍha, jha)
hr̥edaẏare śobhābana baijaẏantī māḷā | (ka, ṇa)
hr̥daẏare śobhābana birājai banamāḷā | (kha)
asita = kr̥ṣṇa nīḷabarṇṇa |

lg.l: kamaḷ apatreṇa se beni pāda dei
keteka uśvāsa se jaḷare na buḍai | 465 |
ātreṣi ghoṭilu āmbhe ye yāhāra darpe
toṭa bhāṅganteṇa āmbhe dhaiṁlu sabong sarpe | 466 |
akāṭa atuṭa phuṭa aṭai tāhāra kāẏe
ẏeḍe baḍa madhubana toṭā goṭā dhvaṁsa gaḷā ẏete kāḷe | 468 |
āpaṇe bije kalā kāḷī nāga puṇi | 469 |
mandara tulya jāṇi tāra śairare sapata pheṇā
kopeṇa binddhalā pātha dibya sahasra nta gheni | 472 |
tuṇḍa bistāra se ye kariacchi kāḷi
arjuna binddhalā ye sapta lakṣa kāṇḍa
samasta paśilā yāi kāḷiẏa nāgara tuṇḍa | 474 |
śara sandhāna se ye karai dhanurjaẏe
nāguṇīra garbhe paḍi samasta yāi kṣaẏe | 475 |
khāṇḍaba bana dahana kāḷe agni debatā dile yebaṇa mauṣadhi
tāha ādhāna kalā saṁgrāme pātha jambhabhedī | 478 |
auṣadhira śara ye paḍalā yāiṁ ghoṭi
sarpa mr̥dhuni ki, tahiṁre yāuacchi phāṭi | 480 |
mauṣadhi gandha lāgi bhājilā sabong sarpaṁkara darpa
jaḷa bhmabana teji paḷāile sabong sarpa | 481 |
paḍilā śara se kāḷira bhālapaṭa upara
marddilāka pheru se ye uḍaṅga śikhara | 482 |
sarobara tejyā kari kandare paśai gaḷi | 483 |
goḍai garuḍa śara arjuna tahiṁ peṣi | 484 |
catra bighāte kāḷī benakhaṇḍa hoi cchiḍi
saṁsāra nāśenī tahuṁ se paḍilā bhūmi māḍi | 488 |
sādhu sādhu arjuna ho mahimā tora dhani
sādhu mahimā tote jāta kalā yebaṇa jananī | 490 |
sādhu sādhu arjuna tohora pitā mātā
sādhu sādhu arjuna tora iṣṭaguru debatā | 491 |
lg.note: pātha jambhabhedī = pātha śreṣṭha = pātha indra |
lg.l: sādhu sadhu arjuna tu bhāroimalla pātha
sādhu kṣaṇe prasanna tote hoile jagannatha | 492 |
se sarobara acchi kapāḷeśvara dakṣa daita | 496 |
arjuna beni caraṇa dilā hāde giḷi | 500 |
arjuna hāka diai svāmī hanumāna mote rakha | 501 |
kaṭi dhari kehu mote buḍāuacchi jaḷe | 502 |
nakha mukha nāsikā caraṇa na diśai kicchi
śūnya debatā prāẏe mote caraṇaāḍu giḷuacchi | 503 |
bhaẏeṇa chāḍi dilā se dakṣa asure | 505 |
lg.note: dakṣa = yakṣa ya sthānare da hue yathā yaśa = dacccha |

lg.l: kebaṇa carita ẏehā muṁ nuārili cihni | 508 |
baḍāi asaṁkhya agocara asambhaba kathā māẏā
kisa gheni giḷilā se mote na diśai kāẏā | 509 |
tretaẏā yugara ye bahuta kāḷara ẏe kathā | 510 |
daśaratha rājāṁkara upujile ye chāri nandana | 511 |
pitā satya nimante rāma gale banabāsa
lakṣmaṇa jānakī goḍāi gale tāṁka pāśa | 512 |
aneka giribara nei upare kaleka prahāra
śarīre paḍi tāhāra hoilā śate cūra | 519 |
kebeheṁ badha yahuṁ nohiḷā debaṁka airi
āge ubhā hoile śrīrāma kodaṇḍa kāṇḍa dhari | 520 |
katurī nārāja peṣi rāma tāra chedile beni hātha | 521 |
bhmaja cchiḍanteṇa asura ye diguṇa paracaṇḍā
ḍāḷa cchiḍante yesaneke br̥kṣa diśai muṇḍā | 522 |
pabongta prāẏe kopeṇa tuṇḍa ye bistāri
sahasra bighāte ye cchiḍilā tāra muṇḍa | 524 |
se tubandha upare yāiṁ paḍilā tāra kāẏe
uccharga diśilā se dutī bandha prāẏe | 525 |
puṇihiṁ śrīrāma tāra muṇḍa kale beni phāḷa | 526 |
taḷa pāṭi khaṇḍa ye samodre paḍilā yāiṁ
upara kapāḷī khaṇḍa paḍu acchi ḍeiṁ | 527 |
mahā tape manāilā ẏe birañchi daibate | 531 |
kaṣṭhora tapa dekhi bijaẏa kaleka birañchi
bara māga kumbhakarṇṇa ye tora mane hāñcchi | 532 |
bolai bhmañjibi nidrā yibi na jāṇibi āna | 533 |
ye abā māri mote loḍiba samare
bibhīṣaṇa boile deba pūbongra bara heṭi
kryeṇa piṭhi kale nāhiṁ deba doṣa
yeuṇisi bāge deba śatr̥ karibāka nāśa | 536 |
kebeheṁ rākṣasaku piṭhi se na kale | 537 |
samareṇa datya bīra dekhilāka śrīrāmaṁka piṭhi | 539 |
garjana nāda kari ākāśe ailāka uḍi
ẏe madhu banare āsi kapāḷa tāra paḍi | 540 |
kapāḷeśvara boli ẏe ye aṭai sarobara
śatr̥ piṭhi dekhile se kṣaẏa yāi mahātamā | 544 |
teṇu se birodha tote kalāka dhanurjaẏe | 546 |
beni lakṣa kusuma ye amaḷāṇa kari bācchi | 548 |
mane bichāra kale se kaśyapa ruṣi bāḷe | 550 |
nārāẏaṇa śaraṇuṁ samaẏe ẏehānta kale rakṣā
catra cihna dekhi muṁ kalaiṁ upekṣā | 551 |
anugraha nātha mote āgyāṁ debā svāmī | 554 |
śubha yoge gabana tu kara ho arajuna | 555 |
ākāśe gabana karai bainetre bāsaba tanaẏe | 556 |
jagatīre bije kariachanti deba arjunakai bāṭa chāhiṁ | 557 |
suganddhakā puṣya gheni arjuna bije kalā | 559 |
biḷamba dekhi kari barata pachāranti acyuta
tu se bhāñjilu bābu kāḷiẏa nāgara bayu | 562 |

div.note: tuhi se darpa bhāñjilu nāga sarpa kāḷi (jha, ñja, kha)
sāhī = śāẏī |

lg.l: dhanya dhanya arajuna ho tohora mahimā
ẏe saẏaḷa saṁsāre tu ruhāilu sīmā | 566 |
tohora mahimā ye āmbhe dekhilu beni ḍoḷe | 567 |
sabong bhmabi jiṇimāku nāraẏaṇa tora sakhā | 568 |
aneka sambhabonge se pratiṣṭhā kale oṣā
debakī yaśodāṁkara tahiṁ ye pūrilā manīṣā | 569
aṣṭaratne khañjita kale lakṣeka dhenu gāī | 570 |
arjune gheni deba bijaẏe nandighoṣa rathe | 572 |
hastinā bhmabane yāi bijaẏe śrīkr̥ṣṇa sabongsacī | 573 |

div.note: bāḷaarka prāẏe se diśanti teja barṇṇa | (ca, ja)
ẏe tohora mahimā sinā rahilā cirakāḷe | [tha, ṭha]
bāñcchile ye yāhāra sampada manīṣā | [ḍa, ḍha, gha, ca, ṅa, ṇa]

tejodyāna = teja udyāna, teja udgata,
teja uparaku uṭhuthibā |

lg.l: praḷamba kale yāi yujheṣṭhiṁka padma pāẏe | 574 |
tahiṁ yāiṁ arjuna bijaẏe parama sānanda | 575 |
bidure pucchā kale tumbhe śuṇimā jagannāthe
svāmī suganddhakā puṣya āṇigale bīra pāthe | 576 |
hanumantakai pātha bheṭilā khinikhinā nāme purī | 578 |

div.note:
praḷamba kale yāi yujhiṣṭhiṁka padma pāẏe pare ‘kha’ pothire
adhika pāṭha :–
jagannāthe pūjā kale yujheṣṭhi paẏara
sohodrā ye tahuṁ caḷicale antapura |
dhāiṁ āsi dharmasuta śrīhariṁki toḷi
pachāranti kuśaḷa ye dhana dārā haḷī |
śrīhari kahile yahuṁ sakaḷa kuśaḷa

lg.note: śrīhari kahanti svāmī śuṇa deba dharme
lg.l: mātā upabāsī kr̥ṣṇa gaurī oṣā karme |

div.note: suganddhakā nimante arjuna yāithilā
ẏekāmātra garuḍa ye tāṁku ghenigalā |

‘ja’ pothire “hanumantakara pātha bheṭilā khinikhinā nāme purī”
pare adhikā pāṭha :–
sarobara kuḷe rahi chāhaṁi puṣyaku
kapibaḷamānanta māriṇa bibaccchi
sarobara kuḷare se ubhā hoiacchi |
kapibaḷamane tahuṁ palāiṇa gale
hanumanta āge yiṁ bāratā kahile |
kapiṁkara ṭhāru hanumanta niṣṭhura bākya śuṇi
kope prajvaḷita hoi bāhāra śira jhuṇi |
sarobara kūḷe āsi se prabeśa hoilā
arjanaku sehu dūrare thāiṁṇa dekhilā |
sarobaraku chāhiṁṇa pātha dekhuthilā suganddha
hanumanta kopanteṇa tāhā tule se hoilāka dvandī |

lg.l: boilā bārānidhi āmbhe bānddhalu bandha seya | 580 |
aneka durgama giri muṁ āṇili upāḍi
nimiṣake bandha bānddhabi laṁkā ye bhmabana | 582 |
nohile nāśagalu ke āja tote rakhi | 583 |
śate pañchabiṁśa yojana lamba batiśa yojana prati | 585 |
hanu praśaṁsai sādhu sādhu ho kirīṭī
tora bandha upare muṁ dhūma debi uṭhi | 587 |
yesanake chāpile jaḷe na buḍai sola bheḷā | 589 |
toṣe nāma dile arjunaku setubāha pātha | 590 |

div.note: deḍhaśata biṁśa yojana lamba batiśa yojana prati | (ḍa, ḍha, gha, ca, cha)
tora bandha upare muṁ dhāpa debi uṭhi | (ḍa, ḍha)
yesaneka māḍile upuciāi sola bheḷā | [ca, tha]
seta = setubandha |
dhūma = mahā āḍambara, upadraba dhūmdham |

lg.l: suganddhakā puṣya tolī kāḷiẏa darpa daḷi | 591 |
ananta mūrati kāḷiẏa nāga baḷa darpa dhaṁsi
laṁkā datya bidārilā se kapāḷī sarobare paśi | 592 |
bahuta pratagyāṁ kari hari kahile sabhāẏe
śuṇanti kaurobe ye badhira jana prāẏe | 593 |
yujheṣthiṁki kahi dvārikāku bije kale śrī jagamohane | 596 |
prāpate pāili muṁ abhaẏe sarasvatī bheṭi | 599 |
tathya pāili muṁ se debīra buddhibaḷe | 600 |
mana bacana karttabye ajapā yoga laẏe
bākya debī bhaṇḍāra bidhaṁsili sāroḷa āgyāṁẏe | 601 |
sadā anugraha mote ye karai siddha kāntāẏenī
jana saṁsāra bodhili se debīra laẏe gheni | 602 |

div.note:
yehne śāhāsreṇa subidhāna grantha pada
pariṇāmi paśaṁsā sarasvatīra sampada | (ña)
tattvārtha pāili muṁ ye debīra buddha baḷe | (ja, jha)
pada artha pāili muṁ se debīra buddhi baḷe | (ṭa, ñja)

mana bacana karttabye ajapā ādhyāne
bākdebī bhaṇḍāra muṁ biḷasili sāraḷā prasanne | [ja, ñja, jha]

lg.l: dr̥śya phaḷa śr̥ti mote śrīrāma nāma goṭi | 603 |
kāśī nadī tīre mohora dr̥ḍha ye āsana | 604 |
janmeṇa mūrkha muṁ na paḍhili śāhāsra bidyā
binā tapeṇa bāchā muṁ pāili saṁsiddhā | 605 |
śrī kr̥pājaḷa nandinī nāma tā sarasvatī
ihaloke baradāẏinī go saẏaḷa jana cintā
dukhījana dekhai se trailokya jana mātā | 607 |
siddha sāroḷā caraṇe muṁ khatai janme janme | 608 |
prasanne abhaẏa bara deu śrīcaṇḍī sāraḷā | 609 |
kāḷabhaẏa meṇṭaṇa kali śrī hiṅguḷā parasanne | 612 |
muṁ tāha srijili śḷoka śāhāsra bāge | 614 |

div.note: binā tape bāñcchā siddha kale yogasiddhā | (ṭha)
dukhījana rakhai se trailokya jana mātā | (ka, ṅa)
dhana putra āẏu labha sabongjane | (ja, ṭha, tha)

lg.l: tāhā bibhā helu deba sambhare meḷa mati | 618 |
śūdramuni sāraḷā dāsa tumbha caraṇe śaraṇa | 620 |
jaẏa tu nārāẏaṇī go anādi śakati
tohora buddhibaḷe mā go rakatabīryya dhaṁsi
daitara tule yuddha kalu cauda dina yāẏe | 623 |
yahuṁ rakatabīryyaku kutūhoḷe debī kalu dhaṁsa
tāhāra rakata taḷe paḍi upujile aśeṣa rākṣasa | 624 |
cauda marbhmata debī jāta kalu tahuṁ | 625 |
taṇu kari rakatabīryya bāhinī ye bolanti debī tote
dānabakuḷa dhamsinī go sudaẏā kalu mote | 626 |
tohora caraṇaku mā go āśre kali muhiṁ

div.note: dibya amr̥ta prāẏe samaẏe bhāratha prabartti | (cha, tha)
paḍhante śuṇante sāttvika parama yoga | (ṭha, ḍa, ḍha, gha, ca, cha, ja)
daitara tule yuddha kalu caubiṁśa dina yāẏe | [ca, ṭha]
teṇu kari rakatabīryya nāśinī bolanti debī tote | [ña]

lg.l: tu debī sudaẏā kale pāibi kāraṇa
manuṣya yonire mā go muṁ hoicchi janama | 628 |
mūrkha apaṇḍita muṁ ye na jāṇai kicchi
tohora caraṇaku muṁ ye āśre kariacchi | 629 |
sāroḷāra rūpe mote kahilu yebaṇa grantha
sujana jana saṅgate muhiṁ ye na thāi | 631 |
paśā juā śakaṭādi ābara nānā raṅge | 632 |
tu yahuṁ sadaẏe kalusi mā go mote
teṇu kari sujana mote bolanti jagate | 633 |
ẏebe karuṇā kale mā go kahibi bhāratha
agocara diśilā māta mote madhyapabong artha | 634 |
ẏeṇu go nārāẏaṇī āśre kali tote
ailā māẏā boli go urāuachuṁ mote | 635 |
mote anugraha kara ma go maẏeṁṣa badhinī
dr̥gati hara mā go rakata māẏeṁsa bhakṣiṇī | 636 |

div.head: {@kuṇḍaḷī daitya badha@}

lg.l: baibasuta manu ye bilaṁka deśara rājā
agasti muniṁka caraṇe kaleka dibya pūjā | 1 |
dhūpa dīpa naikbedya gandha puṣya dei
bho muni mote ye āgyāṁ dila śrīmahābhāratha
ādi anta kari mote kahibā kumbharuṣi suta | 5 |
ẏeka mana ẏeka citta hoi ye tohora | 7 |
bhāratha ẏeka citte śuṇa toṣa hoi
ẏebe yāhā kahibā tu sābadhāne śuṇa
biśākhā nakṣatra bichāre ṣāṭhiẏe daṇḍa bhoga
kauḷaba nāme karaṇa parigha nāme yoga | 10 |
daśa sahasra rathī śalya karṇṇa beni | 11 |
svabhābe yāhāra nāma kuru ye sāgara | 14 |
chaẏāṇoẏī sahasra rājā yāhāra caraṇe khaṭai | 15 |
āreḍeka boli pabongta, tahiṁre bege miḷi | 16 |

div.note: mukharāba śabadare kuruma uchuḷi | [kha, ḍa, ḍha]

airāja, āraṇyaḷa, arañjana, aira papongta prabhr̥ti
bhinna pāṭha dekhāyāe |

lg.l: ratha gaja aśva pādānti tāra saṅgate nāhiṁ kicchi
ẏekā hoi se asura araṇye buluacchi | 19 |
pabongta śikhe thāi dānaba dr̥ṣṭi kari
mandra giri prāẏe diśai śarīra tāhāri | 20 |
hasi bichārai ẏe kebaṇa deśara narabai | 21 |
bahuta saina gheni ẏeta yāuachi caḷi
ati gabong bahi ẏe ḍākanti koḷāhaḷī | 22 |
bādyanāda śuṇiṇa bīra kaḷa ẏeka raḍi

div.note: kathāẏeka hoilā atihiṁ ācamtita | (ja, ṭha)
jvāḷābaḷī pāṭaṇāre aṭai tāra ghara | (ṅa)

ẏete bichāri datya kalā ẏeka raḍi
āṣāḍha māsare yehne megha ghaḍaghaḍi | [ṭa, jha, ṭha, kha, ta, ja, ṇa]

lg.l: ke tohora tāta māta nāma tora kisa hoẏe | 29 |
bīratūra śabada tu śunalā mora nāhiṁ | 30 |
bhaẏe nāhiṁ tohora tu nirbhaẏe puṇa
tohora tule āja karibā āmbhe raṇa | 32 |
jāṇili sāṁgrāme tumbhe aṭa baḍa rājā | 33 |
ājara sāṁgrāme yebe brati yibu tuhi
jāṇimā pr̥thīre tote āu mr̥tu nāhiṁ | 34 |
kurusāgara sainaku se uṭhilā śira jhuṇi | 35 |
dhuśāsana kopa kalā pratagyāṁ tāra dekhi
āge kalā ratha nei kareṇa dhari gadābara
pachārai kāhiṁra re aṭutu pamara asura | 37 |
mr̥tu kaḍhāi kire āṇiacchi ẏethi tote
na jāṇu kire hastināra nr̥pa cūḍamaṇi
bijaẏe kariachanti bane daṇḍa saina palāṇi | 39 |
chaẏāṇoi sahasra rājā yāhāra caraṇe bande
tu chāra tāhā mote pachāru achure jāti andhe | 41 |
re re kariṇa ye pachāruchu tuhi
yamara ghare ki prāṇa achu bandhā dei | 42 |

div.note:
keuṁ deśaku re tumbhe karucha paẏāṇa
bīratūra śabada bajā keuṇa kāraṇa | (kha)

lg.l: tu chāra asura kuḷe hoiachu jāta
pocha māḍante yehne ṭekai sarpa pheṇi | 44 |
hasi asura pachārilā tu re aṭu manda bāi
āmbhaku pachāruachu re kāhiṁra aṭu tuhi | 45 |
ẏe te boli kope se ye kampai tharahara
bāta ghāte rambhāpatra yehne uḍai pharahara | 47 |
kare kodāḷa gheniṇa se antarīcche bulāi
dhuśāsana rathare ye prahāra kalā nei | 48 |
rathu ḍeiṁ ubhā helā dhr̥tirāṣṭa tanaẏe | 50 |
bāma hātha pāti tāhā dānaba ghenigalā

div.note:
tu chāra asura kuḷe hoi abatāra
tohora jībana hāribu āja āmbhara hāthara | [kha]
pachāruachu rājā gabonge maẏematta | [jha]
dhuśāsana mukhuṁ ẏemanta bākya śuṇi |
niprodha = niproha = ni uprodha |

lg.l: rājāra āgyāṁ pāi dhāiṁle bhāi śate
re re dānaba boli beḍhile caukati
gadā chela bhāla sehu māile śakati | 61 |
lakṣe lakṣe bhāra gadā māile taḍati
mudugara asipatra sūryya kiraṇa prāẏe jyoti | 62 |
huṁ huṁ kāra śabade māranti śasramāna
hasiṇa dānaba ye pachārai tāhānta chāhiṁ

lg.note: ‘kha’ pothire “bājanteṇa śahasra pulakai tāra deha” pare :–
puṇa puṇa kurubīramāne gadā dhari piṭi
dānabara aṅge paḍi agni jaḷi uṭhi |
dānabara aṅge piṭi sabonge niśasra hoile | [ja, ṇa]

lg.l: sāṁgrāma bhumire tumbhe re pratagyāṁ kari kaha | 68 |
āmbhara abhāra abhāgya re bheṭilu tumbhaṁku
dhuśāsana ādi kari aṭhāṇoiṁ bhāi yete
ẏekā bidhākare tahiṁ paḍile ẏete bīra
saina senāmāna gheni tumbhe acha ubhā hoi
jāṇi kari tumbhara mohoṭhāre dukha hoi | 77 |
yuddha na kari kimpe tūni hoi rahila | 78 |
tumbhemāne mauna hoi na deucha uddeśya | 79 |
ẏete boliṇa rājā tahiṁ kapāḷe kara dilā
āhā mora bhāi dhuśāsana boliṇa boilā | 80 |
bhīṣma droṇe boile śuṇa ho napati

lg.note: bekare lāgilā āsi kāḷadaṇḍa phāśi | [ṇa, ja]
jāṇi kari tumbhara mohoṭhāre daẏā | [cha, ṭha, ja]
lg.l: ẏeka yodhāku ki bahuta loka māri
ẏehā bichāri āmbhe na kariachu raṇa
ẏehikṣaṇi yuddha āmbhara dekha tu āpaṇa | 84 |
mānagobinda boilā mohora dharma adharma ẏe dui
mohora upare hele tumbhara kisa yāi | 85 |
ẏehā śuṇi gaṅgāsuta ṭaṁkāra kale guṇa
troṇaru bāhāra kale daśa sahasra bāṇa | 86 |
sabhiẏeṁ bindha beḍhi kicchihiṁ doṣa nāhiṁ | 87 |
asuraku beḍhiṇa se bege śara binddha | 88 |
bhīṣmaṁkara daśa sahasra nārāja jāṇiṇa bajraghāta
aśastamā binddhale koṭiẏe nārāja bajra sūciṭi
śalye daśa sahasra nārāja bajra ghoṭi | 90 |
karṇṇa aśi sahasra binddhale nārāja timbura
somadatta nārāja binddhale pabongtā lakṣe śara
jadyaratha nārāja kale śara koṭi pandara | 92 |
śrābaṇa māsare yehne droṇa meghara br̥ṣṭi
lakṣe lakṣe gadā ye lakṣe lakṣe timbura
lakṣe lakṣe śakati lakṣa lakṣa mudugara | 94 |
lg.note:
bābu mahā yoddhāẏe āmbhe abatariachuṁ pr̥thibīra
adharma pātaka tote hoiba nr̥pabara | [ḍa, ḍha]
karṇṇa daśa sahasra binddhale tīkṣa munā śara | [jha, ṭa]

lg.l: lakṣe pura kari sabonge māru ye achanti
lakṣe pabongta bāṇa se binddhale turita | 99 |
puṇihiṁ gaṅgāsuta binddhale anaḷa daśa sasra bāṇa
tuṇḍa pāti dānaba giḷi dilā tāhiṁ
bhāṅgi pakāilā datya dhariṇa bāma hāthe | 103 |
bāma hāthe dhari tāhā daita daitadilā giḷi | 104 |
śatr̥ jaẏe bāṇa ye binddhale kr̥pabrahmā | 106 |
lg.note:
marbhmata marbhmata kari tahiṁ maruchanti śara
aṅga pāti rahiacchi tahiṁ kuṇḍaḷīsiṁgha bīra | [ja]
maṇḍaḷacatra śara binddhaleka śate | [ṭa, jha, ja, cha, ña]
bajrābaḷī śara bhmīṣa binddhaleka śate | [kha]
lg.l: aniḷa śaraku binddhale ye bīra karṇṇa
āu yete yodhā achanti sāṁgrāma maṇḍaḷare
koṭi lakṣa bāna binddhale ye yāhāre | 109 |
śatr̥ ki jiṇima tumbhere binddha ẏehu bāṇa | 112 |
apūbong śahasra thile parīkṣa tumbhe kara
maraṇa nikaṭa āsi re hoilā tumbhara | 113 |
rathī yodhā kari goṭiẏe na rakhila | 117 |
rathī maharathī hāthī padānta thile yete
baḷī mahābaḷī tahiṁ rahithile yete yete | 118 |
tesaneke śobhā ye diśanti paḍibāra saina | 120 |
saburihiṁ mr̥tu se ye dekhai nr̥pati
hā hā kāra kalā tahiṁ manacatrabratī | 122 |
binā arthe śatra āsi miḷilāka pathe
āu ki ẏekā hoi bratibaiṁ muhiṁ
hastināku yibi muhiṁ kāhāra mukha chāhiṁ | 125 |
dānabara hāthe pache yāu mora prāṇa | 126 |
re re dānaba boli ḍākilā bitramasiṁgha prāẏe | 127 |
ẏete boli dhanu dhari ṭaṁkāriḷā guṇa | 129 |
muṇḍa pātiṇa daita sahilā se śara | 130 |
hr̥daẏa pāti tāhā sahilā dānaba rājana | 131 |
puṇihiṁ binddhalā se śakati lakṣe bāṇa
bāma bhmaja pāti tāhā asur akalāka raṇabhaṇ a| 134 |
kopeṇa garji rājā binddhalā śate śara
hasi jibhyā pātilā tahiṁ kuṇḍaḷīsiṁgha bīra | 135 |
lg.note: re re dānaba boli ḍākilā siṁgharaḍi prāẏe | (cha, ḍa, ḍha, cha)
śarayantā śara ye binddhalā nr̥pabara | (ṭa, ṭha, ḍa, ḍha)

lg.l: āhuri guṇe basailā se kalāṭi ciāra | 139 |
guṇare basāi se ākarṇṇa yaẏe ṭāṇi
agnira tejaku nārāja ye pārai jiṇi | 140 |
mantra sumarilā se ye tinibeḷa yāẏe
binddhalā nārāja sūryya teja hīna hoẏe | 141 |
nicaẏe hoilā āsi mote akāḷa maraṇa | 144 |
ẏeḍe baḍa śahasra yebe came na phuṭai
mr̥tu ẏehāku daiba thoiṇa acchi kāhiṁ | 145 |
ḍakilāka asura tu re nicaẏe galu nāśa
nāma to ẏeḍe baḍa abhaẏe somabongśī
saina senā nāśiṇa āpaṇe hoibu bināśi | 148 |
āṣya thibā yāẏe śarīre thiba prāṇa | 149 |
lg.note: bhāñji pakāilā se kāḷanteka śakati | (ṭa, ṭha, ḍa, ḍha, ṇa)
binddhala nārāja sūryyara teja praẏe | (ñja)
lg.l: āre mukhare āṅguḷi ye dantare tiraṇa
bekare koṭhāra re bandha tu āpaṇa | 150 |
bola muṁ arakṣīta mote rakṣā kari yāa | 151 |
rahiṇa thiba prāṇa āṣya thibā yāẏe | 152 |
śārddūḷa carma chāuṇi ye rathu phiṭaibu
tebe se tote chāḍidebi tu yibu nija pura | 154 |
ṭahu ṭaha hasiṇa boila āre bāi
ẏeteka chāḍibi kire muṁ tohora chāra pāiṁ | 156 |
ẏeteka bichāri rājā boilā sa rathi
prāṇa rakṣā karibuṭi tohora buddhi cinti | 157 |
śate bhāi ādi mo bongśa gale naśa | 158 |
bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa śalya bhurisabongāhiṁ paḍilā
jadyaratha paḍilā mo bhaẏeṇī rāṇḍa helā | 159 |
ẏebe yebe mohora hoilā deha nāśa
kāhuṁ milīlā se āsi keuṁṇa deśara
saina senā sabuṭi mora kalā nārakhāra | 161 |
maru abā rākṣāsa maraiṁ abā muhiṁ
kahuṁ kahuṁ ratharu ye ḍeiṁlā narabai | 162 |
re re kāra kari gadā ghenilā beni kare
dekhiṇa kurupati tāra hr̥de māḍi basilāka jhāti
māilāka muthe se ye bajrara ākr̥ti | 165 |
naẏana pheḍi kari ye chāhiṁlā daita | 166 |
jhāḍilāka deha ye jhaḍi paḍilā nr̥pati
koḍāḷa āẏudha rājā chaḍāi pakāilā taḷe
māla bindhāṇa ghenilā daita rājā meḷe | 169 |
ātaṅge cintilā se ye rebatīra pati
cauda kośa dānabara yahuṁ dekhilā ākr̥ti | 170 |
aśi sahasra baḷa ye aṭai mattahāthī
ẏeteka baḷa bahai se dānaba kuḷapati | 172 |
duheṁ duhiṁki se ye hoile dharādhari
dehibāku nāhiṁ se ye svarga mañcha purī | 173 |
mane cintā karai rakṣākara he deba dharma | 175 |
somabongśa gheni ye āpaṇe nāśa gale | 176 |
hā hā dharma boli ye cintai sārathi
dānabara mukhuṁ rakṣā kara he nr̥pati | 178 |
naẏanaru aśr̥jaḷ aye bahai ghana ghana | 179 |
hāthaku hātha chandi pādaku pāda dei
muṇḍaku muṇḍa se ye māranti roṣa bahi | 181 |
māranti muthe se ye hoanti yantāyanti | 182 |
karanti garajana se ye āṣāḍha megha jāṇi
svargare suragaṇe ye achanti ubhā hoi
dānabara mr̥tu acchi ẏehāra tahiṁki bolanti | 185 |
kuru sāgara sainya samaste hele hata
ẏehāra upara bongśe asura thile yete
ẏe puṇa nāśa gale hoiṇa mattagabonge | 189 |
ẏemāna duṣṭa paṇe debaṁku kale nāśa
ẏehu ẏebe jiṇilā ye bhmabana tridaśa | 190 |
ẏebe ye ẏehāra mr̥tu kahibaku hou
durgāra kopare ta nāśa gale sehu | 191 |
ẏehi bongśe nāśa niceṁ yiba ẏe asura
ẏe kathā pramāṇa jāṇa kahiluṁ nikara | 194 |
ẏe daita nāśa yāu se svarga rakṣā karu | 195 |
keteka dina antare mariba kaha mote
br̥haspati boilā mariba ẏe caudina ante| 196 |
kahibāku agocara debe chanti dr̥ṣṭi kari | 198 |
re re kāra raḍi paḍibāra ṭhāre
heṭhanti haṭhanti huṁ huṁ śabade hākanti | 201 |
tini kośa pariyante bana hoilā padāmaẏe
dhūḷi dhapaṭa hoilā tini kaśa yāẏe | 205 |

lg.note: asura tule māla yuddha rāẏe
kahibāku asakhya upamā debāku kicchi lakṣa nohe | [ṭa, ṭha, ḍa, ḍha]

lg.l: malā boli chāḍi ubhā hoilā asura kuḷa rāẏe | 208 |
ẏete kahi neuṭilā dānaba kuḷa debe | 211 |
rakata lāgi diśai sindūra giri prāẏe
yumunā kūḷe kūḷe chālai dhīre dhīre
sārathi ye dekhuthilā ratha pare thāiṁ
rodana kalā sārathi rājāra mukha chāhiṁ | 214 |
hā hā daiba boli kapāḷe mārai kara
bho daiba paruṣa āṇi kalu ẏete dūra | 215 |
binā doṣe nāśa gale kuru sāgara saina
yāhāra bije kale kampai dibi pr̥thī
asura hāthe thilā ẏehānta mr̥tu gati | 217 |
bichārai kemante muṁ yibi tucchā ratha gheni | 218 |
dharma śāhāsre boli se narka gati pāi | 219 |
śūnya ratha gheni muṁ yibi hastināku
ki boli kahibiṭi muṁ rājāra lokaṁku | 220 |
ki boli bolibe mote pañchu kaṭaka jana
ki boli bolibe mote paṇḍura nandana | 221 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa śate putra sahite gale nāśa
mohora dekhuṁ dekhuṁ paḍile ẏe raṇe
aṭhara kṣauṇī thāṭha paḍile na rahile jaṇe | 225 |
jaṇa jaṇa kari toḷilā ẏehi mate
se bāṭe sārathi gheni caḷai rahubara | 232 |
śārddūḷa carma chāẏeṇī upare dhvaja chatra | 234 |
puṣparāga dvārā gaḍhā nīḷā ratna saja | 238 |
bicitra ratha dekhi mādrī debīra baḷā
mr̥tu kāḷe praṇīki yesane kāḷa bikāḷa dahe | 241 |
diga na bāriṇa ye bāhuacchi ratha | 242 |
āmbhe ḍakuachu tu na śuṇu kipāiṁ | 244 |
nakuḷa boile re kāryya kisa kaha
kebaṇa deśara se na kahilā daita
sāṁgrāme kuru sātgara saina se kalā hata | 249 |
lg.note: guruja = guja |
lg.l: pādānti turaṅga hāthī nāhiṁ tāra rahubara
sarathi boilā tesaneke sabunti kalā hata
ẏekā hoi ratha gheni āsuacchi muhiṁ
sarilā sampada deba sr̥ṣṭire kāryya nāhiṁ | 253 |
nakuḷa boilā re se keuṇa mārge galā
kaḍhāa patha sārathi ẏethe thāu yāna
āsa boli gamile se mādrīra nandana | 255 |
dakṣiṇaku mukha kari nairuta mārge galā | 256 |
re re dānara boli ḍāka diai mahābīra

lg.note:
“kodāḷa āẏudha goṭāẏe achai hāthara” pare “ṭa”
pothira :– bhinna pāṭha |
yojane yojane ye bāha lamba aṭai
nāsā bimbara giri gumpā prāẏe diśai |
dantamāna tāra lāṅgaḷara īṣa
cakṣu tāhāra karāḷa catrara ādriśa |
niśamāna tāra tāḷa gacha prāẏeka diśanti
karṇṇa yoḍā tāra chatra prāẏe ye aṭanti |
muṇḍara keśa pādeṇa lāgai
ajagara sarpa goṭāẏe paitā kariṇa achai |
pāda dui tāra pabongta samāna
osāra ye chāri yojana pramāṇa |
śuṇiṇa nakuḷa tabada hoilā
ẏeḍe baḍa daita kāhiṁ rahithilā |
lg.l: beni ghaḍi pariyante pāde gamana kale
dekhile se yamapraśastara pacchima diga kati
se mrge yāuacchi asura kuḷa pati | 259 |
sārathira bacane se nakuḷa ḍāka dei
raha raha dānaba re yāuachu kāhiṁ | 261 |
re re kāra dhuni śuṇi rahilā asura mahābīra
keuṇa deśara tu kaha mohora chāmure
re re kāra kariṇa āmbhaku ḍaka deu
kāḷa bikāḷanta tu bhaẏe ki na pāu | 266 |
nakuḷa boile re pāmara manda bāi
pacha āḍaku tu chāhāni re dānaba
gharaku yāi āja dekhibu kire kuṭumba
ẏehi pabongtare āja paḍiba tora śaba | 269 |
śuṇi dānaba kopa kari māilā koḍāḷa
tāhāra āẏudha dhari piṭile tāra śire
nāhiṁ nohilā boli dānaba ḍeiṁlā jhātikāre | 272 |
keḍe baḍa br̥kṣa goṭā hoilā bhaganasta | 274 |
yebaṇa konta bājante meru cūra hoi
ẏeḍe śahasra goṭā ye upuḍi paḍai | 276 |
ẏeteka bichāriṇa se mādrī debīra baḷā
hasiṇa dānaba se kalāka ghora nāda | 279 |
boilā mānabā re tu aṭu ẏeḍe bāi
merure kṣudra ṭeḷā bājile kisa hoi | 280 |
yamara bhabanaku tu re karuachu anakūḷa | 281 |
śuṇasi mānabā re kahibā tote tāhā | 283 |
asamāna loka saṅge kariba yehu dvanda
ākhi thāuṁ thāuṁṭi boli tāku andha | 285 |
abadhāna hoi śuṇa tu ho ẏeka citte | 286 |
āmbhanta samāna tu nohu boli kari
se nyāẏaru boili yāa jībana gheni apasari | 287 |
āmbhanta samāna re nohu toho chāra
tu yuddha karibu ki āmbhara chāmura | 288 |
prāṇa gheni mandiraku yāa yāre boilā | 289 |
yahuṁ se asura boilā ẏehu bāṇī
tuṇḍe na paśi nāsikā uccharga hoilā | 293 |
na chāḍile nakuḷa mahā kopa bahi | 294 |
dui bhmaje bhiḍile se dānabara gaḷā
kaṭi bhāga bhiḍilā se dānaba anargaḷā | 297 |
dhanya se paṇḍusuta na paḍile taḷe
gaḷā dhari nakuḷa asuraku moḍilā tini beḷa pariyante
kicchihiṁ nohilā dānaba rahicchi sehi mate | 301 |
keḍe baḍa dānaba na pāruacchi caḷi
puṇi asura māḍi basilā nakuḷa mahābaḷī | 302 |
re re dānaba boli ḍākanti nakuḷa
māilu mohora re aṭhara kṣauṇī baḷa | 303 |
bhāi bandhu kuṭumba mora gurujana yete
tohora bairi nohu āmbhetu māilu kisa arthe | 304 |
āja ẏebe daiba pocchilā āṣya tora
ẏete kahi bīra bidhāẏe māilāka toḷi
bibidha māḍa māilā mādrī debīra baḷā | 309 |
mane bichārai ẏehi na marai niki
kuṇḍaḷi siṁha bīra ye paḍicchi aceta
uṭhi ubhā hoilā se daita kuḷabīra
mr̥tu debatā tule dhāraṇā deu āsi | 316 |
nakuḷa boile re kahilu tu sata
ẏete boli beni pāda dhari jhātikāre
ṭaha ṭaha hasilā dānaba kuḷa rāẏe | 319 |
chāri yuṇa loha giri pabongteka thilā
cauda khaṇḍa hoiṇa pabongta paḍilāka bhāji | 321 |
boilā śubhāśubha ta na diśai mote
bije karichanti se pāṇḍaba chāri bhāi
rathuṁ ḍeiṁ yāi bhumire ubhā hoi | 327 |
bho deba buḍilā āsi hastinā saṁpatti
kimpe ho sāarathi bakaḷa heu tuhi | 330 |
aśoka deśe kimpe śoka jāta karu
hāni lābha kathā tu ta bichāra na karu | 331 |
lg.note: āstāne basichanti yujheṣṭhi nr̥pabara | (kha, ṭa, jha, ḍa, ḍha)

lg.l: santāpa bākya ta karu achu śoka dhuni | 332 |
bāṭa ogāḷiṇa se thilā ubhā hoi
cauda kośa deba aṭai tāra dehī | 335 |
bīra tūra śuṇi se nuārilā sahi
pachārilā mānaba re kāhiṁra aṭu tuhi | 336 |
boilā tohora chāra aṭa re daita | 337 |
re re kāra karu re tohora chāra nāsti | 338 |
gadā gheni asuraku piṭilā maha chatrī | 339 |
bāma hāthe dhari se chaṛāi ghenigalā
beḍhi kari daitaku māra re boilā
beḍhi māra boli sainanta āgyāṁ dilā naranātha | 343 |
āgyāṁ pāiṇa se sakaḷa senā rathī
yāhāra yete śasra binddhale beḍhi kari
daitara śarīre śasra temante na bhedai | 347 |
deba ! pabongta prāẏe ubhā hoithilā daita bīra
deba ! ghora yuddha kariṇ asakaḷa lalā hata
caturaṅg saina baḷa sabu hoile nipāta | 349 |
merure kṣidra teḷā yesane na bhedai
sehimati śahasra daita dehare na kāṭai | 351 |
yahuṁ śahasramāna tāra dehare na bhedilā
deba ! se mutha bājanteṇa hasai asura | 354 |
tathāpi na malā se asura rābana | 355 |
nr̥patiki asura mutha ghāte kari hata
deba ! bhīṣma bhūrisabongā bāhlika ye śalya
jadyaratha karṇṇa ye bikarṇṇa ādi kari
sabuntihiṁ māri gadā gheni galāka rākṣasa | 359 |

lg.note: kṣidra = kṣudra = choṭa |
lg.l: boilā re tumbhe sabonge thāa ẏehimate
kāli muṁ bhakṣaṇa re karibaiṁ yugate | 361 |
apāra dinuṁ mohora mahu māṁse icchā
ẏemanta boli kari asura galā, deba !
ratha gheni āsi miḷili giri sabong | 363 |
sabong giri upare muṁ dekhili nakuḷa
bārata se pucchile muṁ kahili sakaḷa | 364 |
mote saṅgate gheniṇa pabongta baḷī gale | 365 |
re re kāra kari ḍākanteṇa radilā mahā | 366 |
deba ! se dānabara tule bahuta kale raṇa
deba ! śahasra bheda yahuṁ nohilā asurara kāẏe
māla bindhāṇa yuddha ārambhilā mādrīra ta naẏe | 369 |
deba ! cauṣaṭhī māla bindhaṇa māla yuddha yete
kebeheṁ nāśa se ye nohilā durānte | 370 |
deba ! pāṣāṇa pabongta ye lohagiri upare
kachāḍante cūrṇṇa se ye hoile acaḷe | 371 |
yuddha karanteṇa ye nakuḷa aneka cintā pāi

lg.note: poḍābaḷi hiba kālira prabhāte | (gha)
kāli pūroibi mo sainara manobāñcchā | (gha, ca)
“teṇu kari deba ailaiṁ chāmukuhiṁ” pare pāṭha acchi !–
tini yaṇa madhye aṭai asurara dehī
tāhāra mahimā kahita nuhai |
ḍagara mukharu ẏesaneka śuṇi
camatkāra prāẏe maṇile yujheṣṭhi nr̥pamaṇi | (ja, ṇa)
giri sabong = sabong nāmaka giri |

lg.l: tini yuṇa adhe ye aṭai daitara dehī | 375 |
brikodara boilā deba āgyāṁ dia mote
bukure basiṇa se kalāka ghora raḍi | 384 |

lg.note: deba mānabe se aṭai jagujiṇā | (cha, gha, ṅa)
adharma yuddha karibā nohai yugata | (ca, ñja, ḍa, ḍha)
rājaraṇā = rāja rāja |

lg.l: bāma kare dhariṇa se dilā phopaḍāi
khāla ṭhikara bhumi ye samatula hele | 388 |
yujheṣṭhi pachāranti śuṇa ho mantrī cūḍāmaṇi | 391 |
ẏeḍe ghora yuddha ta dekhilāra nāhiṁ
bho deba kapiḷa siṁha boli mahābaḷa bīra

lg.note: māḍanti moḍanti raṭanti kaṭanti | (ña)
maṭanti māṭanti danta pāṭi ragaḍanti | (ṭha)
“maṭanti māṭanti jhaṭanti dhākaṭanti” pāṭha pare –
ẏemante kete yuddha apāru apāra
āu yuddhamāna asaṁkhya agocara | (ña)
daitaku maraṇa achai abā kāhiṁ | (kha, ṭha)
ṭhikara = ucca |

lg.l: jaẏasiṁhara putra ẏe kuṇḍaḷī siṁha bīra
deba ! sapata baraṣa se tapa ārambilā
ẏeka pāde ubhā hoi rurddhvaku anāilā | 402 |
tadante bīra ghor anaḷa se jāḷi
se agni bhitareṇa paśilā asura mahābaḷī | 403 |
āsa āsa daita boli ḍākile ucca kari | 404 |
debī boile re tu śuṇasa asura
mo nija rūpa dekhile ki bratai saṁsāra | 407 |
mohora nija rūpa dekhi deba trilocana
putra nāśa yāiki go śarada candramukhi | 409 |
kāḷīkā boile tu agniru bāhāra hua
tebe se dekhāibi mohora nija deha | 410 |
lg.note: sahi nuāri ulagne hoile mauna | (cha)

lg.l: poḍilā tambā praẏe diśai śarīra tāhāra | 411 |
dekhāa nija rūpa dekhai kinā muhiṁ | 412 |
meru maṇḍaḷa jāṇi diśai tā śarīra | 415 |
raṭa maṭa danta bikaṭa hāsa cinti | 416 |
gaha gaha śabada śubhai ghora dhuni
bidu jhaṭa jhaṭa ki hasibāra gati
kiḷikiḷā dhuni pr̥thī debī na sahai | 419 |
meru ṭaḷa ṭaḷa ye kampai mandara
kimpā re dānaba tu karu citte bhaẏe | 424 |
ẏebe re bara māga ye tohora icchā
dānaba boilā ma go pūrāa manabāñcchā | 425 |
nāga dakṣa ādi yete achatni bhuapāḷa | 428 |
kāhārihiṁ hāthe na thāu mr̥tu mote
brahmāṇḍa jiṇimāku bara māgili māẏe tote | 429 |
bho jananī tote muhiṁ māgucchi ẏehi bara | 430 |
daśa abatāra se ye huanti āpaṇa 432 |
daita dānaba māru pr̥thī bhārā hari | 433 |
tohora icchāẏe re māga tuhi bara
śuṇiṇa daita rāẏe boilā go māẏe
śahasre muṁ na cchiḍibi na buḍibi jaḷe
pabane na uḍibi na poḍibi anaḷe | 436 |
paśa sahasra siṁghara hoiba mora baḷa
mohora mana kale upāḍi pārai meru ye acaḷa | 437 |
mote uttāna kari ye māḍi basi pāri
grībā āṇi yebe rakhiba kaṭi sari| 438 |
lg.note: pātāḷu jiṇimiṁ muṁ brahmaloka yāẏe | (ṭa)
lg.l: bāma caraṇa mora rahiba tahiṁ āṇi
chāḍibi mohara prāṇa ye kahili tumbhare | 440 |
astu hou boli galeka debī kāḷī
sahadeba mantrī ye kahile ẏete bhāḷi | 441 |
re re kāra dhuni ghora rāba kare
siṁgha śārddūḷa ki sāṁgrāma mahā ghore | 444 |
nakuḷa boile re kahilu tu sata
āja mr̥tu tote re dei ta daibata | 447 |
hasi uṭhilā ye dānaba mutha ghāte | 448 |
boilā ẏehi yuddha kari ki jiṇibu
ẏehi deha gheni ki yama mandiraku yibu | 449 |
tera dina yuddha hoilā ho nr̥parāṇa | 451 |
yujheṣṭhi boile tu ho śuṇa nr̥pabara
mantrī kahilā se ye karuchanti raṇa
mohora kahante se ye nuāribe jāṇi
mantrī kahilā bacana nakuḷa āge kuha | 456 |
gadā taḷe thoi bhīma ṭhārile bīramaṇi
grībā bāma pāda yeuṁ rūpe āṇi | 458 |
ẏehi rūpe māra boli dilā kahi | 459 |
cauda kośa yāẏe pabongta cūnā hoi | 462 |
meru śr̥ṅga jāṇi aṭai daitara śira
acaḷa hoilā daita na caḷīlā yahuṁ
binā arthe yuddhaku ailaiṁ kimpe muhiṁ | 466 |
lg.note: ẏehi rupe māra boli delā śabadāi |

lg.l: āmbhe arakṣita deba kointā rāṇḍa putra
āśre kariachuṁ āhe śaṅkha catra hātha | 469 |
ẏebe se daita tule kali muhiṁ raṇa
raẏaṇī dibasa hoi hoilā tera dina | 471 |
teṇu tote cintā kali ye debarāẏe | 472 |
kṣetrīṁkara mukhe yehne muṁ na pāibi lāja
dānabara keśa se bāma kare dhari
ḍāhāṇa bhmaje dhari duipāda āṇilā oṭāri | 478 |
pāṭi pāḍilā se ye dānaba achārgaḷe | 479 |

lg.note: beni bhmaje dui pāda āṇilā oṭāri | (ṭa, gha, ca)

lg.l: muṇḍa bājanteṇa phitilāka pāṭi, śoṇita hoilāka jāta | 481 |
śarīra paḍilā tāra, prāṇa śūnye galā
nakuḷa jāṇilā ẏe dānaba bīra malā | 483 |
mr̥tu piṇḍa chāḍi ubhā hoilāka bīra
kusuma br̥ṣṭi śire kale sabong sura | 484 |
cauda bhmabana rakhilu ẏe daitaku dahi | 485 |
ẏete boliṇa ye yāhā pure gale
sārathi saṅgate chanti pāṇḍabe pañcha jaṇe | 2 |
brikodara boilā deba yibā nija purī
kemante yibā bābu kaurobe hele hata
ẏebe ki karibā bābu kahasi upāẏe
bho deba tāhāṁkara na dharibā nāma
daiba yoge ẏebe chanti mr̥tu pāi | 8 |
yujheṣṭhi boile re ẏehā se kahu mote
nāśa gale yebe ho nr̥pati kaurobe
andha rājā goti ye anasta hoibe | 11 |
āhā bhāi boliṇa ye nr̥pati cūḍāmaṇi
bābu dhanañjaẏa re sodare rakṣā kara
ye yahiṁ tahiṁ paḍile boliṇa bolibe
ẏebe se daita mārigalā saina sahite
bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa śalya aśastamā jadyarathe | 15 |
ẏekā daitara hāthe samaste nāśa gale | 17 |
ẏete kahi ḍhaḷi paḍile dharmara tanaẏe | 18 |
lg.note: sodare maribe muṁ rahibi kemante | (ṭa, ca, ña)
lg.l: hā hā re bhāimāne boliṇa kāndanti
tumbhe yebe mala maribi bābu muhiṁ
āu bāruṇābantaku muṁ yibi kisa pāiṁ | 20 |
kaḍhāa sārathi boli āgyāṁ tāhāku dianti
kaḍhāa tu bāṭa ho boliṇa bolanti | 23 |
sārathi śire yoḍi kahai beni pāṇi
ratnābaḷī gadā dekhile sannidhe tāra nāhiṁ | 29 |
yuddha bhumi yeteka tahiṁ khojiṇ adekhile
sārathiki boile gheni ẏe gadā tuhi
tāhāra cadā toḷi ki sārathi bhārjana | 34 |
gheni gadābara tu mane na dhara bimana
saina khoji koji yāiṁ miḷileka dhāti
āpaṇe yujheṣṭhi deba dhaile koḷa kari
hā hā bhāi boli kāndanti ucca kari | 42 |
śaraṇa pañjara re yāhāra nāma goṭi | 43 |
diga bijaẏe karante yāhāra saina gheni
kuru sāgara thāṭha boli bolanti nr̥pamaṇi | 44 |
daitara hāthe se ki mr̥tu thilā tote
bhāi bandhu kuṭumba sahite samaste gale nāśa
icchā mr̥tu icchā jīiṁmā yeṇu aṭanti sehi
teṇu se aceta hoile raṇe śoi | 48 |
āu yete yoddhā saburi nāhiṁ prāṇa
tera dibasa helā sabonge paḍichanti mahī
arjuna bichāra ye karanti mane mana
pūboge ye khāṇḍaba bana dahilā bahani | 52 |
agnira dahane ye samaste nāśa gale | 53 |
bana dahana ante bibhūti kare gheni
santoṣe boile bābu āmbhanta daẏā kalu
tini yuga byādhiru āmbhe tohare tarilu | 56 |
tu ẏebe ẏehu bibhūti yatane thoithibu
ẏe mantra pāḍhiṇa yebe bibhūti pakāibu
indra tusti kale ye arjuna chāmura | 61 |
indra kahile ye śuṇa ho arjuna
tini yuge se br̥kṣa māgiṇa na pāilā
tote māgiṇa ẏebe se toṭāyāka bhakṣilā | 63 |
jībajantu ādi kari thile toṭāre yete
sabunti khāilā se kariṇa lobha citte | 65 |
tohora gheni ẏebe debe hele hata
saṁsāre hatyāra kāreṇī helu bīra pātha | 66 |
lakṣe baraṣa arambha kali yahiṁ yete | 67 |
tu tāhāntu tini dibase hata kalu
sāṁgrāma kariṇa mote ẏete kaṣṭa dilu | 68 |
ẏebe yebe toṭā dei pāru kari
tebe se sabu dharma rahiba tohori | 69 |
mane bichārilā ye agni kahichanti mote
toṇaru kāḍhile se ye jībanyāsa śara
bho asra caḷi tu toṭā pure yibu
yahiṁ yete br̥kṣa tahiṁ sabunti lāgibu | 77 |
gatuṁ adhika se ye hoibe guṇa śate
jībajantu ādi kari yahiṁ yete thile
vargaku na yāiṁ tahuṁ gale bana ghora
śuna ho baibasuta manu badanti agasti
mane se kathā citoile pāṇḍaba kuḷa chatrī | 84 |
nārāja karṇṇare ye se mantra kahile | 86 |
boile rathī hāthī aśva ye pādānti
samasteheṁ bratibe to lāgi kari muna
ẏete kahi nārāja ye chāḍilā arjuna | 88 |

lg.note: svargaku na yāi tahuṁ gale nija pura |
hastināre prabeśa paṇḍura kumara | [ṭa, ta, jha, ña, gha]
“sodaraṁka arthe tāhā ghenile arjuna” pare pāṭha–
se cibhmati lagāile nārāja munare
boile śīghra hoiṇa yibu tu khare | [ja]
śaraku boilā samastaṁka tuṇḍare lāgibu turita
hāthī ghoḍā pāika sanya ye sahita | [ṭa]

lg.l: pratagyāṁ kariṇa se ḍākanti māra māra
ucce ḍāka dianti keṇe galu re asura | 91 |
hasiṇa kahanti ye gaṅgā debīṁkara suta
tumbhara bheṭa kāhiṁ ho hoiba daita | 92 |
driyodhanaku chāḍi āu śreṣṭha loka ye sabunti | 96 |
śire kara deiṇa hasi ubhā hele | 79 |
kaha sārathi āho māruti yāha kahe | 100 |
śuṇiṇa sārathi ye yoḍiḷā beni kara

div.note: “nr̥patira chāmure bhīṣma droṇa miḷi” pāṭha pare adhikā pāṭha–
bhīma ratna mukuṭa kuṇḍaḷa gadābara

lg.note: ẏemāna dei chāri bhāi praḷambile
śire kara dei hasi ubhā hele |
śire kara dei hasi ubhā hele |
mānagobinda bīra mukuṭa śire bānddhalā
kaṇṭhare maṇi lambāi gadā hāthare dhailā | [ḍa, ḍha, ṇa, ta]

lg.l: ghora yuddhe tumbha se māilā sabunti | 102 |
svāmī jāṇu ta ādya yuddhe hoilā ka yāhā
prānteṇa sāṁgrāṁe paḍilā ta nr̥pakuḷa nāhā | 103 |
manimaẏa maṇimaẏa mukuṭa ābara gadā ratnabaḷī
rathuṁ ḍeiṁ yāiṁṇa paḍili pāda taḷa | 110 |
śuṇiṇa kopa kale mādrī debīra suta | 111 |
mote boile re kaḍhāa patha tuhi
raha raha boli ye nakuḷa ḍāka dei | 114 |
pālaṭi rahilā ye asura kuḷa sāiṁ

lg.note: debatāmāne svarge jāṇanti yuddha hoilāka yāhā | (ṭa, jha)
lg.l: yete yete deba yuddha hoilā apramita
daba ! tera dna pariyante hoilā ghora raṇa
deba ! leuṭi puṇi bāruṇāre kahilai yāiṁ
deba ! śuṇiṇa dhāiṁle ṭhākura chāri bhāi | 118 |
na marai dānaba ye aṭai amara | 120 |
ẏe daitara mr̥tu ki achai boile | 121 |
yeuṁ rūpe danabara hoiba mr̥tu yathā | 122 |
mr̥tu bheda jāṇi tāra nakuḷa ye mahābīra
bāma pāda kāṇi āṅguḷi mukhe dile
sarge debatāẏe ye sādhu sādhu kale | 125 |
puṣya br̥ṣṭi kale śacī debī sāīṁ | 127 |
deba daitaku māri maṇi mukuṭa ādi kari
arjuanku chāhiṁ bahata rodana ye kale
dekha ho dhanurjaẏe mora sodare nāśa gale | 132 |
ẏehānta chāḍi abā kemante ghare yibi | 134 |
ẏehāṁkara nidhane muṁ bañchai ki bhale | 135 |
ẏete kahi rāẏe paḍile mūrcchā yāi
khāṇḍaba bana dahana kāḷe agni deithile buddhi | 138 |
se bhasma arjuna manabhedī nārāja mune lagāile
mantra paḍhi kari ye nārāja chāḍi dile | 139 |
teṇu kari deba pāila tumbhe prāṇa
ẏe kathā tathya deba ābadhāne śuṇa | 141 |
bhīṣma droṇ aboile sādhu sādhu ra dhanurjaẏe
maraṇaru uturilu āmbhe ye tohora upāẏe | 143 |
sādhu sādhu pāṇḍaba ye śubhilāka dhuni
samaste bolanti ho pāṇḍaba tumbhe dhani | 144 |
lg.note: yete hāthī rathī nr̥pati pātramantrī | (ṅa, ca, jha, ṭa, ñja)

lg.l: jaẏa ta hoilā āmbhanta ajaẏa ta nāhiṁ
bājai ṭamaka niśāṇa ye śaṅkha dhuni
saṅgate śate bhāi bhīṣma droṇa ādi
aneka sambhare ye nr̥pati daṇḍa sāji | 153 |
keteheṁke dūra nr̥pati gabana kari gale
mahā pratāpī se asura kuḷa pati
daita saṅgate se aneka yuddha kalā | 156 |
bhīma arajuna sahadeba gheni hoile āgata | 157 |
samaste bratile pūbongra baḷa thile yete | 160 |
sabu ṭhābaru rakhanti paṇḍura pañchu poẏe | 162 |
śrī jagannāthaṁka śrī caraṇe śaraṇa kabi sāroḷā dāsa | 170 |
jagannatha sumara nare saṁsāru yiba tari | 171 |
jagannātha sumara nare na daṇḍiba yama
jagannātha sumara nare naraka khaṇḍi pāiba uttama | 173 |
lg.note: śrī jagannātha svāmī deba puruṣa uttama | (ña)
lg.l: śrī jagannātha sumara nare jība thibā yāẏe
śrī jagannātha svāmī caraṇe sārojā dāsa binaẏe | 174 | 4807 |
lg.head: {@nīḷendrī haraṇa@}

lg.l: ayoni sambhūta tote durgā kale jāta
dakṣaṇa dvāraku tu rakhilu śiśu kāḷe
agre pujā ghenu sabong debatāṁka meḷe
pāśa ye aṁkuśa tora sūryyara kiraṇa
paẏare nūpura tora ghāghuḍi ruṇu jhuṇa
janme janme sebā mora ẏe tohora caraṇe

lg.note:
“nr̥tyarasa gītare mohilu suragaṇa” pare ‘ṭa’ pothire
adhikā pāṭha :–
yamaku jiṇilu tu kheḷa kautuke
bāhāna kariṇa ye rakhilu tora pākhe |
mūṣā rūpe yama se bahilāka tote
catrī kumbhārara gaḷita kuṣṭha byādhi khaṇḍilu he nāthe |
śrīkhaṇḍī candana = śīkhaṇḍa candana |
āchyāna = ākhyāna |
lg.l: ẏe tohora caraṇe luḷu mora mātha
prasanna hoa he mote deba gaṇanātha | 9 |
śrī mahābhāratha kahibā kumbha ruṣi tanu | 10 |
śuṇile khaṇḍibi mora hr̥dara yete byathā | 11 |
batiśa sahasra kanyā aṣṭauttara śate putra
kāhara tahuṁ jāta kete hoile kumara
ẏete boli rāẏe ye pucchale bacana
agasti boile pāpa kara tu dahana | 16 |
ṣoḷa sahasra kanyā āṇīle nārakāsura māri | 17 |
ābara yeteka tahiṁ ṣoḷa sasra nārī | 18 |
kanyāke daśa daśa putra hoile abatāra | 19 |
ẏekaku ẏeka sundara aṭanti teja kaḷā
saṁpūrṇṇa candra jāṇi mukha jyoti bhalā | 21 |

lg.note: saṁpūrṇṇa candramā jāṇi mukha ye suḍhaḷā | (ṭha)
luḷu = loṭu |

lg.l: sura nara mohana ye makaradyvaja sama | 26 |
sabong guṇe bicakṣaṇa aṭanti se beni bhāi
indra candra jāta ki mānaba deha bahi | 28 |
bibhā hoi āṇile se kāhāra nandinī | 30 |
muni boile ho śuṇa kathā mahā raṅge
mahā dvanda hoilā se īśvaraṁka saṅge | 31 |
kehu kanyā barilā se baruṇa bhmābane

lg.note: sura nara mohana se ati bitapana | (cha, ḍa)
keha katyā barilā se keuṇa bhmabane | [cha]
santhaśīḷa aṭai se biṣṇure bhagata | [ña, kha, ṇa]

lg.l: ki ẏe rūpe diśanti se pratakṣe kamaḷīnī | 37 |
candrabāra meṣa candra śūḷa yoga yogāilā | 39 |
bāẏaba nāme karaṇa bhoga tera litā
dibasaku bhoga ye pāicchi tera daṇḍa
tāhā śūṇi nr̥pati ye pāila bikhaṇḍa

lg.note: ẏemantara beḷe ye janama duhitā
paṇḍita janaṁku ye pachārile tāra pitā | (kha, ṇa, ṭa)
kanyāẏe upujilā ati garuhaṁsī | [gha, ta]
“daiba kaṣaṇa mote biṣama paracaṇḍa” pare pāṭhāntara–
ẏesaneka bichāri āgyāṁ dilā nr̥pamaṇi
jambu dīpe chāḍa nei ẏe mohora dulaṇī |
nr̥patira āgyāṁẏe se dāsīmane gale
śuṇasi gosāmanī ẏehā nr̥pati kahile |
dohitā nibāsa boliṇa āgyāṁ dile
rāṇī boile svāmīṁki kopa karāile |
dāsīmāne kahile pāilā gaṇḍa yoga doṣa
dekhibāku na yogāi dui aṣṭa baraṣa | (abaśiṣṭa para pr̥ṣṭhāre)
lg.l: ṣoḷa baraṣa ẏe kany hebā yāẏe
ẏehāra badana na chāhiṁbi ẏe deśare na thāẏe | 46 |
ẏe kanya tajā hāilā pitāṁku gaṇḍa ye lāgilā | 47 |
ẏete boli kari rāẏe dileka ādeśa | 48 |
chaḍadaśa baraṣa yāẏe na chāhiṁba ẏehā mukha | 50 |
yete doṣa kale doṣa karibāka kṣamā | 52 |
bikaḷe robai ye śubhai susvara bāṇī | 56 |
lg.note: pr̥bong pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara :–
tāhā śuṇi rāṇīmāne hoile birasa
daibara kaṣaṇa ẏe pūbongra bhabiṣa |
ẏete boliṇa śoka kalāka apāra
dohitāku gharu gheni hoilā bāhāra |
bikhaṇḍa = mana duḥkha |

lg.l: pābongtī dekhile bane kandai ẏeka sulakṣaṇi | 58 |
umā debī boile kṣaṇe raha śūḷapāṇi
biśvanātha boile se aṭai kisa jāti
ẏeka stirī robile ye śuṇi na ruhanti
kāṭha beṅga hoiṇa se śate janma thānti | 62 |
umā debī miḷile baruṇa rāṇī pāśa | 63 |
bolanti jagata māta śuṇasi go āī
araṇya bhitare paśi kāndu kāhiṁ paiṁ | 64 |
kāhāra nandinī tu go ke tohora sāīṁ
nirmākṣī hoi tu kāndu sākhā tora nāhiṁ | 65 |
baruṇa rājāra muṁ ye aṭai pāṭarāṇī | 67 |
ẏe mora garbhe jāta hoilā dulaṇī | 68 |
pitā mātāṁku pāilā gaṇḍa ṣoḷa baraṣaku | 69 |
lg.note: ẏethira tadanta śuṇa ho paśupati | [ṇa, ṭa, kha]
pitāku lāgilā gaṇḍa ṣoḷa baraṣaku | [ña, ṭa, ja, ṅa, ṇa, ṭha]
lg.l: teṇu kari nr̥pati loḍile ẏehākaiṁ māri
ẏehāra dukharu mo naẏanuṁ bahe bāri
ẏe duhitā gheni muṁ hoili banachārī | 71 |
ẏehā śuṇi pābongtī ye bolanti bacana
gaṇḍa nalāgiba doṣa yiba ājiṭhāru puṇi
atianta yatane pāḷa ẏe kanyāku go turuṇī | 73 |
trailokya mohiba naẏana rūpa śobhā diśi
nīḷendī nāma ẏehāra śuṇa re śubhrakeśī | 74 |
āmbhanta bheṭilu tuhi gaṇḍa doṣa galā
doṣa bhoga galā yāa tu nija pura
ẏe kanyā goṭi hāde hoilā āmbhara | 76 |
ẏe kanyāra gaṇḍa doṣa galāka hāde jiṇi | 77 |
barile īśvare ye maṇi goṭiẏeka dei | 78 |
baruṇa rājāra rāṇī dohitā gheni nija pure miḷile | 79 |
keteheṁka dine se dohitā helā naba yubā
sādriśe bara nāhiṁ nohicchi se bibhā | 81 |
lg.note:
“muhiṁ kehne mūrucchibi garbhadhārī” pare “gha, ṅa, ca, ṭha, ḍha”
pothire bhinma pāṭha–
garbhadhārī jananī ki pārai tāhamurccchi
dohitāku koḷa kari śoka karuacchi |
jība thile kāhāku ke pāriba mūrucchi
araṇya bhitare piśi kāndai mr̥gāccchī
lg.l: pratakṣe rati ki se hoicchi abatāra
hr̥daẏa bistāra jāṇi majhā ḍambaru ākāra | 82 |
naẏana nīḷa utpaḷa kisa deba paṭāntara
bijuḷi jhaṭakai yehne nīḷa meghara bhitara | 83 |
nāhīṁ ta upamā tini bhmabane samasari | 85 |
jaḷa trīḍā binode ye nr̥pati kumārī
kanyāṁkara saṅgate se āsai trīḍa kari | 86 |
kanyā rūpa dekhiṇa se hoilā mohamāna | 87 |
ẏe kanyā āmbhara pure dekhila ta nāhiṁ | 88 |
mantrī boilā bho deba yāhā pucchā kala
gaṇḍa doṣa boli kari yāhāku lecchila | 89 |
se kanyā aṭai deba nīḷendī nāme bāḷī
nr̥pati boile ẏe yebe mohor adulaṇī
kāhāku pradāna karibi kahani mantrī cūḍāmaṇi | 91 |
yubā kanyā ghare thoi ta na yogāi
ẏethu ante dvārikā pure bijaẏe nārada mahāruṣi
āsana deiṇa se ye pāda pakhāḷile
āja se suphaḷa dina mora hoilā boile | 96 |
keuṇa kāryye mini ho ẏethaku āgamana | 97 |
ruṣi boile tu śuṇasi re bīra
sākṣāte cañchaḷā ki se hemabantara nandinī
rūpa dekhi mohi ye hoibe sura muni | 99 |
sādriśe bara na pāi se nohiacchi bibhā
āmbhara bola kara ẏehikṣaṇi tahiṁki chāla yibā | 100 |
kemante tahiṁki yibāka āmbhe ratha gheni | 101 |
muni boile āmbhara mantra baḷuṁ kari
kehi na dekhibe ye yibā tāhāra puri | 102 |
ẏete boli ye muni mantra kahai tāra karṇṇe
ati bege miḷile se baruṇa bhmabana | 104 |
kehi na cihnile meḍhare yāiṁ hoi
dekhile nīḷendī kanyā ẏekā acchi ubhā hoi | 105 |
bijuḷī jhaṭakilā prāẏe birājai tāra tanu | 106 |
brahmāra nandana mora pure bije kalā | 108 |
ẏe jaṇaṁka tumbha saṅge kiẏe chanti āsi
sarūpa bacana kahibā muni he yeṇe prate āsai | 110 |
atianta śobhā diśai muni karicha ki māẏā | 111 |
muni boile nīḷendī ! ẏe baḷarāmaṁkara suta
sādriśe kanyā nahiṁ ẏe nohicchiye bibhā | 115 |
pūbongra puṇya phaḷe ẏe tote dekhilā | 116 |
tuhi ta abibhāi to sarūpe bara nāhiṁ
icchā hele ẏe bara barare śaśīmuhīṁ | 117 |
teṇu kari gheniṇa ye aili tohora pura | 118 |
tuhi ta deba kanyā rūpeṇa garuhaṁsī
ẏe deba kuḷeṇa ye rūpeṇa praśaṁsī | 119 |
āmbhe madhyāpātra na kara tu heḷa
māḷā dei baraṇa kara ẏeta śubha anakūḷa | 120 |
pañchuśara ye pīḍā kalāka tara tanu | 121 |
aḷapa hasai ye ruṣiṁkara kathā śuṇi
hr̥daẏa padma madhya bichāra karai taruṇī | 122 |
ẏe ye brahmāṁaka suta jagata kāreṇī
ẏehāhuṁ adhike mote na miḷiba bara
yeṇu mo nija bhagnīra śrīkr̥ṣṇa nija bara | 126 |
ẏete bichāriṇa ye gaḷāru kāḍhilā mukutā māḷi
amr̥ta pāna kari beni jane toṣa
mana pabana yoge gabana dvārābatī pura | 131 |
bho svāmī tumbhara bīryye ye duhitā upujilā | 135 |
gaṇḍa doṣa lāgilā tāku nibeśila bana
muhiṁ gheni gali deba tāku kapiḷāsa bhmabana | 136 |
banaste paśi muṁ ye karante rodana
prasanna hoiṇa se bara dile umākānta | 138 |
ẏe kanyāra nāma nīḷendī boli dile | 139 |
āmbhara kārttikaku bibhādebu ẏe tohora dulaṇī | 140 |
sehi dinu dohitāku pāḷai yatna kari
ẏebe naba yubā hoilā āmbhara kumārī | 141 |
tumbhe pitā hoi svāmī na jāṇila ẏehā
ẏebe kārttikaku āṇi kara tumbhe bihā | 142 |
bege nirbhākara ho tumbhe bibhāra bidhāna | 144 |
bole kapiḷāsa kandaraku caḷa tu jhaṭiti | 146 |
baraṇa kari bege tumbhe gheni āsa taḍati | 147 |
makara māsa śukaḷa pakṣa cauṭhī budhabāra
kanyā nakṣatraku ye aṭai sampada tāra | 153 |
